;#####################################################################
;############################# TATW 3.2 ##############################
;#####################################################################
;###################### Aging & Season script ########################
;########################## Welcome text #############################
;############################ Gamenotes ##############################
;############################# AI Bonus ##############################
;############################# AI Setup ##############################
;################# Baron Samedi/KK's One Ring script #################
;####################### Help weakened factions ######################
;########################### Last Stand ##############################
;############################ Osgiliath ##############################
;########################### AI invasions ############################
;########################### Arnor Union #############################
;############################# Aragorn ###############################
;########################### Army of Dead ############################
;########################## Balrog Arrival ###########################
;############################# Ent spawn #############################
;######################## Additional Nazguls #########################
;#################### Garrison Script Version 3.0 ####################
;########################### Money script ############################
;####################### Capital Change Cost #########################
;########################## Regional videos ##########################
;####################### Change settlement names #####################
;####################### Leader Death Messages #######################
;###################### Lost Capitals Messages #######################
;################## G5 Autonomous Regions mod v1.3 ###################
;############################ Palantiri ##############################
;########################### Germanicu5 AI ###########################
;#####################################################################
;
;########################### MONEY INVESTMENTS ##############################
;
script
        ; ---------------------
        ; counters

        restrict_strat_radar false

;###################### Aging & Season script ########################
;console_command toggle_perfect_spy
;console_command toggle_fow

declare_counter quarter
set_counter quarter 1

monitor_event PreFactionTurnStart FactionIsLocal
	if I_CompareCounter quarter == 1
		console_command season summer
	end_if
	
	if I_CompareCounter quarter == 2
		console_command season summer
	end_if
	
	if I_CompareCounter quarter == 3
		console_command season summer
	end_if
	
	if I_CompareCounter quarter == 4
		console_command season winter
	end_if
	
	inc_counter quarter 1
	if I_CompareCounter quarter == 5
		set_counter quarter 1
	end_if
end_monitor

monitor_event FactionTurnEnd FactionType slave
	and I_CompareCounter quarter > 1
	console_command season summer
end_monitor

;########################## WELCOME TEXT ##############################
monitor_event FactionTurnStart not FactionReligion catholic
	and not IsFactionAIControlled
	historic_event gamestart_good
terminate_monitor
end_monitor

monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionReligion catholic
	and not IsFactionAIControlled
	historic_event gamestart_evil
terminate_monitor
end_monitor

;#################### GAMENOTES: Barracks event #######################
monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionIsLocal
	and I_TurnNumber = 3
	historic_event gamenotes
terminate_monitor
end_monitor

;############################# AI Bonus ###############################
declare_counter is_the_ai
declare_counter is_the_human

monitor_event PreFactionTurnStart not IsFactionAIControlled
	and not FactionType slave
	set_event_counter is_the_ai 0
	set_event_counter is_the_human 1
end_monitor

monitor_event PreFactionTurnStart IsFactionAIControlled
	and not FactionType slave
	set_event_counter is_the_ai 1
	set_event_counter is_the_human 0
end_monitor

declare_counter is_turn_100_or_more
declare_counter is_turn_160_or_more
declare_counter is_turn_280_or_more
declare_counter is_turn_500_or_more
declare_counter is_turn_800_or_more


monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionIsLocal
	and I_TurnNumber >= 100
	set_event_counter is_turn_100_or_more 1
terminate_monitor
end_monitor

monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionIsLocal
	and I_TurnNumber >= 160
	set_event_counter is_turn_160_or_more 1
terminate_monitor
end_monitor

monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionIsLocal
	and I_TurnNumber >= 280
	set_event_counter is_turn_280_or_more 1
terminate_monitor
end_monitor

monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionIsLocal
	and I_TurnNumber >= 500
	set_event_counter is_turn_500_or_more 1
terminate_monitor
end_monitor

monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionIsLocal
	and I_TurnNumber >= 800
	set_event_counter is_turn_800_or_more 1
terminate_monitor
end_monitor

;############################# AI Setup ##############################
;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
;--- ADDITIONAL GENERALS ---- SETTLEMENT CONQUERORS --- SEND CHARACTERS AWAY --- INCREASE KINGS PURSE ---
;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
;
;#############################
;########### GONDOR ##########
;#############################
monitor_event PreFactionTurnStart FactionType sicily
	and IsFactionAIControlled
;-----------------------------
;---- ADDITIONAL GENERALS ----
;-----------------------------
	spawn_army 
	faction sicily
	character	random_name, named character, age 25, x 239, y 127
	traits LoyaltyStarter 1 , GoodCommander 2 , ReligionStarter 1 , GoodAttacker 1 , Loyal 2 , GoodAdministrator 1 , StrategicSkill 1 , LogisticalSkill 1 , Ai_Boost 1
		unit	Gondor Bodyguard		exp 2 armour 1 weapon_lvl 0
	end

	spawn_army 
	faction sicily
	character	random_name, named character, age 21, x 176, y 105
	traits LoyaltyStarter 1 , GoodCommander 2 , ReligionStarter 1 , GoodAttacker 1 , Loyal 2 , GoodAdministrator 1 , StrategicSkill 1 , LogisticalSkill 1 , Ai_Boost 1
		unit	Gondor Bodyguard		exp 2 armour 1 weapon_lvl 0
	end

;-----------------------------
;--- SETTLEMENT CONQUERORS ---
;-----------------------------
;	spawn_army 
;	faction sicily
;	character	random_name, named character, age 30, x 253, y 129, label gondor_attackers1
;	traits LoyaltyStarter 1 , GoodCommander 2 , ReligionStarter 1 , GoodAttacker 1 , Loyal 2 , GoodAdministrator 1 , StrategicSkill 1 , LogisticalSkill 1 , PoliticsSkill 1 , Ai_Boost 1
;		unit	Gondor Bodyguard	exp 2 armour 1 weapon_lvl 0
;		unit	Dismounted Kofm		exp 1 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
;		unit	Militia Archers		exp 0 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
;	end

	spawn_army 
	faction sicily
	character	random_name, named character, age 24, x 250, y 137, label gondor_attackers3
	traits LoyaltyStarter 1 , GoodCommander 2 , ReligionStarter 1 , GoodAttacker 1 , Loyal 2 , GoodAdministrator 1 , StrategicSkill 1 , LogisticalSkill 1 , PoliticsSkill 1 , Ai_Boost 1
		unit	Gondor Bodyguard	exp 2 armour 1 weapon_lvl 0
		unit	Dismounted Kofm		exp 1 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
		unit	Dismounted Kofm		exp 0 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
		unit	Gondor Infantry Mercs		exp 1 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
		unit	Ithilien Rangers Mercs		exp 0 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
		unit	Dismounted Kofm Mercs		exp 1 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
		unit	Dismounted Kofm Mercs		exp 0 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
	end

	spawn_army 
	faction sicily
	character	random_name, named character, age 27, x 119, y 105, label gondor_attackers2
	traits LoyaltyStarter 1 , GoodCommander 2 , ReligionStarter 1 , GoodAttacker 1 , Loyal 2 , GoodAdministrator 1 , StrategicSkill 1 , LogisticalSkill 1 , PoliticsSkill 1 , Ai_Boost 1
		unit	Gondor Bodyguard	exp 2 armour 1 weapon_lvl 0
		unit	Dismounted Kofm		exp 1 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
		unit	Dismounted Kofm		exp 0 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
	end

	siege_settlement gondor_attackers2, Andrast, attack				;andrast
;-----------------------------
;---- SEND CHARACTERS AWAY ---
;-----------------------------
	send_character_off_map family_gondor1
	send_character_off_map ambush_anfalas1
	send_character_off_map ambush_belfalas1
	send_character_off_map ambush_lebennin1
	send_character_off_map ambush_pinnaht1

terminate_monitor
end_monitor

declare_counter attack_gondor_settlements
set_counter attack_gondor_settlements 0

monitor_event PreFactionTurnStart FactionType sicily
	and IsFactionAIControlled

	if I_CompareCounter attack_gondor_settlements = 1
		siege_settlement gondor_attackers3, Cair-Andros, attack			;cair andros
		set_counter attack_gondor_settlements 2
		terminate_monitor
	end_if

	if I_CompareCounter attack_gondor_settlements = 0
		siege_settlement gondor_attackers3, Cair-Andros, maintain		;cair andros
		set_counter attack_gondor_settlements 1
	end_if
end_monitor

;-----------------------------
;---- SPAWN SLAVE DEFENDERS --
;-----------------------------
monitor_event PreFactionTurnStart FactionType sicily
	and not IsFactionAIControlled

	spawn_army 
	faction slave, sub_faction sicily
	character	random_name, named character, age 33, x 116, y 100		;andrast
	traits LoyaltyStarter 2 , GoodCommander 2 , ReligionStarter 1
		unit	Fyrd Axemen		exp 1 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
		unit	Fyrd Spearmen		exp 0 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
		unit	Fyrd Spearmen		exp 1 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
		unit	Norse Archers		exp 2 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
		unit	Norse Archers		exp 0 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
		unit	Norse Archers		exp 1 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
	end

	send_character_off_map ambush_ithilen1
	send_character_off_map ambush_ithilen2
terminate_monitor
end_monitor

;#############################
;########### ROHAN ###########

monitor_event PreFactionTurnStart FactionType milan
	and IsFactionAIControlled
;-----------------------------
;---- ADDITIONAL GENERALS ----
;-----------------------------
	spawn_army 
	faction milan
	character	random_name, named character, age 22, x 198, y 149
	traits LoyaltyStarter 1 , GoodCommander 2 , ReligionStarter 1 , GoodAttacker 1 , Loyal 2 , GoodCavalryGeneral 1 , StrategicSkill 1 , Upright 1 , Ai_Boost 1
		unit	rohan bodyguards		exp 2 armour 1 weapon_lvl 0
	end

	spawn_army 
	faction milan
	character	random_name, named character, age 24, x 186, y 153
	traits LoyaltyStarter 1 , GoodCommander 2 , ReligionStarter 1 , GoodAttacker 1 , Loyal 2 , GoodCavalryGeneral 1 , StrategicSkill 1 , Upright 1 , Ai_Boost 1
		unit	rohan bodyguards		exp 2 armour 1 weapon_lvl 0
	end
;-----------------------------
;--- SETTLEMENT CONQUERORS ---
;-----------------------------
	spawn_army 
	faction milan
	character	random_name, named character, age 31, x 221, y 182, label rohan_attackers1	;Wold
	traits LoyaltyStarter 1 , GoodCommander 2 , ReligionStarter 1 , GoodAttacker 1 , Loyal 2 , GoodCavalryGeneral 1 , StrategicSkill 1 , Upright 1 , Ai_Boost 1
		unit	rohan bodyguards	exp 2 armour 1 weapon_lvl 0
		unit	Rohan Axemen		exp 1 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
		unit	rohan rider		exp 2 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
	end

	spawn_army 
	faction milan
	character	random_name, named character, age 31, x 143, y 152, label rohan_attackers2	;Derwath
	traits LoyaltyStarter 1 , GoodCommander 2 , ReligionStarter 1 , GoodAttacker 1 , Loyal 2 , GoodCavalryGeneral 1 , StrategicSkill 1 , Upright 1 , Ai_Boost 1
		unit	rohan bodyguards	exp 2 armour 1 weapon_lvl 0
		unit	Rohan Axemen		exp 1 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
		unit	rohan rider		exp 2 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
	end

	siege_settlement rohan_attackers1, Wold, attack
	siege_settlement rohan_attackers2, Minhiriath, attack
;-----------------------------
;---- SEND CHARACTERS AWAY ---
;-----------------------------
	send_character_off_map family_rohan1
;-----------------------------
;---- INCREASE KINGS PURSE ---
;-----------------------------
	increment_kings_purse milan 900

terminate_monitor
end_monitor

;-----------------------------
;---- SPAWN SLAVE DEFENDERS --
;-----------------------------
monitor_event PreFactionTurnStart FactionType milan
	and not IsFactionAIControlled

	spawn_army 
	faction slave, sub_faction milan
	character	random_name, named character, age 47, x 228, y 183	;wold
		unit	Fyrd Axemen		exp 2 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
		unit	Fyrd Spearmen		exp 1 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
		unit	Fyrd Spearmen		exp 0 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
		unit	Huntsmen		exp 1 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
		unit	Norse Archers		exp 1 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
		unit	Norse Archers		exp 2 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
	end

	spawn_army 
	faction slave, sub_faction milan
	character	random_name, named character, age 41, x 140, y 146	;derwath
		unit	Fyrd Axemen		exp 2 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
		unit	Fyrd Axemen		exp 1 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
		unit	Fyrd Spearmen		exp 0 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
		unit	english huscarls	exp 1 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
		unit	english huscarls	exp 0 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
		unit	Norse Archers		exp 1 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
		unit	Norse Archers		exp 2 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
	end

terminate_monitor
end_monitor

		unit	Mounted Dunedain BG		exp 2 armour 1 weapon_lvl 0
		unit	Breeland Militia Spawn		exp 2 armour 1 weapon_lvl 0
		unit	Breeland Militia Spawn		exp 1 armour 1 weapon_lvl 0
		unit	Breeland Militia Spawn		exp 2 armour 1 weapon_lvl 0
		unit	Breeland Militia Spawn		exp 2 armour 1 weapon_lvl 0
		unit	Breeland Militia Spawn		exp 4 armour 1 weapon_lvl 0
	end

;-----------------------------
;--- SETTLEMENT CONQUERORS ---
;-----------------------------
	spawn_army 
	faction turks
	character	random_name, named character, age 26, x 137, y 252, label eriador_attackers1	;weathertop
	traits LoyaltyStarter 1 , GoodCommander 2 , ReligionStarter 1 , GoodAttacker 1 , Loyal 2 , Just 1 , GoodAdministrator 1 , LogisticalSkill 1 , Ai_Boost 1
		unit	Mounted Dunedain BG	exp 2 armour 1 weapon_lvl 0

	end

	siege_settlement eriador_attackers1, Weather-Hills, attack
;-----------------------------
;---- SEND CHARACTERS AWAY ---
;-----------------------------
	send_character_off_map family_eriador1
	send_character_off_map ambush_bree1
	send_character_off_map ambush_fornost1
	send_character_off_map ambush_cardolan1
	send_character_off_map ambush_staddle1

;---- INCREASE KINGS PURSE ---
;-----------------------------

terminate_monitor
end_monitor

	end

	and not IsFactionAIControlled

		unit	Mordor Orcs Invasion	exp 1 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
		unit	Mordor Orcs Invasion	exp 1 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
		unit	Mordor Orcs Invasion	exp 0 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
		unit	Mordor Orcs Invasion	exp 2 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
		unit	Mordor Archers Invasion	exp 1 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
		unit	Mordor Archers Invasion	exp 0 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
	end

		unit	Beorning		exp 1 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0

		unit	Huntsmen		exp 0 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0

		unit	Norse Archers		exp 0 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
	end

;#####################################################################
;################# Baron Samedi/KK's One Ring script #################
;#### Part 1: The city ring triggers and the finding of the ring #####
;#####################################################################

declare_counter ring_barad
declare_counter barad_timer
declare_counter activate_baradtimer
declare_counter activate_baradtimer2

;#########################One Ring Timer for evil factions
declare_counter ring_timer
declare_counter ring_spawned
declare_counter sauron_free
monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionReligion catholic
	and I_CompareCounter sauron_free = 0
	and FactionIsLocal
	and I_TurnNumber >= 15
	inc_counter ring_timer 1
	ui_flash_stop
end_monitor

monitor_conditions I_CompareCounter ring_timer = 26
	and I_CompareCounter sauron_free = 0
	set_counter ring_timer 1
	set_counter ring_spawned 0
end_monitor

monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionReligion catholic
	and I_WorldwideAncillaryExists one_ring
	set_counter ring_timer 1
end_monitor

;#########################Random city ring spawn for evil factions
declare_counter ring_hobbiton
declare_counter ring_imladris
declare_counter ring_anorien
declare_counter ring_edoras
declare_counter ring_amroth
declare_counter ring_hornburg
declare_counter ring_bree
declare_counter ring_thranduil
declare_counter ring_dale
declare_counter ring_erebor
declare_counter ring_mithlond
declare_counter ring_galadhon
declare_counter ring_thorin
declare_counter ring_message

monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionReligion catholic
	and I_CompareCounter ring_timer = 25
	and I_CompareCounter ring_spawned = 0
	and not I_WorldwideAncillaryExists one_ring
	and I_EventCounter ring_destroyed < 1
	if I_SettlementOwner Shire = turks
	and I_CompareCounter ring_spawned = 0
	and RandomPercent <= 8
	set_counter ring_spawned 1
	set_event_counter ring_hobbiton 1
	set_event_counter ring_imladris 0
	set_event_counter ring_anorien 0
	set_event_counter ring_edoras 0
	set_event_counter ring_amroth 0
	set_event_counter ring_hornburg 0
	set_event_counter ring_bree 0
	set_event_counter ring_thranduil 0
	set_event_counter ring_dale 0
	set_event_counter ring_erebor 0
	set_event_counter ring_mithlond 0
	set_event_counter ring_galadhon 0
	set_event_counter ring_thorin 0
	ui_flash_stop
		add_events

;#########################Evil faction found ring in time
monitor_event CharacterTurnStart FactionReligion catholic
	and I_CompareCounter ring_message = 0
	and FactionIsLocal
	and FactionwideAncillaryExists one_ring true
	historic_event one_ring_acquired_evil event/acquired.bik
	set_counter ring_message 1
	set_event_counter ring_hobbiton 0
	set_event_counter ring_imladris 0
	set_event_counter ring_anorien 0
	set_event_counter ring_edoras 0
	set_event_counter ring_amroth 0
	set_event_counter ring_hornburg 0
	set_event_counter ring_bree 0
	set_event_counter ring_thranduil 0
	set_event_counter ring_dale 0
	set_event_counter ring_erebor 0
	set_event_counter ring_mithlond 0
	set_event_counter ring_galadhon 0
	set_event_counter ring_thorin 0
	ui_flash_stop
end_monitor

;#########################One Ring Timer for good factions
declare_counter ring_timer2
declare_counter ring_spawned2
monitor_event FactionTurnStart not FactionReligion catholic
	and I_CompareCounter sauron_free = 0
	and FactionIsLocal
	and I_TurnNumber >= 15
	inc_counter ring_timer2 1
	ui_flash_stop
end_monitor

monitor_conditions I_CompareCounter ring_timer2 = 26
	and I_CompareCounter sauron_free = 0
	set_counter ring_timer2 1
	set_counter ring_spawned2 0
end_monitor

monitor_event FactionTurnStart not FactionReligion catholic
	and I_WorldwideAncillaryExists one_ring
	set_counter ring_timer2 1
end_monitor

;#########################Random city ring spawn for good factions
declare_counter ring_isengard
declare_counter ring_duneard
declare_counter ring_gram
declare_counter ring_carndum
declare_counter ring_moria
declare_counter ring_goblintown
declare_counter ring_umbar
declare_counter ring_hyarmen
declare_counter ring_mistrand
declare_counter ring_rhomen
declare_counter ring_guldur
declare_counter ring_jumped

monitor_event FactionTurnStart not FactionReligion catholic
	and I_CompareCounter ring_timer2 = 25
	and I_CompareCounter ring_spawned2 = 0
	and I_CompareCounter activate_baradtimer = 0
	and not I_WorldwideAncillaryExists one_ring
	and I_EventCounter ring_destroyed < 1
	if I_SettlementOwner Nan-Curunir = france
	and I_CompareCounter ring_spawned2 = 0

	and not I_LocalFaction milan

monitor_event CharacterTurnStart not FactionReligion catholic
	and I_CompareCounter ring_message = 0
	and FactionIsLocal
	and FactionwideAncillaryExists one_ring true
	historic_event one_ring_acquired_good event/acquired2.bik
	set_counter ring_message 1
	set_event_counter ring_isengard 0
	set_event_counter ring_duneard 0
	set_event_counter ring_gram 0
	set_event_counter ring_carndum 0
	set_event_counter ring_moria 0
	set_event_counter ring_goblintown 0
	set_event_counter ring_umbar 0
	set_event_counter ring_hyarmen 0
	set_event_counter ring_mistrand 0
	set_event_counter ring_rhomen 0
	set_event_counter ring_guldur 0
	ui_flash_stop
end_monitor

;#########################Ring will only be in Barad Dur if ring jumped 7 times from city to city
monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionType england
	and I_CompareCounter ring_jumped = 7
	and not I_WorldwideAncillaryExists one_ring
	and I_EventCounter ring_destroyed < 1
	and I_SettlementOwner Gorgoroth = england
	set_counter activate_baradtimer 1
	ui_flash_stop
terminate_monitor
end_monitor

monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionIsLocal
	and I_CompareCounter activate_baradtimer = 1
	and not I_WorldwideAncillaryExists one_ring
	and I_SettlementOwner Gorgoroth = england
	inc_counter barad_timer 1
end_monitor

monitor_conditions I_CompareCounter barad_timer = 5
	set_event_counter ring_isengard 0
	set_event_counter ring_duneard 0
	set_event_counter ring_gram 0
	set_event_counter ring_carndum 0
	set_event_counter ring_moria 0
	set_event_counter ring_goblintown 0
	set_event_counter ring_umbar 0
	set_event_counter ring_hyarmen 0
	set_event_counter ring_mistrand 0
	set_event_counter ring_rhomen 0
	set_event_counter ring_guldur 0
	set_event_counter ring_barad 1
	set_counter ring_message 0
	set_counter activate_baradtimer2 1
		add_events
		event	historic	ring_barad
	   	date	0
		position 290, 139
	 	end_add_events
		point_at_strat_position 290, 139
terminate_monitor
end_monitor

declare_counter barad_timer2
monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionIsLocal
	and I_CompareCounter activate_baradtimer2 = 1
	and not I_WorldwideAncillaryExists one_ring
	and I_EventCounter ring_destroyed < 1
	and I_SettlementOwner Gorgoroth = england
	inc_counter barad_timer2 1
end_monitor

declare_counter goodfaction_dislike
monitor_conditions I_CompareCounter barad_timer2 = 2
	increment_kings_purse england 3500
	spawn_army
	faction england
	character	Sauron, named character, age 22, x 289, y 137, portrait sauron, hero_ability SAURON, label sauron1
	traits Sauron 1, TrainAdmin 7 , NightBattleCapable 1
		unit	Sauron Elephants	soldiers 1 exp 6 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
		unit	Mordor Halberd		exp 3 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
		unit	Mordor Halberd		exp 3 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
		unit	Mordor Uruks		exp 5 armour 1 weapon_lvl 0
		unit	Mordor Uruks		exp 4 armour 1 weapon_lvl 0
		unit	Mordor Orcs Mercs	exp 2 armour 1 weapon_lvl 0
		unit	Mordor Orcs Mercs	exp 4 armour 1 weapon_lvl 0
		unit	2handed Orcs		exp 6 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
		unit	2handed Orcs		exp 4 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
		unit	Morannon Guard		exp 1 armour 1 weapon_lvl 0
		unit	Morannon Guard		exp 2 armour 1 weapon_lvl 0
		unit	Mordor Archers Mercs	exp 4 armour 1 weapon_lvl 0
		unit	Mordor Archers Mercs	exp 2 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
		unit	Mordor Archers Mercs	exp 3 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
		unit	Mordor Orcs Mercs	exp 4 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
		unit	Mordor Orcs Mercs	exp 5 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
		unit	Battle Trolls		exp 2 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
		unit	Battle Trolls		exp 3 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
	end
	console_command give_ancillary sauron1 one_ring
	console_command give_ancillary sauron1 sauron_mace
	console_command diplomatic_stance england sicily War
	console_command diplomatic_stance england milan War
	console_command diplomatic_stance england scotland War
	console_command diplomatic_stance england turks War
	console_command diplomatic_stance england egypt War
	console_command diplomatic_stance england mongols War
	console_command diplomatic_stance england moors War
	move_strat_camera 270, 152
	campaign_wait 1.3
	historic_event sauron_ai event/sauron.bik
	set_counter sauron_free 1
	set_counter goodfaction_dislike 1
	ui_flash_stop
	terminate_monitor
end_monitor

;#########################Good factions dislike you for not preventing Sauron from regaining the ring
monitor_event FactionTurnEnd FactionIsLocal
	and I_CompareCounter goodfaction_dislike = 1
	if I_LocalFaction sicily 
	set_faction_standing sicily milan -4
	set_faction_standing sicily turks -4
	set_faction_standing sicily egypt -4
	set_faction_standing sicily mongols -4
	set_faction_standing sicily moors -4
	set_faction_standing sicily scotland -4
	historic_event good_failed
	end_if
	if I_LocalFaction milan 
	set_faction_standing milan sicily -4
	set_faction_standing milan turks -4
	set_faction_standing milan egypt -4
	set_faction_standing milan mongols -4
	set_faction_standing milan moors -4
	set_faction_standing milan scotland -4
	historic_event good_failed
	end_if
	if I_LocalFaction turks
	set_faction_standing turks sicily -4
	set_faction_standing turks milan -4
	set_faction_standing turks egypt -4
	set_faction_standing turks mongols -4
	set_faction_standing turks moors -4
	set_faction_standing turks scotland -4
	historic_event good_failed
	end_if
	if I_LocalFaction egypt
	set_faction_standing egypt sicily -4
	set_faction_standing egypt milan -4
	set_faction_standing egypt turks -4
	set_faction_standing egypt mongols -4
	set_faction_standing egypt moors -4
	set_faction_standing egypt scotland -4
	historic_event good_failed
	end_if	
	if I_LocalFaction mongols
	set_faction_standing mongols sicily -4
	set_faction_standing mongols milan -4
	set_faction_standing mongols turks -4
	set_faction_standing mongols egypt -4
	set_faction_standing mongols moors -4
	set_faction_standing mongols scotland -4
	historic_event good_failed
	end_if	
	if I_LocalFaction moors
	set_faction_standing moors sicily -4
	set_faction_standing moors milan -4
	set_faction_standing moors turks -4
	set_faction_standing moors egypt -4
	set_faction_standing moors mongols -4
	set_faction_standing moors scotland -4
	historic_event good_failed
	end_if	
	if I_LocalFaction scotland
	set_faction_standing scotland sicily -4
	set_faction_standing scotland milan -4
	set_faction_standing scotland turks -4
	set_faction_standing scotland egypt -4
	set_faction_standing scotland mongols -4
	set_faction_standing scotland moors -4
	historic_event good_failed
	end_if
	terminate_monitor
end_monitor

;#####################################################################
;########### Baron Samedi/KK's Sauron & the One Ring script ##########
;#### Part 2: An evil faction has the ring some time in possession ###
;#####################################################################

;#########################Evil faction has got the ring
declare_counter ring_possession_evil
monitor_event CharacterTurnStart FactionReligion catholic
	and I_CompareCounter sauron_free = 0
	and CharacterIsLocal
	and AgentType = named character
	and HasAncType relic_ring
	inc_counter ring_possession_evil 1
	ui_flash_stop
end_monitor

;#########################Evil Player:	Sauron hears of ring rumors & demands delivering of ring
declare_counter deliver_ring_evil
monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionReligion catholic
	and not FactionType england
	and not IsFactionAIControlled
	and I_CompareCounter ring_possession_evil = 6
	and I_NumberOfSettlements england > 0
	historic_event deliver_ring
	set_counter deliver_ring_evil 1
	point_at_strat_position 269, 151
	move_strat_camera 269, 151
	terminate_monitor
end_monitor

;#########################Mordor Player: Advisor requests to deliver the ring
monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionReligion catholic
	and FactionType england
	and not IsFactionAIControlled
	and I_CompareCounter ring_possession_evil = 9
	and I_NumberOfSettlements england > 0
	historic_event deliver_ring2
	set_counter deliver_ring_evil 1
	terminate_monitor
end_monitor

;#########################Evil Player (except Mordor):	bring One Ring to the Black Gate
declare_counter remove_ring
monitor_event CharacterTurnStart CharacterIsLocal
		and FactionReligion catholic
		and not I_LocalFaction england
		and AgentType = named character
		and HasAncType relic_ring
		and IsRegionOneOf Udun_Province
		and I_SettlementOwner Gorgoroth = england
		and I_SettlementOwner Udun = england
		and I_CompareCounter deliver_ring_evil = 1
		
	if I_LocalFaction france 
	add_money france 10000
	console_command diplomatic_stance france england Allied
	set_faction_standing france england 9.9
	set_faction_standing france papal_states 9.9
	increment_kings_purse england 2500
	add_money england 10000
	spawn_army 
	faction england
	character	Sauron, named character, age 22, x 289, y 137, portrait sauron, hero_ability SAURON, label sauron1
	traits Sauron 1, TrainAdmin 7 , NightBattleCapable 1
		unit	Sauron Elephants	soldiers 1 exp 6 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
		unit	Mordor Halberd		exp 3 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
		unit	Mordor Halberd		exp 3 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
		unit	Mordor Uruks		exp 5 armour 1 weapon_lvl 0
		unit	Mordor Uruks		exp 4 armour 1 weapon_lvl 0
		unit	Mordor Orcs Mercs	exp 2 armour 1 weapon_lvl 0
		unit	Mordor Orcs Mercs	exp 4 armour 1 weapon_lvl 0
		unit	2handed Orcs		exp 6 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
		unit	2handed Orcs		exp 4 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
		unit	Morannon Guard		exp 1 armour 1 weapon_lvl 0
		unit	Morannon Guard		exp 2 armour 1 weapon_lvl 0
		unit	Mordor Archers Mercs	exp 4 armour 1 weapon_lvl 0
		unit	Mordor Archers Mercs	exp 2 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
		unit	Mordor Archers Mercs	exp 3 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
		unit	Mordor Orcs Mercs	exp 4 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
		unit	Mordor Orcs Mercs	exp 5 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
		unit	Battle Trolls		exp 2 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
		unit	Battle Trolls		exp 3 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
	end
	console_command give_ancillary sauron1 one_ring
	console_command give_ancillary sauron1 sauron_mace
	console_command diplomatic_stance england sicily War
	console_command diplomatic_stance england milan War
	console_command diplomatic_stance england scotland War
	console_command diplomatic_stance england turks War
	console_command diplomatic_stance england egypt War
	console_command diplomatic_stance england mongols War
	console_command diplomatic_stance england moors War
	move_strat_camera 289, 137
	campaign_wait 1.3
	historic_event sauron event/sauron.bik
	set_counter sauron_free 1
	set_counter remove_ring 1
	ui_flash_stop
	end_if
	
	if I_LocalFaction spain 
	add_money spain 10000
	console_command diplomatic_stance spain england Allied
	set_faction_standing spain england 9.9
	set_faction_standing spain papal_states 9.9

	add_money england 10000

;#########################Mordor Player brings One Ring to Barad Dur 

monitor_event CharacterTurnStart CharacterIsLocal
		and I_LocalFaction england
		and AgentType = named character
		and HasAncType relic_ring
		and IsRegionOneOf Gorgoroth_Province
		and I_CompareCounter deliver_ring_evil = 1

		spawn_army 
		faction england
		character	Sauron, named character, age 22, x 289, y 137, portrait sauron, hero_ability SAURON, label sauron_player1, direction S
		traits Sauron 1, TrainAdmin 7 , NightBattleCapable 1 , Slow 1
		unit	Sauron Elephants	soldiers 1 exp 6 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
		unit	Mordor Halberd		exp 1 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
		unit	Mordor Halberd		exp 3 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
		unit	Mordor Uruks		exp 2 armour 1 weapon_lvl 0
		unit	Mordor Uruks		exp 4 armour 1 weapon_lvl 0
		unit	Mordor Orcs		exp 2 armour 1 weapon_lvl 0
		unit	Mordor Orcs		exp 4 armour 1 weapon_lvl 0
		unit	2handed Orcs		exp 6 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
		unit	2handed Orcs		exp 4 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
		unit	Morannon Guard		exp 1 armour 1 weapon_lvl 0
		unit	Morannon Guard		exp 2 armour 1 weapon_lvl 0
		unit	Mordor Archers		exp 4 armour 1 weapon_lvl 0
		unit	Mordor Archers		exp 3 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
		unit	Battle Trolls		exp 2 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
		end

	console_command give_ancillary sauron_player1 sauron_mace
	console_command give_ancillary sauron_player1 one_ring
	console_command diplomatic_stance england sicily War
	console_command diplomatic_stance england milan War
	console_command diplomatic_stance england scotland War
	console_command diplomatic_stance england turks War
	console_command diplomatic_stance england egypt War
	console_command diplomatic_stance england mongols War
	console_command diplomatic_stance england moors War
	add_money england 30000
	set_faction_standing england papal_states 9.9
	move_strat_camera 289, 137
	campaign_wait 1.3
	historic_event sauron event/sauron.bik
	set_counter sauron_free 1
	set_counter remove_ring 1
	ui_flash_stop
	terminate_monitor
end_monitor

;#########################Remove the ring from the general once given to Sauron
monitor_event CharacterSelected CharacterIsLocal
		and I_CompareCounter remove_ring = 1
		and AgentType = named character
		and HasAncType relic_ring	
		console_command give_trait this Loyal 5
		console_command give_trait this Brave 5
		console_command remove_ancillary this one_ring
		console_command remove_ancillary this gollum
		historic_event ring_given
		set_counter ring_possession_evil 0
	terminate_monitor
end_monitor

;#########################Sauron lost
monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionType england
	and I_CompareCounter sauron_free = 1
	and not I_WorldwideAncillaryExists sauron_mace
	increment_kings_purse england -2500
	historic_event sauronlost event/sauronlost.bik
	set_counter sauron_free 0
	terminate_monitor
end_monitor

;#########################Evil human player faction fails to give the ring within 25 turns
monitor_event FactionTurnStart not IsFactionAIControlled
	and I_CompareCounter ring_possession_evil > 25
	and I_CompareCounter sauron_free = 0
    if I_LocalFaction england 
	set_faction_standing england papal_states -4
	historic_event ring_failed
	end_if
    if I_LocalFaction france 
	console_command diplomatic_stance france england War
	console_command diplomatic_stance france spain War
	console_command diplomatic_stance france venice War
	console_command diplomatic_stance france hre War
	console_command diplomatic_stance france portugal War
	console_command diplomatic_stance france papal_states War
	set_faction_standing france england -9.9
	set_faction_standing france spain -9.9
	set_faction_standing france venice -9.9
	set_faction_standing france hre -9.9
	set_faction_standing france portugal -9.9
	set_faction_standing france papal_states -9.9
	historic_event ring_failed 
	end_if
    if I_LocalFaction spain 
	console_command diplomatic_stance spain england War
	console_command diplomatic_stance spain france War
	console_command diplomatic_stance spain venice War
	console_command diplomatic_stance spain hre War
	console_command diplomatic_stance spain portugal War
	console_command diplomatic_stance spain papal_states War
	set_faction_standing spain england -9.9
	set_faction_standing spain france -9.9
	set_faction_standing spain venice -9.9
	set_faction_standing spain hre -9.9
	set_faction_standing spain portugal -9.9
	set_faction_standing spain papal_states -9.9
	historic_event ring_failed 
	end_if
    if I_LocalFaction venice 
	console_command diplomatic_stance venice england War
	console_command diplomatic_stance venice france War
	console_command diplomatic_stance venice spain War
	console_command diplomatic_stance venice hre War
	console_command diplomatic_stance venice portugal War
	console_command diplomatic_stance venice papal_states War
	set_faction_standing venice england -9.9
	set_faction_standing venice france -9.9
	set_faction_standing venice spain -9.9
	set_faction_standing venice hre -9.9
	set_faction_standing venice portugal -9.9
	set_faction_standing venice papal_states -9.9	
	historic_event ring_failed 
	end_if
    if I_LocalFaction hre 
	console_command diplomatic_stance hre england War
	console_command diplomatic_stance hre france War
	console_command diplomatic_stance hre spain War
	console_command diplomatic_stance hre venice War
	console_command diplomatic_stance hre portugal War
	console_command diplomatic_stance hre papal_states War
	set_faction_standing hre england -9.9
	set_faction_standing hre france -9.9
	set_faction_standing hre spain -9.9
	set_faction_standing hre venice -9.9
	set_faction_standing hre portugal -9.9
	set_faction_standing hre papal_states -9.9		
	historic_event ring_failed 
	end_if	
    if I_LocalFaction portugal 
	console_command diplomatic_stance portugal england War
	console_command diplomatic_stance portugal france War
	console_command diplomatic_stance portugal spain War
	console_command diplomatic_stance portugal venice War
	console_command diplomatic_stance portugal hre War
	console_command diplomatic_stance portugal papal_states War
	set_faction_standing portugal england -9.9
	set_faction_standing portugal france -9.9
	set_faction_standing portugal spain -9.9
	set_faction_standing portugal venice -9.9
	set_faction_standing portugal hre -9.9
	set_faction_standing portugal papal_states -9.9		
	historic_event ring_failed 
	end_if		
	terminate_monitor
end_monitor

;#########################Pope Sauron
declare_counter go_pope

monitor_event PreFactionTurnStart FactionType papal_states
	create_unit Sauron, Mordor Orcs Mercs, num 3, exp 6, arm 0, wep 
terminate_monitor
end_monitor

monitor_event PreFactionTurnStart FactionType papal_states
	and I_TurnNumber >= 46
	and RandomPercent <= 8
	spawn_character papal_states, The_Dark_Lord, priest, age 18, x 397, y 339
	console_command give_trait The_Dark_Lord NaturalPriestSkill 2
	console_command give_trait The_Dark_Lord StrongFaith 4
	console_command give_trait The_Dark_Lord PriestLevel 2
	set_counter go_pope 1
terminate_monitor
end_monitor

monitor_event PreFactionTurnStart FactionType papal_states
	and I_CompareCounter go_pope > 0
	and not I_CharacterExists The_Dark_Lord
	spawn_character papal_states, The_Dark_Lord, priest, age 18, x 397, y 339
	console_command give_trait The_Dark_Lord NaturalPriestSkill 2
	console_command give_trait The_Dark_Lord StrongFaith 4
	console_command give_trait The_Dark_Lord PriestLevel 2
end_monitor

monitor_event PreFactionTurnStart FactionType papal_states
	and Treasury > 15000
	add_money papal_states -10000
end_monitor

;#####################################################################
;############## Baron Samedi's The White Council script ##############
;#### Part 3: A good faction has the ring some time in possession ####
;#####################################################################
;#########################Good human player faction has got the ring
declare_counter ring_possession_good
monitor_event CharacterTurnStart not FactionReligion catholic
	and I_CompareCounter sauron_free = 0
	and CharacterIsLocal
	and AgentType = named character
	and HasAncType relic_ring
	inc_counter ring_possession_good 1
	ui_flash_stop
end_monitor

;#########################Good human player faction holds the ring for 10 turns = White Council Event
declare_counter council_alternative
monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionIsLocal
	and I_CompareCounter ring_possession_good > 9
	if I_SettlementOwner Imladris = egypt
	and I_CompareCounter council_alternative = 0
	historic_event council_event true	
	point_at_strat_position 185, 249
	move_strat_camera 185, 250
	zoom_strat_camera 0.5
	set_counter council_alternative 1
	end_if
	if I_SettlementOwner Mithlond = egypt
	and I_CompareCounter council_alternative = 0
	historic_event council_event2 true	
	point_at_strat_position 60, 252
	move_strat_camera 60, 252
	zoom_strat_camera 0.5
	set_counter council_alternative 1
	end_if
	if I_SettlementOwner Celebrant = mongols
	and I_CompareCounter council_alternative = 0
	historic_event council_event3 true	
	point_at_strat_position 217, 210
	move_strat_camera 217, 210
	zoom_strat_camera 0.5
	set_counter council_alternative 1
	end_if		
	terminate_monitor
end_monitor

;#########################Accept council meeting Imladris
declare_counter start_council
declare_counter council_fail
monitor_conditions I_EventCounter council_event_accepted = 1
	if I_LocalFaction sicily 
	set_faction_standing sicily egypt 9.9
	console_command diplomatic_stance sicily egypt Allied
	historic_event council_accept
	set_counter start_council 1
	set_counter council_fail 0
	ui_flash_stop
	end_if
	if I_LocalFaction milan 
	set_faction_standing milan egypt 9.9
	console_command diplomatic_stance milan egypt Allied
	historic_event council_accept
	set_counter start_council 1
	set_counter council_fail 0
	ui_flash_stop
	end_if
	if I_LocalFaction turks
	set_faction_standing turks egypt 9.9
	console_command diplomatic_stance turks egypt Allied
	historic_event council_accept
	set_counter start_council 1
	set_counter council_fail 0
	ui_flash_stop
	end_if
	if I_LocalFaction mongols
	set_faction_standing mongols egypt 9.9
	console_command diplomatic_stance mongols egypt Allied
	historic_event council_accept
	set_counter start_council 1
	set_counter council_fail 0
	ui_flash_stop
	end_if	
	if I_LocalFaction moors
	set_faction_standing moors egypt 9.9
	console_command diplomatic_stance moors egypt Allied
	historic_event council_accept	
	set_counter start_council 1
	set_counter council_fail 0
	ui_flash_stop
	end_if	
	if I_LocalFaction scotland
	set_faction_standing scotland egypt 9.9
	console_command diplomatic_stance scotland egypt Allied
	historic_event council_accept
	set_counter start_council 1
	set_counter council_fail 0
	ui_flash_stop
	end_if
	if I_LocalFaction egypt
	historic_event council_accept
	set_counter start_council 1
	set_counter council_fail 0
	ui_flash_stop
	end_if
	terminate_monitor
end_monitor	

;#########################Accept council meeting Mithlond
declare_counter start_council2

	if I_LocalFaction sicily

end_monitor	

;#########################Decline council meeting Imladris
monitor_conditions I_EventCounter council_event_declined = 1
	if I_LocalFaction sicily 
	set_faction_standing sicily milan -4
	set_faction_standing sicily turks -4
	set_faction_standing sicily egypt -4
	set_faction_standing sicily mongols -4
	set_faction_standing sicily moors -4
	set_faction_standing sicily scotland -4
	historic_event council_decline
	set_counter council_fail 1
	ui_flash_stop
	end_if
	if I_LocalFaction milan 
	set_faction_standing milan sicily -4
	set_faction_standing milan turks -4
	set_faction_standing milan egypt -4
	set_faction_standing milan mongols -4
	set_faction_standing milan moors -4
	set_faction_standing milan scotland -4
	historic_event council_decline
	set_counter council_fail 1
	ui_flash_stop
	end_if
	if I_LocalFaction turks
	set_faction_standing turks sicily -4
	set_faction_standing turks milan -4
	set_faction_standing turks egypt -4
	set_faction_standing turks mongols -4
	set_faction_standing turks moors -4
	set_faction_standing turks scotland -4
	historic_event council_decline
	set_counter council_fail 1
	ui_flash_stop
	end_if
	if I_LocalFaction egypt
	set_faction_standing egypt sicily -4
	set_faction_standing egypt milan -4
	set_faction_standing egypt turks -4
	set_faction_standing egypt mongols -4
	set_faction_standing egypt moors -4
	set_faction_standing egypt scotland -4
	historic_event council_decline
	set_counter council_fail 1
	ui_flash_stop
	end_if	
	if I_LocalFaction mongols
	set_faction_standing mongols sicily -4
	set_faction_standing mongols milan -4
	set_faction_standing mongols turks -4
	set_faction_standing mongols egypt -4
	set_faction_standing mongols moors -4
	set_faction_standing mongols scotland -4
	historic_event council_decline
	set_counter council_fail 1
	ui_flash_stop
	end_if	
	if I_LocalFaction moors
	set_faction_standing moors sicily -4
	set_faction_standing moors milan -4
	set_faction_standing moors turks -4
	set_faction_standing moors egypt -4
	set_faction_standing moors mongols -4
	set_faction_standing moors scotland -4
	historic_event council_decline
	set_counter council_fail 1
	ui_flash_stop
	end_if	
	if I_LocalFaction scotland
	set_faction_standing scotland sicily -4
	set_faction_standing scotland milan -4
	set_faction_standing scotland turks -4
	set_faction_standing scotland egypt -4
	set_faction_standing scotland mongols -4
	set_faction_standing scotland moors -4
	historic_event council_decline
	set_counter council_fail 1
	ui_flash_stop
	end_if
	terminate_monitor
end_monitor

;#########################Time-limit to attend the council meeting Imladris
declare_counter council_timer
monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionIsLocal
	and I_CompareCounter start_council = 1
	inc_counter council_timer 1
end_monitor	

;#########################Time-limit to attend the council meeting Mithlond
declare_counter council_timer2
monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionIsLocal
	and I_CompareCounter start_council2 = 1
	inc_counter council_timer2 1
end_monitor	

;#########################Time-limit to attend the council meeting Caras Galadhon
declare_counter council_timer3
monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionIsLocal
	and I_CompareCounter start_council3 = 1
	inc_counter council_timer3 1
end_monitor	

;#########################Attend the Imladris council meeting in time-limit 25 turns
declare_counter ring_choice
monitor_event CharacterTurnStart FactionIsLocal
	and I_CompareCounter start_council = 1
	and I_CompareCounter council_timer < 26
	and I_SettlementOwner Imladris = egypt
	and AgentType = named character
	and HasAncType relic_ring
	and IsRegionOneOf Imladris_Province
	and TimeInRegion > 1
	historic_event council_start event/council.bik
	set_counter start_council 0
	set_counter ring_choice 1
	set_counter council_fail 0
	ui_flash_stop
	terminate_monitor
end_monitor	

;#########################Attend the Mithlond council meeting in time-limit 25 turns
monitor_event CharacterTurnStart FactionIsLocal
	and I_CompareCounter start_council2 = 1
	and I_CompareCounter council_timer2 < 26
	and I_SettlementOwner Mithlond = egypt
	and AgentType = named character
	and HasAncType relic_ring
	and IsRegionOneOf Mithlond_Province
	and TimeInRegion > 1
	historic_event council_start event/council.bik
	set_counter start_council2 0
	set_counter ring_choice 1
	set_counter council_fail 0
	ui_flash_stop
	terminate_monitor
end_monitor	

;#########################Attend the Caras Galadhon council meeting in time-limit 25 turns
monitor_event CharacterTurnStart FactionIsLocal
	and I_CompareCounter start_council3 = 1
	and I_CompareCounter council_timer3 < 26
	and I_SettlementOwner Celebrant = mongols
	and AgentType = named character
	and HasAncType relic_ring
	and IsRegionOneOf Celebrant_Province
	and TimeInRegion > 1
	historic_event council_start event/council.bik
	set_counter start_council3 0
	set_counter ring_choice 1
	set_counter council_fail 0
	ui_flash_stop
	terminate_monitor
end_monitor	

;#########################Don't attend the Imladris council meeting in time
monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionIsLocal
	and I_CompareCounter start_council = 1
	and I_CompareCounter council_timer > 25
	if I_LocalFaction sicily 
	set_faction_standing sicily milan -4
	set_faction_standing sicily turks -4
	set_faction_standing sicily egypt -4
	set_faction_standing sicily mongols -4
	set_faction_standing sicily moors -4
	set_faction_standing sicily scotland -4
	historic_event council_late
	set_counter council_fail 1
	ui_flash_stop
	end_if
	if I_LocalFaction milan 
	set_faction_standing milan sicily -4
	set_faction_standing milan turks -4
	set_faction_standing milan egypt -4
	set_faction_standing milan mongols -4
	set_faction_standing milan moors -4
	set_faction_standing milan scotland -4
	historic_event council_late
	set_counter council_fail 1
	ui_flash_stop
	end_if
	if I_LocalFaction turks
	set_faction_standing turks sicily -4
	set_faction_standing turks milan -4
	set_faction_standing turks egypt -4
	set_faction_standing turks mongols -4
	set_faction_standing turks moors -4
	set_faction_standing turks scotland -4
	historic_event council_late
	set_counter council_fail 1
	ui_flash_stop
	end_if
	if I_LocalFaction egypt
	set_faction_standing egypt sicily -4
	set_faction_standing egypt milan -4
	set_faction_standing egypt turks -4
	set_faction_standing egypt mongols -4
	set_faction_standing egypt moors -4
	set_faction_standing egypt scotland -4
	historic_event council_late
	set_counter council_fail 1
	ui_flash_stop
	end_if	
	if I_LocalFaction mongols
	set_faction_standing mongols sicily -4
	set_faction_standing mongols milan -4
	set_faction_standing mongols turks -4
	set_faction_standing mongols egypt -4
	set_faction_standing mongols moors -4
	set_faction_standing mongols scotland -4
	historic_event council_late
	set_counter council_fail 1
	ui_flash_stop
	end_if	
	if I_LocalFaction moors
	set_faction_standing moors sicily -4
	set_faction_standing moors milan -4
	set_faction_standing moors turks -4
	set_faction_standing moors egypt -4
	set_faction_standing moors mongols -4
	set_faction_standing moors scotland -4
	historic_event council_late
	set_counter council_fail 1
	ui_flash_stop
	end_if	
	if I_LocalFaction scotland
	set_faction_standing scotland sicily -4
	set_faction_standing scotland milan -4
	set_faction_standing scotland turks -4
	set_faction_standing scotland egypt -4
	set_faction_standing scotland mongols -4
	set_faction_standing scotland moors -4
	historic_event council_late
	set_counter council_fail 1
	ui_flash_stop
	end_if		
	terminate_monitor
end_monitor	

;#########################Don't attend the Mithlond council meeting in time
monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionIsLocal
	and I_CompareCounter start_council2 = 1
	and I_CompareCounter council_timer2 > 25
	if I_LocalFaction sicily 
	set_faction_standing sicily milan -4
	set_faction_standing sicily turks -4
	set_faction_standing sicily egypt -4
	set_faction_standing sicily mongols -4
	set_faction_standing sicily moors -4
	set_faction_standing sicily scotland -4
	historic_event council_late
	set_counter council_fail 1
	ui_flash_stop
	end_if
	if I_LocalFaction milan 
	set_faction_standing milan sicily -4
	set_faction_standing milan turks -4
	set_faction_standing milan egypt -4
	set_faction_standing milan mongols -4
	set_faction_standing milan moors -4
	set_faction_standing milan scotland -4
	historic_event council_late
	set_counter council_fail 1
	ui_flash_stop
	end_if
	if I_LocalFaction turks
	set_faction_standing turks sicily -4
	set_faction_standing turks milan -4
	set_faction_standing turks egypt -4
	set_faction_standing turks mongols -4
	set_faction_standing turks moors -4
	set_faction_standing turks scotland -4
	historic_event council_late
	set_counter council_fail 1
	ui_flash_stop
	end_if
	if I_LocalFaction egypt
	set_faction_standing egypt sicily -4
	set_faction_standing egypt milan -4
	set_faction_standing egypt turks -4
	set_faction_standing egypt mongols -4
	set_faction_standing egypt moors -4
	set_faction_standing egypt scotland -4
	historic_event council_late
	set_counter council_fail 1
	ui_flash_stop
	end_if	
	if I_LocalFaction mongols
	set_faction_standing mongols sicily -4
	set_faction_standing mongols milan -4
	set_faction_standing mongols turks -4
	set_faction_standing mongols egypt -4
	set_faction_standing mongols moors -4
	set_faction_standing mongols scotland -4
	historic_event council_late
	set_counter council_fail 1
	ui_flash_stop
	end_if	
	if I_LocalFaction moors
	set_faction_standing moors sicily -4
	set_faction_standing moors milan -4
	set_faction_standing moors turks -4
	set_faction_standing moors egypt -4
	set_faction_standing moors mongols -4
	set_faction_standing moors scotland -4
	historic_event council_late
	set_counter council_fail 1
	ui_flash_stop
	end_if	
	if I_LocalFaction scotland
	set_faction_standing scotland sicily -4
	set_faction_standing scotland milan -4
	set_faction_standing scotland turks -4
	set_faction_standing scotland egypt -4
	set_faction_standing scotland mongols -4
	set_faction_standing scotland moors -4
	historic_event council_late
	set_counter council_fail 1
	ui_flash_stop
	end_if		
	terminate_monitor
end_monitor	

;#########################Don't attend the Caras Galadhon council meeting in time
monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionIsLocal
	and I_CompareCounter start_council3 = 1
	and I_CompareCounter council_timer3 > 25
	if I_LocalFaction sicily 
	set_faction_standing sicily milan -4
	set_faction_standing sicily turks -4
	set_faction_standing sicily egypt -4
	set_faction_standing sicily mongols -4
	set_faction_standing sicily moors -4
	set_faction_standing sicily scotland -4
	historic_event council_late
	set_counter council_fail 1
	ui_flash_stop
	end_if
	if I_LocalFaction milan 
	set_faction_standing milan sicily -4
	set_faction_standing milan turks -4
	set_faction_standing milan egypt -4
	set_faction_standing milan mongols -4
	set_faction_standing milan moors -4
	set_faction_standing milan scotland -4
	historic_event council_late
	set_counter council_fail 1
	ui_flash_stop
	end_if
	if I_LocalFaction turks
	set_faction_standing turks sicily -4
	set_faction_standing turks milan -4
	set_faction_standing turks egypt -4
	set_faction_standing turks mongols -4
	set_faction_standing turks moors -4
	set_faction_standing turks scotland -4
	historic_event council_late
	set_counter council_fail 1
	ui_flash_stop
	end_if
	if I_LocalFaction egypt
	set_faction_standing egypt sicily -4
	set_faction_standing egypt milan -4
	set_faction_standing egypt turks -4
	set_faction_standing egypt mongols -4
	set_faction_standing egypt moors -4
	set_faction_standing egypt scotland -4
	historic_event council_late
	set_counter council_fail 1
	ui_flash_stop
	end_if	
	if I_LocalFaction mongols
	set_faction_standing mongols sicily -4
	set_faction_standing mongols milan -4
	set_faction_standing mongols turks -4
	set_faction_standing mongols egypt -4
	set_faction_standing mongols moors -4
	set_faction_standing mongols scotland -4
	historic_event council_late
	set_counter council_fail 1
	ui_flash_stop
	end_if	
	if I_LocalFaction moors
	set_faction_standing moors sicily -4
	set_faction_standing moors milan -4
	set_faction_standing moors turks -4
	set_faction_standing moors egypt -4
	set_faction_standing moors mongols -4
	set_faction_standing moors scotland -4
	historic_event council_late
	set_counter council_fail 1
	ui_flash_stop
	end_if	
	if I_LocalFaction scotland
	set_faction_standing scotland sicily -4
	set_faction_standing scotland milan -4
	set_faction_standing scotland turks -4
	set_faction_standing scotland egypt -4
	set_faction_standing scotland mongols -4
	set_faction_standing scotland moors -4
	historic_event council_late
	set_counter council_fail 1
	ui_flash_stop
	end_if		
	terminate_monitor
end_monitor	

;#########################Task to destroy the ring
monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionIsLocal
	and I_CompareCounter ring_choice = 1
	historic_event ring_choice true
	terminate_monitor
end_monitor	

;#########################Accept task to destroy the ring
monitor_conditions I_EventCounter ring_choice_accepted = 1
	if I_LocalFaction sicily 
	add_money sicily 10000
	increment_kings_purse sicily 500
	historic_event ring_accept
	point_at_strat_position 287, 134
	move_strat_camera 287, 134
	set_counter council_fail 0
	end_if
	if I_LocalFaction milan 
	add_money milan 10000
	increment_kings_purse milan 500
	historic_event ring_accept
	point_at_strat_position 287, 134
	move_strat_camera 287, 134
	set_counter council_fail 0
	end_if
	if I_LocalFaction turks
	add_money turks 10000
	increment_kings_purse turks 500
	historic_event ring_accept
	point_at_strat_position 287, 134
	move_strat_camera 287, 134
	set_counter council_fail 0
	end_if
	if I_LocalFaction egypt
	add_money egypt 10000
	increment_kings_purse egypt 500
	historic_event ring_accept
	point_at_strat_position 287, 134
	move_strat_camera 287, 134
	set_counter council_fail 0
	end_if	
	if I_LocalFaction mongols
	add_money mongols 10000
	increment_kings_purse mongols 500
	historic_event ring_accept
	point_at_strat_position 287, 134
	move_strat_camera 287, 134
	set_counter council_fail 0
	end_if	
	if I_LocalFaction moors
	add_money moors 10000
	increment_kings_purse moors 500	
	historic_event ring_accept
	point_at_strat_position 287, 134
	move_strat_camera 287, 134
	set_counter council_fail 0
	end_if	
	if I_LocalFaction scotland
	add_money scotland 10000
	increment_kings_purse scotland 500
	historic_event ring_accept
	point_at_strat_position 287, 134
	move_strat_camera 287, 134
	set_counter council_fail 0
	end_if		
	terminate_monitor
end_monitor	

;#########################Decline task to destroy the ring
declare_counter transfer_ring
monitor_conditions I_EventCounter ring_choice_declined = 1
	if I_LocalFaction sicily 
	set_faction_standing sicily milan -4
	set_faction_standing sicily turks -4
	set_faction_standing sicily egypt -4
	set_faction_standing sicily mongols -4
	set_faction_standing sicily moors -4
	set_faction_standing sicily scotland -4
	historic_event ring_decline
	set_counter transfer_ring 1
	end_if
	if I_LocalFaction milan 
	set_faction_standing milan sicily -4
	set_faction_standing milan turks -4
	set_faction_standing milan egypt -4
	set_faction_standing milan mongols -4
	set_faction_standing milan moors -4
	set_faction_standing milan scotland -4
	historic_event ring_decline
	set_counter transfer_ring 1
	end_if
	if I_LocalFaction turks
	set_faction_standing turks sicily -4
	set_faction_standing turks milan -4
	set_faction_standing turks egypt -4
	set_faction_standing turks mongols -4
	set_faction_standing turks moors -4
	set_faction_standing turks scotland -4
	historic_event ring_decline
	set_counter transfer_ring 1
	end_if
	if I_LocalFaction egypt
	set_faction_standing egypt sicily -4
	set_faction_standing egypt milan -4
	set_faction_standing egypt turks -4
	set_faction_standing egypt mongols -4
	set_faction_standing egypt moors -4
	set_faction_standing egypt scotland -4
	historic_event ring_decline
	set_counter transfer_ring 1
	end_if	
	if I_LocalFaction mongols
	set_faction_standing mongols sicily -4
	set_faction_standing mongols milan -4
	set_faction_standing mongols turks -4
	set_faction_standing mongols egypt -4
	set_faction_standing mongols moors -4
	set_faction_standing mongols scotland -4
	historic_event ring_decline
	set_counter transfer_ring 1
	end_if	
	if I_LocalFaction moors
	set_faction_standing moors sicily -4
	set_faction_standing moors milan -4
	set_faction_standing moors turks -4
	set_faction_standing moors egypt -4
	set_faction_standing moors mongols -4
	set_faction_standing moors scotland -4
	historic_event ring_decline
	set_counter transfer_ring 1
	end_if	
	if I_LocalFaction scotland
	set_faction_standing scotland sicily -4
	set_faction_standing scotland milan -4
	set_faction_standing scotland turks -4
	set_faction_standing scotland egypt -4
	set_faction_standing scotland mongols -4
	set_faction_standing scotland moors -4
	historic_event ring_decline
	set_counter transfer_ring 1
	end_if		
	terminate_monitor
end_monitor

;#########################Remove ring from ringbearer after declining the task
monitor_event CharacterSelected CharacterIsLocal
	and I_CompareCounter transfer_ring = 1
	and AgentType = named character
	and HasAncType relic_ring
	and not IsRegionOneOf Gorgoroth_Province
	console_command remove_ancillary this one_ring
	console_command remove_ancillary this gollum
	historic_event ring_transfer
	set_counter transfer_ring 0
end_monitor

;#########################Remove ring from ringbearer if not attending the council or if too late
monitor_event CharacterSelected CharacterIsLocal
	and I_CompareCounter council_fail = 1
	and AgentType = named character
	and HasAncType relic_ring
	and RandomPercent < 11
	console_command remove_ancillary this one_ring
	console_command remove_ancillary this gollum
	historic_event ring_transfer2
	set_counter council_fail 0
end_monitor

;#########################Chance Gollum steals ring from ringbearer
monitor_event CharacterSelected CharacterIsLocal
	and not FactionReligion catholic
	and AgentType = named character
	and HasAncType relic_ring
	and HasAncType gollum
	and not IsRegionOneOf Gorgoroth_Province
	and RandomPercent < 2
	console_command remove_ancillary this one_ring
	console_command remove_ancillary this gollum
	historic_event ring_stolen event/ring_stolen.bik
	set_counter ring_possession_evil 0
	set_counter ring_possession_good 0
	set_counter deliver_ring_evil 0
end_monitor

;#########################Chance someone else steals ring from ringbearer
monitor_event CharacterSelected CharacterIsLocal
	and AgentType = named character
	and HasAncType relic_ring
	and not HasAncType gollum
	and not IsRegionOneOf Gorgoroth_Province
	and not IsRegionOneOf Cirith_Province
	and not IsRegionOneOf Gorgoroth-South_Province
	and not IsRegionOneOf Orc_Province
	and not IsRegionOneOf Udun_Province
	and not IsRegionOneOf Morgul-Vale_Province
	and not IsRegionOneOf Morgai_Province
	and RandomPercent < 2
	console_command remove_ancillary this one_ring
	historic_event ring_stolen2
	set_counter ring_possession_evil 0
	set_counter ring_possession_good 0
	set_counter deliver_ring_evil 0
end_monitor

;#####################################################################
;########## Baron Samedi/KK's Sauron & the One Ring script ###########
;####### Part 4: The destruction of the ring by a good faction #######
;#####################################################################

;#########################Step 1
declare_counter mordor_died
monitor_event CharacterTurnStart CharacterIsLocal
		and AgentType = named character
		and not FactionReligion catholic
		and I_EventCounter ring_choice_accepted = 1
		and I_CompareCounter council_fail < 1
		and HasAncType relic_ring
		and IsRegionOneOf Gorgoroth_Province
		and TimeInRegion > 5

		set_event_counter ring_isengard 0
		set_event_counter ring_duneard 0
		set_event_counter ring_gram 0
		set_event_counter ring_carndum 0
		set_event_counter ring_moria 0
		set_event_counter ring_goblintown 0
		set_event_counter ring_umbar 0
		set_event_counter ring_hyarmen 0
		set_event_counter ring_mistrand 0
		set_event_counter ring_rhomen 0
		set_event_counter ring_guldur 0
		set_event_counter ring_barad 0

		set_counter sauron_free 0
		set_counter mordor_died 1
		set_counter go_pope 0

		console_command surrender_regions england
		kill_character The_Dark_Lord
		kill_character family_mordor1

		campaign_wait 10.0

		historic_event mount_doom event/ring_destroyed.bik

terminate_monitor
end_monitor	

;#########################Step 2
monitor_event CharacterTurnStart CharacterIsLocal
		and AgentType = named character
		and not FactionReligion catholic
		and I_EventCounter ring_choice_accepted = 1
		and I_CompareCounter council_fail < 1
		and HasAncType relic_ring
		and IsRegionOneOf Gorgoroth_Province
		and TimeInRegion > 5

		campaign_wait 30.0

		destroy_units england Orc Band
		destroy_units england Mordor Orcs
		destroy_units england 2handed Orcs
		destroy_units england Morannon Guard
		destroy_units england Mordor Uruks
		destroy_units england Mordor Halberd
		destroy_units england Mordor Scouts
		destroy_units england Mordor Archers
		destroy_units england Uruk Archers
		destroy_units england Mountain Trolls
		destroy_units england Battle Trolls
		destroy_units england Dismounted Nazgul
		destroy_units england Mounted Nazgul
		destroy_units england Dismounted Numenorians
		destroy_units england Black Numenorians
		destroy_units england Uruk Bodyguards
		destroy_units england Mordor Ballista
		destroy_units england Orcs Catapult
		destroy_units england Mordor Catapult
		destroy_units england Sauron Elephants
		destroy_units england Mordor Archers Mercs
		destroy_units england Mordor Orcs Mercs
		destroy_units england Black Spiders Adult
		destroy_units england Mordor Orcs Illusion
		destroy_units england Mordor Orcs Invasion
		destroy_units england Mordor Archers Invasion
		destroy_units england merc cog
		destroy_units england Corsairs Mercs
		destroy_units england Southron Spearmen Mercs
		destroy_units england Harad Archers Mercs
		destroy_units england Balchoth Horde Mercs
		destroy_units england Easterling Clansmen Mercs
		destroy_units england Easterling Archers Mercs
		destroy_units england Variag Lancers
		destroy_units england Hillmen
		destroy_units england Rhudaur Scouts
		destroy_units england Rhudaur Axemen

		historic_event ring_destroyed event/evil_loose.bik

		campaign_wait 2.0

		add_events
		event volcano mordor_destroyed
		date 0
		position 287, 134
		end_add_events

	terminate_monitor
end_monitor

;#########################Step 3
monitor_event FactionTurnEnd FactionIsLocal
	and I_CompareCounter mordor_died = 1
	historic_event celebrate_ringbearer event/fellowship_victory.bik

	console_command diplomatic_stance spain england Neutral
	console_command diplomatic_stance venice england Neutral
	set_faction_standing spain england -5
	set_faction_standing venice england -5

	increment_kings_purse england -900

	terminate_monitor
end_monitor

;#########################Step 4
monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionIsLocal
	and I_EventCounter celebrate_ringbearer = 1
	historic_event mordor_revived event/mordor_revived.bik
	terminate_monitor
end_monitor

;#########################Mordor destroyed not through ring
monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionIsLocal
		and I_CompareCounter mordor_died = 0
		and I_NumberOfSettlements england < 1
		add_events
		event volcano mordor_destroyed
		date 0
		position 287, 134
		end_add_events
terminate_monitor
end_monitor

monitor_event FactionTurnEnd FactionIsLocal
	and I_CompareCounter mordor_died = 0
	and I_EventCounter mordor_destroyed = 1
	historic_event mordor_revived event/mordor_revived.bik
	terminate_monitor
end_monitor

;#########################Remove the ring from the general once destroyed
monitor_event CharacterSelected CharacterIsLocal
		and I_CompareCounter mordor_died = 1
		and AgentType = named character
		and HasAncType relic_ring	
		console_command give_trait this Loyal 5
		console_command give_trait this Brave 5
		console_command remove_ancillary this one_ring
		console_command remove_ancillary this gollum
	terminate_monitor
end_monitor

;#########################Witchking Returns
monitor_event CharacterTurnEnd CharacterIsLocal
		and not FactionType england
		and AgentType = named character
		and IsRegionOneOf Gorgoroth_Province
		and TimeInRegion > 2

	spawn_army 
	faction england
	character	Nazgula, named character, x 293, y 133, portrait nazgul1, battle_model witchking, hero_ability Terror_of_the_Witch_King, label family_mordor1
	traits Witchking 1 , hero_ability12 1 , FactionleaderTO 1 , LoyaltyStarter 1 , GoodCommander 3 , TrainAdmin 4 , BattleScarred 2 , BattleDread 1 , CaptorDread 1 , GoodAttacker 1 , NightBattleCapable 1
		unit	Black Numenorians	exp 2 armour 1 weapon_lvl 0
		unit	Mordor Orcs Mercs	exp 3 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
		unit	Mordor Orcs Mercs	exp 1 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
		unit	Mordor Orcs Mercs	exp 4 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
		unit	Mordor Orcs Mercs	exp 2 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
		unit	2handed Orcs		exp 1 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
		unit	Morannon Guard		exp 4 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
		unit	Morannon Guard		exp 3 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
		unit	Mordor Uruks		exp 1 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
		unit	Mordor Uruks		exp 4 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
		unit	Mordor Halberd		exp 1 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
		unit	Mordor Halberd		exp 2 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
		unit	Mordor Archers Mercs	exp 3 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
		unit	Mordor Archers Mercs	exp 1 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
		unit	Battle Trolls		exp 0 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
	end
terminate_monitor
end_monitor	

;#####################################################################
;############ Baron Samedi's Sauron & the One Ring script ############
;################ Part 5: Side effects of the ring ###################
;#####################################################################
;#########################Give corruption trait when having the ring
monitor_event CharacterSelected CharacterIsLocal
		and AgentType = named character
		and HasAncType relic_ring
		console_command give_trait this RingCorruption1 1
end_monitor	

monitor_event CharacterSelected CharacterIsLocal
		and AgentType = named character
		and HasAncType relic_ring
		and IsRegionOneOf South-Ithilien_Province, Emyn-Beraid_Province, East-Osgiliath_Province, North-Ithilien_Province, Dagorlad_Province, Tirith-Thoron_Province, Near-Rhun_Province, Morad_Province, Nurn_Province, Khand_Province, Near-Harad_Province, Amrun_Province, Harondor_Province ;all regions surrounding starting Mordor regions
		console_command remove_trait this RingCorruption1 1
		console_command remove_trait this RingCorruption3 1
		console_command remove_trait this RingCorruption4 1
		console_command remove_trait this RingCorruption5 1
		console_command give_trait this RingCorruption2 1
end_monitor	

monitor_event CharacterSelected CharacterIsLocal
		and AgentType = named character
		and HasAncType relic_ring
		and IsRegionOneOf Carnen_Province, Morgul-Vale_Province, Morgai_Province, Udun_Province ;left over regions
		console_command remove_trait this RingCorruption1 1
		console_command remove_trait this RingCorruption2 1
		console_command remove_trait this RingCorruption4 1
		console_command remove_trait this RingCorruption5 1
		console_command give_trait this RingCorruption3 1
end_monitor	

monitor_event CharacterSelected CharacterIsLocal
		and AgentType = named character
		and HasAncType relic_ring
		and IsRegionOneOf Cirith_Province, Gorgoroth-South_Province, Orc_Province ;all regions surrounding Barad Dur
		console_command remove_trait this RingCorruption1 1
		console_command remove_trait this RingCorruption2 1
		console_command remove_trait this RingCorruption3 1
		console_command remove_trait this RingCorruption5 1
		console_command give_trait this RingCorruption4 1
end_monitor	

monitor_event CharacterSelected CharacterIsLocal
		and AgentType = named character
		and HasAncType relic_ring
		and IsRegionOneOf Gorgoroth_Province
		console_command remove_trait this RingCorruption1 1
		console_command remove_trait this RingCorruption2 1
		console_command remove_trait this RingCorruption3 1
		console_command remove_trait this RingCorruption4 1
		console_command give_trait this RingCorruption5 1
end_monitor	

;#########################Remove all corruption traits when not having the ring
monitor_event CharacterSelected CharacterIsLocal
		and AgentType = named character
		and not HasAncType relic_ring
		console_command remove_trait this RingCorruption1 1
		console_command remove_trait this RingCorruption2 1
		console_command remove_trait this RingCorruption3 1
		console_command remove_trait this RingCorruption4 1
		console_command remove_trait this RingCorruption5 1
end_monitor	

;#########################Remove all corruption traits for Sauron and Nazgul
monitor_event CharacterSelected CharacterIsLocal
		and AgentType = named character
		and HasAncType relic_ring
		and Trait Sauron >= 1 
		console_command remove_trait this RingCorruption1 1
		console_command remove_trait this RingCorruption2 1
		console_command remove_trait this RingCorruption3 1
		console_command remove_trait this RingCorruption4 1
		console_command remove_trait this RingCorruption5 1
end_monitor

monitor_event CharacterSelected CharacterIsLocal
		and AgentType = named character
		and HasAncType relic_ring
		and Trait Witchking >= 1 
		console_command remove_trait this RingCorruption1 1
		console_command remove_trait this RingCorruption2 1
		console_command remove_trait this RingCorruption3 1
		console_command remove_trait this RingCorruption4 1
		console_command remove_trait this RingCorruption5 1
end_monitor

monitor_event CharacterSelected CharacterIsLocal
		and AgentType = named character
		and HasAncType relic_ring
		and Trait Nazgul >= 1 
		console_command remove_trait this RingCorruption1 1
		console_command remove_trait this RingCorruption2 1
		console_command remove_trait this RingCorruption3 1
		console_command remove_trait this RingCorruption4 1
		console_command remove_trait this RingCorruption5 1
end_monitor			

;#########################Mordor declares war to faction of any ringbearer in key Mordor regions
;############Barad Dur
monitor_event CharacterTurnStart CharacterIsLocal
		and I_NumberOfSettlements england > 0
		and AgentType = named character
		and HasAncType relic_ring
		and IsRegionOneOf Gorgoroth_Province
		if I_LocalFaction sicily
		and I_SettlementOwner Gorgoroth = england
		console_command diplomatic_stance sicily england War
		end_if
		if I_LocalFaction milan
		and I_SettlementOwner Gorgoroth = england
		console_command diplomatic_stance milan england War
		end_if	
		if I_LocalFaction turks
		and I_SettlementOwner Gorgoroth = england
		console_command diplomatic_stance turks england War
		end_if	
		if I_LocalFaction egypt
		and I_SettlementOwner Gorgoroth = england
		console_command diplomatic_stance egypt england War
		end_if	
		if I_LocalFaction mongols
		and I_SettlementOwner Gorgoroth = england
		console_command diplomatic_stance mongols england War
		end_if	
		if I_LocalFaction scotland
		and I_SettlementOwner Gorgoroth = england
		console_command diplomatic_stance scotland england War
		end_if
		if I_LocalFaction moors
		and I_SettlementOwner Gorgoroth = england
		console_command diplomatic_stance moors england War
		end_if			
end_monitor

		and I_NumberOfSettlements england > 0

;########################## HELP WEAKENED FACTIONS ###########################
;------------------------- Gondor --------------------------
declare_counter gondor_weakened

;trigger gondor when Minas Tirith is lost
monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionType sicily
	and IsFactionAIControlled
	and not I_SettlementOwner Anorien = sicily
		
	set_counter gondor_weakened 1
		
	terminate_monitor
end_monitor

;trigger gondor when weakened
monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionType sicily
	and IsFactionAIControlled
	and I_NumberOfSettlements sicily < 8
		
	set_counter gondor_weakened 1
		
	terminate_monitor
end_monitor

monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionType sicily
	and IsFactionAIControlled
	and I_CompareCounter gondor_weakened = 1

			increment_kings_purse sicily 300
	spawn_army 
	faction sicily
	character	random_name, named character, age 44, x 233, y 108, direction N
	traits LoyaltyStarter 1 , GoodCommander 3 , ReligionStarter 1 , GoodAttacker 1 , Loyal 2 , GoodAdministrator 1 , StrategicSkill 1 , LogisticalSkill 1 , Ai_Boost 1
		unit	Gondor Bodyguard		exp 3 armour 1 weapon_lvl 0
		unit	Kingsguard			exp 3 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
		unit	Gondor Spearmen Mercs		exp 2 armour 1 weapon_lvl 0
		unit	Gondor Spearmen Mercs		exp 1 armour 1 weapon_lvl 0
		unit	Gondor Infantry Mercs		exp 3 armour 1 weapon_lvl 0
		unit	Gondor Infantry Mercs		exp 2 armour 1 weapon_lvl 0
		unit	Gondor Infantry Mercs		exp 1 armour 1 weapon_lvl 0
		unit	Gondor Infantry Mercs		exp 2 armour 1 weapon_lvl 0
		unit	Dismounted Kofm Mercs		exp 1 armour 1 weapon_lvl 0
		unit	Dismounted Kofm Mercs		exp 1 armour 1 weapon_lvl 0
		unit	Dismounted Kofm Mercs		exp 0 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
		unit	Dismounted Kofm Mercs		exp 2 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
		unit	Axemen of Lossarnach Mercs	exp 3 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
		unit	Gondor Archers Mercs		exp 2 armour 1 weapon_lvl 0
		unit	Gondor Archers Mercs		exp 2 armour 1 weapon_lvl 0
		unit	Ithilien Rangers Mercs		exp 1 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
		unit	Ithilien Rangers Mercs		exp 4 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
		unit	Ithilien Rangers Mercs		exp 3 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
	end

terminate_monitor
end_monitor

declare_counter gondor_weakened2

;trigger gondor when Tarnost is lost
monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionType sicily
	and IsFactionAIControlled
	and not I_SettlementOwner Tarnost = sicily
	and I_CompareCounter gondor_weakened = 1
		
	set_counter gondor_weakened2 1
		
	terminate_monitor
end_monitor

;trigger gondor when more weakened
monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionType sicily
	and IsFactionAIControlled
	and I_NumberOfSettlements sicily < 6
	and I_CompareCounter gondor_weakened = 1
		
	set_counter gondor_weakened2 1
		
	terminate_monitor
end_monitor

	and IsFactionAIControlled
	and I_CompareCounter gondor_weakened2 = 1

	spawn_army

		unit	Gondor Spearmen Mercs		exp 3 armour 2 weapon_lvl 0
		unit	Gondor Infantry Mercs		exp 3 armour 2 weapon_lvl 0
		unit	Gondor Infantry Mercs		exp 2 armour 2 weapon_lvl 0

		unit	Gondor Infantry Mercs		exp 2 armour 2 weapon_lvl 0
		unit	Gondor Archers Mercs		exp 1 armour 2 weapon_lvl 0
		unit	Gondor Archers Mercs		exp 5 armour 2 weapon_lvl 0

	end

;########################### Osgiliath ###############################
;Information about Rebuild
;----------------------------------------------------------------------

monitor_event BuildingCompleted SettlementName Osgiliath-East
	and SettlementBuildingFinished = huge_stone_wall
	and I_LocalFaction sicily
	historic_event osgiliath_east_rebuild
terminate_monitor
end_monitor
