	and SettlementBuildingFinished = citadel
	and I_LocalFaction sicily
	historic_event osgiliath_rebuild
terminate_monitor
end_monitor

;########################### AI invasions ############################
;#########################Invasion on South Umbar by Gondor
monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionType sicily
	and IsFactionAIControlled
	and not I_SettlementOwner South-Umbar = sicily
	and I_LocalFaction spain
	and I_TurnNumber >= 70
	and RandomPercent <= 20

	spawn_army
		faction sicily
		character    	random_name, admiral, age 51, x 208, y 62, label invasion_ships1
		traits Slow 1
		unit         	holk Spawn			exp 5 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
		unit         	holk Spawn			exp 4 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
		unit         	holk Spawn			exp 3 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
		unit         	holk Spawn			exp 2 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
		unit         	holk Spawn			exp 3 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
		unit         	holk Spawn			exp 2 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
		unit         	holk Spawn			exp 1 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
	end

	spawn_army
		faction sicily
		character random_name, named character, age 56, x 208, y 62, label invasion_army1
		traits LoyaltyStarter 1 , GoodCommander 2 , ReligionStarter 1 , GoodAttacker 2 , Loyal 2 , GoodAdministrator 1 , StrategicSkill 1 , LogisticalSkill 1 , Ai_Boost 1
		unit		Gondor Bodyguard		exp 6 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
		unit		Marines Mercs			exp 5 armour 1 weapon_lvl 0
		unit		Marines Mercs			exp 4 armour 1 weapon_lvl 0
		unit		Gondor Infantry Mercs		exp 2 armour 2 weapon_lvl 0
		unit		Gondor Infantry Mercs		exp 3 armour 2 weapon_lvl 0
		unit		Gondor Spearmen Mercs		exp 2 armour 2 weapon_lvl 0
		unit		Gondor Spearmen Mercs		exp 3 armour 2 weapon_lvl 0
		unit		Gondor Spearmen Mercs		exp 2 armour 1 weapon_lvl 0
		unit		Gondor Spearmen Mercs		exp 3 armour 1 weapon_lvl 0
		unit		Gondor Archers Mercs		exp 2 armour 1 weapon_lvl 0
		unit		Gondor Archers Mercs		exp 3 armour 1 weapon_lvl 0
		unit		Gondor Archers Mercs		exp 2 armour 1 weapon_lvl 0
		unit		Gondor Archers Mercs		exp 3 armour 1 weapon_lvl 0
		unit		Swan Knights Mercs		exp 2 armour 1 weapon_lvl 0
		unit		Swan Knights Mercs		exp 3 armour 1 weapon_lvl 0
		unit		Gondor Catapult Mercs		exp 5 armour 1 weapon_lvl 0
		unit		Gondor Catapult Mercs		exp 4 armour 1 weapon_lvl 0
	end
	console_command diplomatic_stance sicily spain War
	historic_event invasion_umbar
	move_strat_camera 208, 62
terminate_monitor
end_monitor

declare_counter naval_invasion_a

monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionType sicily
	and IsFactionAIControlled
	and not I_SettlementOwner South-Umbar = sicily

	if I_CharacterExists invasion_ships1
		if ! I_FactionNearTile sicily 0 165,6		;Shore Tile
		move invasion_ships1, 165, 6			;Shore Tile
	end_if
	if I_FactionNearTile sicily 0 165,6
		set_counter naval_invasion_a 1
	end_if
	if I_CompareCounter naval_invasion_a = 1
    		destroy_units sicily, holk Spawn
		historic_event invasion_umbar_landed
		move_strat_camera 166, 6
	end_if
	end_if
	if I_CharacterExists invasion_army1
	if I_CompareCounter naval_invasion_a = 3
		siege_settlement invasion_army1, South-Umbar, attack
		set_counter naval_invasion_a 4
	end_if
	if I_CompareCounter naval_invasion_a = 2
		siege_settlement invasion_army1, South-Umbar, maintain
		set_counter naval_invasion_a 3
	end_if
	if I_CompareCounter naval_invasion_a = 1
		move invasion_army1, 166, 6			;Move the army away from shore
		set_counter naval_invasion_a 2
	end_if
	end_if 
end_monitor

;#########################Corsair Invasions
declare_counter Corsair_Timer
declare_counter Invade_LondGalen
declare_counter Invade_Pelargir
declare_counter Invade_DolAmroth
declare_counter Invade_Linhir
declare_counter Invade_Annulond
declare_counter Invade_GobenTolfalas
declare_counter Random_LondGalen
declare_counter Random_Pelargir
declare_counter Random_DolAmroth
declare_counter Random_Linhir
declare_counter Random_Annulond
declare_counter Random_GobenTolfalas

;#########################Corsair Invasion Timer

	monitor_event PreFactionTurnStart FactionIsLocal
		and I_TurnNumber >= 45
		inc_counter Corsair_Timer 1
	end_monitor

	monitor_conditions I_CompareCounter Corsair_Timer = 5
		set_counter Corsair_Timer 1
	end_monitor

;#########################Stop Corsairs Assaulting Settlement 

	monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionType spain
		and DiplomaticStanceFromFaction sicily <= Hostile
		set_counter Invade_LondGalen 0
		set_counter Invade_Pelargir 0
		set_counter Invade_DolAmroth 0
		set_counter Invade_Linhir 0
		set_counter Invade_Annulond 0
		set_counter Invade_GobenTolfalas 0
		set_event_counter Corsair_Invade_LondGalen 0
		set_event_counter Corsair_Invade_Pelargir 0
		set_event_counter Corsair_Invade_DolAmroth 0
		set_event_counter Corsair_Invade_Linhir 0
		set_event_counter Corsair_Invade_Annulond 0
		set_event_counter Corsair_Invade_GobenTolfalas 0
	end_monitor

;#########################Corsairs Assault Settlement

	monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionType spain
		and DiplomaticStanceFromFaction sicily = AtWar
		and I_SettlementOwner Umbar = spain
		if I_CharacterExists Invade_LondGalen
		and I_CompareCounter Invade_LondGalen = 2
		set_counter Invade_LondGalen 0
		siege_settlement Invade_LondGalen, Anfalas, attack
	end_if
		if I_CharacterExists Invade_Pelargir
		and I_CompareCounter Invade_Pelargir = 2
		set_counter Invade_Pelargir 0
		siege_settlement Invade_Pelargir, Lebennin, attack
	end_if
		if I_CharacterExists Invade_DolAmroth
		and I_CompareCounter Invade_DolAmroth = 2
		set_counter Invade_DolAmroth 0
		siege_settlement Invade_DolAmroth, Belfalas, attack
	end_if
		if I_CharacterExists Invade_Linhir
		and I_CompareCounter Invade_Linhir = 2
		set_counter Invade_Linhir 0
		siege_settlement Invade_Linhir, West_Lebennin, attack
	end_if
		if I_CharacterExists Invade_Annulond
		and I_CompareCounter Invade_Annulond = 2
		set_counter Invade_Annulond 0
		siege_settlement Invade_Annulond, Andrast, attack
	end_if
		if I_CharacterExists Invade_GobenTolfalas
		and I_CompareCounter Invade_GobenTolfalas = 2
		set_counter Invade_GobenTolfalas 0
		siege_settlement Invade_GobenTolfalas, Tolfalas, attack
	end_if
		if not I_CharacterExists Invade_LondGalen
		and I_CompareCounter Invade_LondGalen = 2
		set_counter Invade_LondGalen 0
	end_if
		if not I_CharacterExists Invade_Pelargir
		and I_CompareCounter Invade_Pelargir = 2
		set_counter Invade_Pelargir 0
	end_if
		if not I_CharacterExists Invade_DolAmroth
		and I_CompareCounter Invade_DolAmroth = 2
		set_counter Invade_DolAmroth 0
	end_if
		if not I_CharacterExists Invade_Linhir
		and I_CompareCounter Invade_Linhir = 2
		set_counter Invade_Linhir 0
	end_if
		if not I_CharacterExists Invade_Annulond
		and I_CompareCounter Invade_Annulond = 2
		set_counter Invade_Annulond 0
	end_if
		if not I_CharacterExists Invade_GobenTolfalas
		and I_CompareCounter Invade_GobenTolfalas = 2
		set_counter Invade_GobenTolfalas 0
	end_if
	end_monitor

;#########################Random Corsair Invasions

	monitor_event PreFactionTurnStart FactionType sicily
		and FactionIsLocal
		and I_CompareCounter Corsair_Timer = 3
		and DiplomaticStanceFromFaction spain = AtWar
		and I_SettlementOwner Umbar = spain
		and I_SettlementOwner Anfalas = sicily
		and not I_CharacterExists Invade_LondGalen
		and RandomPercent < 2
		set_counter Random_LondGalen 1
	end_monitor

	monitor_event PreFactionTurnStart FactionType sicily
		and FactionIsLocal
		and I_CompareCounter Corsair_Timer = 3
		and DiplomaticStanceFromFaction spain = AtWar
		and I_SettlementOwner Umbar = spain
		and I_SettlementOwner Lebennin = sicily
		and not I_CharacterExists Invade_Pelargir
		and RandomPercent <= 2
		set_counter Random_Pelargir 1
	end_monitor

	monitor_event PreFactionTurnStart FactionType sicily
		and FactionIsLocal
		and I_CompareCounter Corsair_Timer = 3
		and DiplomaticStanceFromFaction spain = AtWar
		and I_SettlementOwner Umbar = spain
		and I_SettlementOwner Belfalas = sicily
		and not I_CharacterExists Invade_DolAmroth
		and RandomPercent <= 2
		set_counter Random_DolAmroth 1
	end_monitor

	monitor_event PreFactionTurnStart FactionType sicily
		and FactionIsLocal
		and I_CompareCounter Corsair_Timer = 3
		and DiplomaticStanceFromFaction spain = AtWar
		and I_SettlementOwner Umbar = spain
		and I_SettlementOwner West_Lebennin = sicily
		and not I_CharacterExists Invade_Linhir
		and RandomPercent <= 2
		set_counter Random_Linhir 1
	end_monitor

	monitor_event PreFactionTurnStart FactionType sicily
		and FactionIsLocal
		and I_CompareCounter Corsair_Timer = 3
		and DiplomaticStanceFromFaction spain = AtWar
		and I_SettlementOwner Umbar = spain
		and I_SettlementOwner Andrast = sicily
		and not I_CharacterExists Invade_Annulond
		and RandomPercent < 2
		set_counter Random_Annulond 1
	end_monitor

	monitor_event PreFactionTurnStart FactionType sicily
		and FactionIsLocal
		and I_CompareCounter Corsair_Timer = 3
		and DiplomaticStanceFromFaction spain = AtWar
		and I_SettlementOwner Umbar = spain
		and I_SettlementOwner Tolfalas = sicily
		and not I_CharacterExists Invade_GobenTolfalas
		and RandomPercent <= 3
		set_counter Random_GobenTolfalas 1
	end_monitor

	monitor_conditions I_CompareCounter Random_LondGalen = 1
		generate_random_counter Corsair_Invade_LondGalen 1 2
		set_counter Random_LondGalen 0
	end_monitor

	monitor_conditions I_CompareCounter Random_Pelargir = 1
		generate_random_counter Corsair_Invade_Pelargir 1 2
		set_counter Random_Pelargir 0
	end_monitor

	monitor_conditions I_CompareCounter Random_DolAmroth = 1
		generate_random_counter Corsair_Invade_DolAmroth 1 2
		set_counter Random_DolAmroth 0
	end_monitor

	monitor_conditions I_CompareCounter Random_Linhir = 1
		generate_random_counter Corsair_Invade_Linhir 1 2
		set_counter Random_Linhir 0
	end_monitor

	monitor_conditions I_CompareCounter Random_Annulond = 1
		generate_random_counter Corsair_Invade_Annulond 1 2
		set_counter Random_Annulond 0
	end_monitor

	monitor_conditions I_CompareCounter Random_GobenTolfalas = 1
		generate_random_counter Corsair_Invade_GobenTolfalas 1 2
		set_counter Random_GobenTolfalas 0
	end_monitor

;#########################spawn Corsair's Ships

	monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionType sicily
		and I_SettlementOwner Umbar = spain
		and not I_CharacterExists Invade_LondGalen
		and I_SettlementOwner Anfalas = sicily
		and I_CompareCounter Invade_LondGalen = 0
		if I_EventCounter Corsair_Invade_LondGalen = 1
		set_counter Invade_LondGalen 1
		historic_event corsairs_off_coast event/corsair.bik
        spawn_army
            	faction spain
            	character    	random_name, admiral, age 21, x 143, y 103, direction N
            	unit         	corsair pirate ship                	exp 2 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
           	unit         	corsair pirate ship                	exp 2 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
        end
	move_strat_camera 143, 103
	end_if
		if I_EventCounter Corsair_Invade_LondGalen = 2
		set_counter Invade_LondGalen 1
		historic_event corsairs_off_coast event/corsair.bik
        spawn_army
            	faction spain
            	character    	random_name, admiral, age 25, x 143, y 103, direction N
            	unit         	corsair pirate ship                	exp 2 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
           	unit         	corsair pirate ship                	exp 2 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
           	unit         	corsair pirate ship                	exp 2 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
        end
	move_strat_camera 143, 103
	end_if
	end_monitor

	monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionType sicily
		and I_SettlementOwner Umbar = spain
		and not I_CharacterExists Invade_Pelargir
		and I_SettlementOwner Lebennin = sicily

		set_counter Invade_Pelargir 1
		historic_event corsairs_off_coast event/corsair.bik
        spawn_army
            	faction spain
            	character    	random_name, admiral, age 21, x 239, y 99, direction N
            	unit         	corsair pirate ship                	exp 2 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
           	unit         	corsair pirate ship                	exp 2 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
        end
	move_strat_camera 239, 99
	end_if

        spawn_army
            	faction spain

            	unit         	corsair pirate ship                	exp 2 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0

	end_if
	end_monitor

;#########################Corsairs spawn And Siege Settlement

	monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionType spain
		and I_CompareCounter Invade_LondGalen = 1
		if I_EventCounter Corsair_Invade_LondGalen = 1
		and I_CharacterTypeNearTile spain admiral, 0 143,103
		set_counter Invade_LondGalen 2
		set_event_counter Corsair_Invade_LondGalen 0
        spawn_army
            	faction spain
		character	random_name, named character, age 26, x 143, y 105, portrait Corsair, direction N, label Invade_LondGalen
		traits LoyaltyStarter 1 , GoodCommander 1 , Energetic 1 , ReligionStarter 1 , GoodAttacker 1 , GoodAmbusher 1
		unit 		Corsairs	exp 5 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
		unit 		Corsairs	exp 2 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
		unit 		Corsairs	exp 0 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
		unit		Corsair Archers	exp 1 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
		unit		Corsair Archers	exp 0 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
        end
		siege_settlement Invade_LondGalen, Anfalas, maintain
	end_if
		if I_EventCounter Corsair_Invade_LondGalen = 2
		and I_CharacterTypeNearTile spain admiral, 0 143,103
		set_counter Invade_LondGalen 2
		set_event_counter Corsair_Invade_LondGalen 0
        spawn_army
            	faction spain
		character	random_name, named character, age 36, x 143, y 105, portrait Corsair, direction N, label Invade_LondGalen
		traits LoyaltyStarter 1 , GoodCommander 1 , Energetic 1 , ReligionStarter 1 , GoodAttacker 1 , GoodAmbusher 1
		unit 		Corsairs	exp 5 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
		unit 		Corsairs	exp 1 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
		unit 		Corsairs	exp 2 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
		unit		Corsairs	exp 3 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
		unit		Corsairs	exp 1 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
		unit		Corsairs	exp 0 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
        end
		siege_settlement Invade_LondGalen, Anfalas, maintain
	end_if
		if not I_CharacterTypeNearTile spain admiral, 0 143,103
		set_counter Invade_LondGalen 0
		set_event_counter Corsair_Invade_LondGalen 0
	end_if
	end_monitor

	monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionType spain
		and I_CompareCounter Invade_Pelargir = 1
		if I_EventCounter Corsair_Invade_Pelargir = 1
		and I_CharacterTypeNearTile spain admiral, 0 239,99
		set_counter Invade_Pelargir 2
		set_event_counter Corsair_Invade_Pelargir 0
        spawn_army
            	faction spain
		character	random_name, named character, age 26, x 237, y 100, portrait Corsair, direction N, label Invade_Pelargir
		traits LoyaltyStarter 1 , GoodCommander 1 , Energetic 1 , ReligionStarter 1 , GoodAttacker 1 , GoodAmbusher 1 
		unit 		Corsairs	exp 5 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
		unit 		Corsairs	exp 0 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
		unit 		Corsairs	exp 0 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
		unit		Corsair Archers	exp 1 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
		unit		Corsair Archers	exp 0 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
        end
		siege_settlement Invade_Pelargir, Lebennin, maintain
	end_if
		if I_EventCounter Corsair_Invade_Pelargir = 2
		and I_CharacterTypeNearTile spain admiral, 0 239,99
		set_counter Invade_Pelargir 2
		set_event_counter Corsair_Invade_Pelargir 0
        spawn_army
            	faction spain
		character	random_name, named character, age 28, x 237, y 100, portrait Corsair, direction N, label Invade_Pelargir
		traits LoyaltyStarter 1 , GoodCommander 1 , Energetic 1 , ReligionStarter 1 , GoodAttacker 1 , GoodAmbusher 1
		unit 		Corsairs	exp 4 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
		unit 		Corsairs	exp 2 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
		unit 		Corsairs	exp 3 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
		unit		Corsairs	exp 1 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
		unit		Corsairs	exp 2 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
        end
		siege_settlement Invade_Pelargir, Lebennin, maintain
	end_if
		if not I_CharacterTypeNearTile spain admiral, 0 239,99
		set_counter Invade_Pelargir 0
		set_event_counter Corsair_Invade_Pelargir 0
	end_if
	end_monitor

		and I_CompareCounter Invade_DolAmroth = 1

        spawn_army

		unit		Corsair Archers	exp 0 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
        end
		siege_settlement Invade_GobenTolfalas, Tolfalas, maintain
	end_if
		if I_EventCounter Corsair_Invade_GobenTolfalas = 2
		and I_CharacterTypeNearTile spain admiral, 0 201,83
		set_counter Invade_GobenTolfalas 2
		set_event_counter Corsair_Invade_GobenTolfalas 0
        spawn_army
            	faction spain
		character	random_name, named character, age 36, x 200, y 83, portrait Corsair, direction W, label Invade_GobenTolfalas
		traits LoyaltyStarter 1 , GoodCommander 1 , Energetic 1 , ReligionStarter 1 , GoodAttacker 1 , GoodAmbusher 1
		unit 		Corsairs	exp 5 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
		unit 		Corsairs	exp 2 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
		unit		Corsair Archers	exp 1 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
		unit		Corsair Archers	exp 0 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
        end

	end_if

		set_counter Invade_GobenTolfalas 0
		set_event_counter Corsair_Invade_GobenTolfalas 0
	end_if
	end_monitor

;############################ Arnor Union ###############################
;CONDITIONS
declare_counter union_offered

monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionType turks
and not IsFactionAIControlled
and I_LocalFaction turks
and I_SettlementOwner Shire = turks	
and I_SettlementOwner Bywater = turks
and I_SettlementOwner Southfarthing = turks
and I_SettlementOwner Bree = turks
and I_SettlementOwner Staddle = turks
and I_SettlementOwner Cardolan = turks
and I_SettlementOwner Weather-Hills = turks
and I_SettlementOwner Lake_Evendim = turks
and I_SettlementOwner Arthedain = turks
and FactionBuildingExists >= house_of_kings
and I_CompareCounter union_offered = 0

	add_events
	event counter union_accepted
	event counter union_declined
	end_add_events

	historic_event union true factions { turks, }
	set_counter union_offered 1

terminate_monitor
end_monitor

;----------------- accept ------------------------------------
monitor_conditions I_EventCounter union_accepted = 1
and I_LocalFaction turks

set_faction_banner
faction turks
banner byzantium
end_set_faction_banner
move_strat_camera 101, 264
give_everything_to_faction byzantium turks false

set_religion turks numenorian
change_population_religion turks numenorian 75 northmen
destroy_buildings turks academic true
destroy_buildings turks castle_academic true

historic_event arnor_reunited event/arnor_reunited.bik
terminate_monitor
end_monitor

;CHANGE BATTLE MAP MODELS
;change faction heir battle model
monitor_event CharacterTurnEnd FactionType turks
and I_EventCounter union_accepted > 0
and Trait Factionheir >= 1 
change_battle_model turks heir arnor_general
end_monitor 

;change Aragorn's battle model & give new ancillary
monitor_event CharacterTurnEnd FactionType turks
and I_EventCounter union_accepted > 0
and I_CharacterExists strider1
change_battle_model turks leader elessar
console_command remove_ancillary strider1 king_eriador
console_command give_ancillary strider1 king_arnor
terminate_monitor
end_monitor

;change leader's battle model if Aragorn is dead
monitor_event CharacterTurnEnd FactionType turks
and I_EventCounter union_accepted > 0
and not I_CharacterExists strider1
change_battle_model turks leader arnor_general
end_monitor

;------------------ reject ------------------------------------
declare_counter union_rejected

monitor_conditions I_EventCounter union_declined = 1
and I_LocalFaction turks
	historic_event union_declined factions { turks, }
	set_counter union_declined 1
terminate_monitor
end_monitor 

;INFORMATION ABOUT PROGRESS
declare_counter step_done
set_counter step_done 0

monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionType turks
and not IsFactionAIControlled
and I_CompareCounter step_done = 0
and DiplomaticStanceFromFaction sicily = Allied
set_counter step_done 1
terminate_monitor
end_monitor

monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionType turks
and not IsFactionAIControlled
and I_CompareCounter step_done = 0
and I_SettlementOwner Shire = turks	
and I_SettlementOwner Bywater = turks
and I_SettlementOwner Southfarthing = turks
and I_SettlementOwner Bree = turks
and I_SettlementOwner Staddle = turks
and I_SettlementOwner Cardolan = turks
and I_SettlementOwner Weather-Hills = turks
and I_SettlementOwner Lake_Evendim = turks
and I_SettlementOwner Arthedain = turks
set_counter step_done 1
terminate_monitor
end_monitor

monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionType turks
and not IsFactionAIControlled
and I_CompareCounter step_done = 0
and FactionBuildingExists >= house_of_kings
set_counter step_done 1
terminate_monitor
end_monitor

monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionType turks
and not IsFactionAIControlled
and I_CompareCounter step_done = 1
historic_event union_notification factions { turks, } 
set_counter step_done 2
terminate_monitor
end_monitor

;########################## AI Arnor Union #############################

monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionType turks
	and IsFactionAIControlled
	and I_TurnNumber >= 90
	and RandomPercent < 10
	and I_SettlementOwner Lake_Evendim = turks
;set_faction_banner
;faction turks
;banner byzantium
;end_set_faction_banner
;give_everything_to_faction byzantium turks false
set_religion turks numenorian
change_population_religion turks numenorian 90 northmen
destroy_buildings turks academic true
destroy_buildings turks castle_academic true
set_event_counter union_accepted 1
historic_event ai_arnor_reunited event/arnor_reunited.bik
terminate_monitor
end_monitor 

;########################## Arnor Techtree #############################
add_events
	event	counter	northmen_turks
	event	counter	dunedain_turks
	date	0
end_add_events

set_event_counter northmen_turks 1
set_event_counter dunedain_turks 1

monitor_event PreFactionTurnStart FactionType turks
	and I_EventCounter union_accepted = 0
	set_event_counter northmen_turks 1
	set_event_counter dunedain_turks 0
end_monitor
	
monitor_event PreFactionTurnStart FactionType turks
	and I_EventCounter union_accepted = 1
	set_event_counter northmen_turks 0
	set_event_counter dunedain_turks 1
end_monitor

monitor_event PreFactionTurnStart not FactionType turks
	set_event_counter northmen_turks 1
	set_event_counter dunedain_turks 1
end_monitor

;############################ Aragorn ###############################
declare_counter aragorn_offered

monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionType sicily
and not IsFactionAIControlled
and I_TurnNumber >= 70
and RandomPercent < 10
and I_CompareCounter aragorn_offered = 0

	historic_event aragorn true factions { sicily, }
	set_counter aragorn_offered 1

terminate_monitor
end_monitor

;----------------- accept ------------------------------------
monitor_event EventCounter EventCounterType aragorn_accepted

and I_EventCounter aragorn_accepted = 1

	spawn_army 
	faction sicily
	character	Aragorn, named character, age 48, x 236, y 124, portrait Aragon, battle_model elessar, hero_ability STRIDER
	traits Elessar 1 , hero_ability6 1 , NaturalMilitarySkill 4 , TrainAdmin 5 , PublicFaith 1 , ReligionStarter 1 , GoodAttacker 1 , Brave 2 , Just 2 , KindRuler 2 , Loyal 2 , VictorVirtue 1
		unit	Gondor Bodyguard		exp 2 armour 1 weapon_lvl 0
	end
	
	send_character_off_map strider1
	historic_event aragorn_accepted factions { sicily, }
	move_strat_camera 236, 124

terminate_monitor
end_monitor

;------------------ reject ------------------------------------
declare_counter aragorn_rejected

monitor_event EventCounter EventCounterType aragorn_declined

and I_EventCounter aragorn_declined = 1

	historic_event aragorn_declined factions { sicily, }

	set_counter aragorn_declined 1

terminate_monitor
end_monitor 

;########################### Army of Dead #############################
monitor_event CharacterTurnStart CharacterIsLocal
		  and AgentType = named character
		  and Trait Aragorn >= 1
		  and IsRegionOneOf Erech_Province
console_command give_ancillary strider1 army_of_dead
historic_event army_of_dead
terminate_monitor
end_monitor

;########################## Balrog Arrival ############################
;----------------------------- AI ------------------------------
declare_counter deactivate_assaultsiege

monitor_event ButtonPressed ButtonPressed siege_maintain_button
	and I_CompareCounter deactivate_maintainsiege = 0
	and I_SettlementUnderSiege Misty-Mountains
	and I_SettlementOwner Misty-Mountains = hre
	and I_CompareCounter Misty-Mountains_Siege < 1
	and I_CompareCounter Misty-Mountains_Local = 0
		create_unit Misty-Mountains, Balrog2, num 1, exp 0, arm 0, wep 0
		historic_event balrog_ai event/balrog.bik
		set_counter deactivate_assaultsiege 1
terminate_monitor
end_monitor
 
declare_counter deactivate_maintainsiege

monitor_event ButtonPressed ButtonPressed siege_assault_button
	and I_CompareCounter deactivate_assaultsiege = 0
	and I_SettlementUnderSiege Misty-Mountains
	and I_SettlementOwner Misty-Mountains = hre
	and I_CompareCounter Misty-Mountains_Siege < 1
	and I_CompareCounter Misty-Mountains_Local = 0
		create_unit Misty-Mountains, Balrog2, num 1, exp 0, arm 0, wep 0
		historic_event balrog_ai event/balrog.bik
		set_counter deactivate_maintainsiege 1
terminate_monitor
end_monitor

;--------------------------- Player ----------------------------
monitor_event BuildingCompleted SettlementName Misty-Mountains
	and SettlementBuildingFinished = m_mines
	and not IsFactionAIControlled
	historic_event balrog event/balrog.bik
	spawn_army 
	faction hre
	character	Balrog, named character, age 42, x 182, y 216, portrait Balrog
	traits LoyaltyStarter 1 , Balrog 1 , ReligionStarter 1 , TrainAdmin 6 , NightBattleCapable 1
		unit	Balrog		soldiers 1 exp 1 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
	end
	move_strat_camera 182, 216
	terminate_monitor
end_monitor

;############################# Ent spawn #############################
declare_counter ents

monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionType france
	and not IsFactionAIControlled
	and I_SettlementOwner Fangorn = france
	set_counter ents 1
	terminate_monitor
end_monitor

monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionType hre
	and not IsFactionAIControlled
	and I_SettlementOwner Fangorn = hre
	set_counter ents 1
	terminate_monitor
end_monitor

monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionType england
	and not IsFactionAIControlled
	and I_SettlementOwner Fangorn = england
	set_counter ents 1
	terminate_monitor
end_monitor

monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionType slave
	and I_CompareCounter ents = 1
	historic_event ent_march event/march_of_the_ents.bik
	spawn_army 
	faction slave, sub_faction mongols
	character	Treebeard, named character, age 62, x 183, y 193, battle_model ents, portrait treebeard
	traits LoyaltyStarter 1 , Ents 1 , GoodCommander 2 , ReligionStarter 1
		unit	Ents Elephants		exp 2 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
	end
	move_strat_camera 183, 193
	terminate_monitor
end_monitor

;===============================================================
;============ Ensures Player Owned Settlements =================
;========== Are Local On Turn Start and Turn End ===============
;===============================================================

monitor_event SettlementTurnStart SettlementIsLocal
	and SettlementName Belfalas
	set_counter Belfalas_Local 1
end_monitor
monitor_event SettlementTurnStart SettlementIsLocal
	and SettlementName Anorien
	set_counter Anorien_Local 1
end_monitor
monitor_event SettlementTurnStart SettlementIsLocal
	and SettlementName Bree
	set_counter Bree_Local 1
end_monitor
monitor_event SettlementTurnStart SettlementIsLocal
	and SettlementName Arthedain
	set_counter Arthedain_Local 1
end_monitor
monitor_event SettlementTurnStart SettlementIsLocal
	and SettlementName Gobel-Ancalimon
	set_counter Gobel-Ancalimon_Local 1
end_monitor

	and SettlementName Umbar
	set_counter Umbar_Local 1
end_monitor

;===============================================================
;================= Decrease Siege Counter ======================
;========== Ensures Additional Spawns Don't Spawn ==============
;===============================================================

monitor_event PreFactionTurnStart not IsFactionAIControlled
inc_counter Belfalas_Siege -1
inc_counter Anorien_Siege -1
inc_counter Bree_Siege -1
inc_counter Arthedain_Siege -1
inc_counter Gobel-Ancalimon_Siege -1
inc_counter Umbar_Siege -1
inc_counter Mithlond_Siege -1
inc_counter Rhun_Siege -1
inc_counter Shire_Siege -1
inc_counter High-Pass_Siege -1
inc_counter Mt-Gundabad_Siege -1
inc_counter Near-Rhun_Siege -1
inc_counter Gorgoroth_Siege -1
inc_counter Morgul-Vale_Siege -1
inc_counter Dunland_Siege -1
inc_counter Imladris_Siege -1
inc_counter Elven-Mirkwood_Siege -1
inc_counter West-Mirkwood_Siege -1
inc_counter Erebor_Siege -1
inc_counter Dale_Siege -1
inc_counter Deep-Mirkwood_Siege -1
inc_counter Helms-Deep_Siege -1
inc_counter Gap-of-Rohan_Siege -1
inc_counter West-Emnet_Siege -1
inc_counter Eastfold_Siege -1
inc_counter Adorn_Siege -1
inc_counter Kings-Land_Siege -1
inc_counter Nan-Curunir_Siege -1
inc_counter Misty-Mountains_Siege -1
inc_counter Carn-Dum_Siege -1
inc_counter Lothlorien_Siege -1
inc_counter Celebrant_Siege -1
inc_counter Esgaroth_Siege -1
inc_counter Celduin-East_Siege -1
inc_counter Udun_Siege -1
inc_counter Cair-Andros_Siege -1
inc_counter Nan-i-Naugrim_Siege -1
inc_counter Mistrand_Siege -1
inc_counter Lebennin_Siege -1
inc_counter West_Lebennin_Siege -1
inc_counter Osgiliath-West_Siege -1
inc_counter Lossarnach_Siege -1
inc_counter Tarnost_Siege -1
inc_counter Westfold_Siege -1
	set_counter PT 0
end_monitor

;=======================================================
;============ Set Max Unit Spawn Limit =================
;=======================================================

;For Player vs AI
monitor_event ScrollOpened ScrollOpened siege_scroll  
		set_counter PT 0
end_monitor

;For AI vs AI
monitor_event PreFactionTurnStart IsFactionAIControlled
		set_counter PT 0
end_monitor

;=======================================================
;=================== Spawn Units =======================
;=============== For Player vs AI ONLY==================
;=======================================================

monitor_event ButtonPressed ButtonPressed siege_maintain_button

if I_SettlementUnderSiege Anorien
	and I_SettlementOwner Anorien = sicily
	and I_CompareCounter Anorien_Siege < 1
	and I_CompareCounter Anorien_Local = 0
	while I_CompareCounter PT < 1
			create_unit Anorien, Gondor Spearmen Mercs, num 2, exp 0, arm 0, wep 0
			create_unit Anorien, Gondor Archers Mercs, num 1, exp 0, arm 0, wep 0
			create_unit Anorien, Gondor Infantry Mercs, num 1, exp 0, arm 0, wep 0
			create_unit Anorien, Gondor Trebuchet, num 2, exp 0, arm 0, wep 0
			create_unit Anorien, Dismounted Kofm Mercs, num 2, exp 0, arm 0, wep 0
		inc_counter PT 1
		set_counter Anorien_Siege 5
	end_while
end_if

if I_SettlementUnderSiege Cair-Andros
	and I_SettlementOwner Cair-Andros = sicily
	and I_CompareCounter Cair-Andros_Siege < 1
	and I_CompareCounter Cair-Andros_Local = 0
	while I_CompareCounter PT < 1
			create_unit Cair-Andros, Gondor Spearmen Mercs, num 1, exp 0, arm 0, wep 0
			create_unit Cair-Andros, Gondor Archers Mercs, num 1, exp 0, arm 0, wep 0
			create_unit Cair-Andros, Dismounted Kofm Mercs, num 2, exp 0, arm 0, wep 0
		inc_counter PT 1
		set_counter Cair-Andros_Siege 5
	end_while
end_if

if I_SettlementUnderSiege Belfalas
	and I_SettlementOwner Belfalas = sicily
	and I_CompareCounter Belfalas_Siege < 1
	and I_CompareCounter Belfalas_Local = 0
	while I_CompareCounter PT < 1
			create_unit Belfalas, Gondor Spearmen Mercs, num 1, exp 0, arm 0, wep 0
			create_unit Belfalas, Gondor Archers Mercs, num 2, exp 0, arm 0, wep 0
			create_unit Belfalas, Gondor Infantry Mercs, num 1, exp 0, arm 0, wep 0
			create_unit Belfalas, Dismounted Kofm Mercs, num 2, exp 0, arm 0, wep 0
		inc_counter PT 1
		set_counter Belfalas_Siege 5
	end_while
end_if

if I_SettlementUnderSiege Lebennin
	and I_SettlementOwner Lebennin = sicily
	and I_CompareCounter Lebennin_Siege < 1
	and I_CompareCounter Lebennin_Local = 0
	while I_CompareCounter PT < 1
			create_unit Lebennin, Marines Mercs, num 2, exp 0, arm 0, wep 0
			create_unit Lebennin, Dismounted Kofm Mercs, num 2, exp 0, arm 0, wep 0
			create_unit Lebennin, Gondor Spearmen Mercs, num 2, exp 0, arm 0, wep 0
		inc_counter PT 1
		set_counter Lebennin_Siege 5
	end_while
end_if

if I_SettlementUnderSiege West_Lebennin
	and I_SettlementOwner West_Lebennin = sicily
	and I_CompareCounter West_Lebennin_Siege < 1
	and I_CompareCounter West_Lebennin_Local = 0
	while I_CompareCounter PT < 1
			create_unit West_Lebennin, Gondor Spearmen Mercs, num 2, exp 0, arm 0, wep 0
			create_unit West_Lebennin, Dismounted Kofm Mercs, num 3, exp 0, arm 0, wep 0
		inc_counter PT 1
		set_counter West_Lebennin_Siege 5
	end_while
end_if

if I_SettlementUnderSiege Osgiliath-West
	and I_SettlementOwner Osgiliath-West = sicily
	and I_CompareCounter Osgiliath-West_Siege < 1
	and I_CompareCounter Osgiliath-West_Local = 0
	while I_CompareCounter PT < 1
			create_unit Osgiliath-West, Gondor Infantry Mercs, num 2, exp 0, arm 0, wep 0
			create_unit Osgiliath-West, Gondor Spearmen Mercs, num 1, exp 0, arm 0, wep 0
			create_unit Osgiliath-West, Dismounted Kofm Mercs, num 2, exp 0, arm 0, wep 0
		inc_counter PT 1
		set_counter Osgiliath-West_Siege 5
	end_while
end_if

if I_SettlementUnderSiege Lossarnach
	and I_SettlementOwner Lossarnach = sicily
	and I_CompareCounter Lossarnach_Siege < 1
	and I_CompareCounter Lossarnach_Local = 0
	while I_CompareCounter PT < 1
			create_unit Lossarnach, Dismounted Kofm Mercs, num 3, exp 0, arm 0, wep 0
			create_unit Lossarnach, Axemen of Lossarnach Mercs, num 2, exp 0, arm 0, wep 0
		inc_counter PT 1
		set_counter Lossarnach_Siege 5
	end_while
end_if

if I_SettlementUnderSiege Kings-Land
	and I_SettlementOwner Kings-Land = milan
	and I_CompareCounter Kings-Land_Siege < 1
	and I_CompareCounter Kings-Land_Local = 0
	while I_CompareCounter PT < 1
			create_unit Kings-Land, Dismounted Royal Guard, num 1, exp 0, arm 0, wep 0
			create_unit Kings-Land, Rohan Axemen Mercs, num 3, exp 0, arm 0, wep 0
			create_unit Kings-Land, Dismounted Eored Lancers Mercs, num 2, exp 0, arm 0, wep 0
		inc_counter PT 1
		set_counter Kings-Land_Siege 5
	end_while
end_if

if I_SettlementUnderSiege Westfold
	and I_SettlementOwner Westfold = milan
	and I_CompareCounter Westfold_Siege < 1
	and I_CompareCounter Westfold_Local = 0
	while I_CompareCounter PT < 1
			create_unit Westfold, militia Mercs, num 2, exp 0, arm 0, wep 0
			create_unit Westfold, Dismounted Eored Lancers Mercs, num 1, exp 0, arm 0, wep 0
			create_unit Westfold, Rohan Axemen Mercs, num 2, exp 0, arm 0, wep 0
		inc_counter PT 1
		set_counter Westfold_Siege 5
	end_while
end_if

if I_SettlementUnderSiege Helms-Deep
	and I_SettlementOwner Helms-Deep = milan
	and I_CompareCounter Helms-Deep_Siege < 1
	and I_CompareCounter Helms-Deep_Local = 0
	while I_CompareCounter PT < 1
			create_unit Helms-Deep, militia Mercs, num 2, exp 0, arm 0, wep 0
			create_unit Helms-Deep, Rohan Axemen Mercs, num 2, exp 0, arm 0, wep 0
			create_unit Helms-Deep, Dismounted Eored Lancers Mercs, num 2, exp 0, arm 0, wep 0
		inc_counter PT 1
		set_counter Helms-Deep_Siege 5
	end_while
end_if

if I_SettlementUnderSiege Gap-of-Rohan
	and I_SettlementOwner Gap-of-Rohan = milan
	and I_CompareCounter Gap-of-Rohan_Siege < 1
	and I_CompareCounter Gap-of-Rohan_Local = 0
	while I_CompareCounter PT < 1
			create_unit Gap-of-Rohan, Rohan Axemen Mercs, num 3, exp 0, arm 0, wep 0
			create_unit Gap-of-Rohan, militia Mercs, num 2, exp 0, arm 0, wep 0
		inc_counter PT 1
		set_counter Gap-of-Rohan_Siege 5
	end_while
end_if

	and I_SettlementOwner Anorien = sicily

	and I_CompareCounter Anorien_Local = 0

			create_unit Westfold, Dismounted Eored Lancers Mercs, num 3, exp 0, arm 0, wep 0
			create_unit Westfold, Rohan Axemen Mercs, num 2, exp 0, arm 0, wep 0
		inc_counter PT 1
		set_counter Westfold_Siege 2
	end_while
end_if

end_monitor

;########################### MONEY INVESTMENTS ##############################

	monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionType sicily
		and I_TurnNumber > 0
		and not IsFactionAIControlled
		and Treasury > 2000000

		increment_kings_purse sicily 50
		add_money sicily -5000
	end_monitor

	monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionType milan
		and I_TurnNumber > 0
		and not IsFactionAIControlled
		and Treasury > 2000000

		increment_kings_purse milan 50
		add_money milan -5000
	end_monitor

	monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionType scotland
		and I_TurnNumber > 0
		and not IsFactionAIControlled
		and Treasury > 2000000

		increment_kings_purse scotland 50
		add_money scotland -5000
	end_monitor

	end_monitor

	monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionType mongols
		and I_TurnNumber > 0
		and not IsFactionAIControlled
		and Treasury > 250000

		increment_kings_purse mongols 25
		add_money mongols -2500
	end_monitor

;########################### MONEY SCRIPT ##############################
;############################ MONEY DEPT ###############################



	monitor_event PreFactionTurnStart FactionType england
		and IsFactionAIControlled
		and Treasury < -1000
		
			add_money england 5000
		
	end_monitor

	monitor_event PreFactionTurnStart FactionType france
		and IsFactionAIControlled
		and Treasury < -1000
		
			add_money france 5000
		
	end_monitor

	monitor_event PreFactionTurnStart FactionType hre
		and IsFactionAIControlled
		and Treasury < -1000
		
			add_money hre 5000
		
	end_monitor

	monitor_event PreFactionTurnStart FactionType portugal
		and IsFactionAIControlled
		and Treasury < -1000
		
			add_money portugal 5000
		
	end_monitor

	monitor_event PreFactionTurnStart FactionType spain
		and IsFactionAIControlled
		and Treasury < -1000
		
			add_money spain 5000
		
	end_monitor

	monitor_event PreFactionTurnStart FactionType venice
		and IsFactionAIControlled
		and Treasury < -1000
		
			add_money venice 5000
		
	end_monitor

	monitor_event PreFactionTurnStart FactionType sicily
		and IsFactionAIControlled
		and Treasury < -1000
		
			add_money sicily 5000
		
	end_monitor

	monitor_event PreFactionTurnStart FactionType milan
		and IsFactionAIControlled
		and Treasury < -1000
		
			add_money milan 5000
		
	end_monitor

	monitor_event PreFactionTurnStart FactionType scotland
		and IsFactionAIControlled
		and Treasury < -1000
		
			add_money scotland 5000
		
	end_monitor

	monitor_event PreFactionTurnStart FactionType moors
		and IsFactionAIControlled
		and Treasury < -1000
		
			add_money moors 5000
		
	end_monitor

	monitor_event PreFactionTurnStart FactionType turks
		and IsFactionAIControlled
		and Treasury < -1000
		
			add_money turks 5000
		
	end_monitor

	monitor_event PreFactionTurnStart FactionType egypt
		and IsFactionAIControlled
		and Treasury < -1000
		
			add_money egypt 5000
		
	end_monitor

	monitor_event PreFactionTurnStart FactionType mongols
		and IsFactionAIControlled
		and Treasury < -1000
		
			add_money mongols 5000
		
	end_monitor

;########################## TOO MUCH MONEY SCRIPT ############################

	monitor_event FactionTurnEnd FactionType england
		and IsFactionAIControlled
		and Treasury > 25000
		and I_TurnNumber < 40
			add_money england -3000
	end_monitor

	monitor_event FactionTurnEnd FactionType france
		and IsFactionAIControlled
		and Treasury > 25000
		and I_TurnNumber < 40
			add_money france -3000	
	end_monitor

	monitor_event FactionTurnEnd FactionType england
		and IsFactionAIControlled
		and Treasury > 35000
		and I_TurnNumber >= 40
			add_money england -5000
	end_monitor

		and IsFactionAIControlled
		and Treasury > 35000

;####################### Capital Change Cost #########################
	monitor_event FactionNewCapital not IsFactionAIControlled
		historic_event capital_change
		console_command add_money -5000
	end_monitor

;########################### REGIONAL VIDEOS ##############################
        monitor_event TileSeen not FactionType sicily
                               and FactionIsLocal
                               and IsPositionInRect 243 126 2 2
                               and I_CompareCounter is_remote_viewing == 0
                historic_event reached_tirith event/reached_minas_tirith.bik
                terminate_monitor
        end_monitor

        monitor_event TileSeen not FactionType milan
                               and FactionIsLocal
                               and IsPositionInRect 182 154 1 1
                               and I_CompareCounter is_remote_viewing == 0
                historic_event reached_edoras event/reached_edoras.bik
                terminate_monitor
        end_monitor

        monitor_event TileSeen not FactionType milan
                               and FactionIsLocal
                               and IsPositionInRect 167 161 2 2
                               and I_CompareCounter is_remote_viewing == 0
                historic_event reached_hornburg event/reached_helms_deep.bik
                terminate_monitor
        end_monitor

        monitor_event TileSeen not FactionType england
                               and FactionIsLocal
                               and IsPositionInRect 270 125 1 1
                               and I_CompareCounter is_remote_viewing == 0
                historic_event reached_morgul event/reached_morgul.bik
                terminate_monitor
        end_monitor

        monitor_event TileSeen not FactionType mongols
                               and FactionIsLocal
                               and IsPositionInRect 202 210 15 3
                               and I_CompareCounter is_remote_viewing == 0
                historic_event reached_lorien event/reached_lothlorien.bik
                terminate_monitor
        end_monitor

        monitor_event TileSeen not FactionType england
                               and FactionIsLocal
                               and IsPositionInRect 257 157 10 2
                               and I_CompareCounter is_remote_viewing == 0
                historic_event reached_marshes event/reached_dead_marshes.bik
                terminate_monitor
        end_monitor

        monitor_event TileSeen not FactionType slave
                               and FactionIsLocal
                               and IsPositionInRect 238 164 6 6
                               and I_CompareCounter is_remote_viewing == 0
                historic_event reached_rauros event/reached_falls_of_rauros.bik
                terminate_monitor
        end_monitor

        monitor_event TileSeen not FactionType england
                               and FactionIsLocal
                               and IsPositionInRect 272 148 2 2
                               and I_CompareCounter is_remote_viewing == 0
                historic_event reached_black_gate event/reached_black_gate.bik
                terminate_monitor
        end_monitor

        monitor_event TileSeen not FactionType england
                               and FactionIsLocal
                               and IsPositionInRect 289 137 2 2
                               and I_CompareCounter is_remote_viewing == 0
                historic_event reached_barad_dur event/reached_barad_dur.bik
                terminate_monitor
        end_monitor

        monitor_event TileSeen not FactionType turks
                               and not FactionType france
                               and FactionIsLocal
                               and IsPositionInRect 91 243 5 10
                               and I_CompareCounter is_remote_viewing == 0
                historic_event reached_shire event/reached_shire.bik
                terminate_monitor
        end_monitor

        monitor_event TileSeen not FactionType hre
                               and not FactionType moors
                               and FactionIsLocal
                               and IsPositionInRect 174 210 12 10
                               and I_CompareCounter is_remote_viewing == 0
                historic_event reached_misty event/reached_misty.bik
                terminate_monitor
        end_monitor

        monitor_event TileSeen not FactionType egypt
                               and not FactionType portugal
                               and FactionIsLocal
                               and IsPositionInRect 184 249 2 2
                               and I_CompareCounter is_remote_viewing == 0
                historic_event reached_rivendell event/reached_rivendell.bik
                terminate_monitor
        end_monitor

        monitor_event TileSeen not FactionType france
                               and not FactionType milan
                               and FactionIsLocal
                               and IsPositionInRect 164 189 2 2
                               and I_CompareCounter is_remote_viewing == 0
                historic_event reached_isengard event/reached_isengard.bik
                terminate_monitor
        end_monitor

;########################## CHANGE SETTLEMENT NAMES ###########################
;-------Moria--------
	declare_counter Misty-Mountains_Spain
	
	monitor_conditions I_SettlementOwner Misty-Mountains = moors
		and I_CompareCounter Misty-Mountains_Spain = 0
		
		set_counter Misty-Mountains_Spain 1
		change_settlement_name Misty-Mountains Khazad

 	end_monitor

	monitor_conditions not I_SettlementOwner Misty-Mountains = moors
		and I_SettlementOwner Misty-Mountains = hre
		and I_CompareCounter Misty-Mountains_Spain = 1

		set_counter Misty-Mountains_Spain 0
		change_settlement_name Misty-Mountains Misty-Mountains

 	end_monitor

;-------Minas Morgul--------
	declare_counter Morgul-Vale_Spain
	
	monitor_conditions I_SettlementOwner Morgul-Vale = sicily
		and I_CompareCounter Morgul-Vale_Spain = 0
		
		set_counter Morgul-Vale_Spain 1
		change_settlement_name Morgul-Vale Minas-Ithil

 	end_monitor

	monitor_conditions not I_SettlementOwner Morgul-Vale = sicily
		and I_SettlementOwner Morgul-Vale = england
		and I_CompareCounter Morgul-Vale_Spain = 1

		set_counter Morgul-Vale_Spain 0
		change_settlement_name Morgul-Vale Morgul-Vale

 	end_monitor

;######################## Leader Death Messages #######################

        declare_counter moors_becomesking
	declare_counter spain_becomesking
        declare_counter turks_becomesking
        declare_counter egypt_becomesking
        declare_counter mongols_becomesking
        declare_counter hre_becomesking
        declare_counter france_becomesking
        declare_counter scotland_becomesking
        declare_counter venice_becomesking
        declare_counter milan_becomesking
        declare_counter sicily_becomesking

	set_counter moors_becomesking 0
	set_counter spain_becomesking 0
	set_counter turks_becomesking 0
	set_counter egypt_becomesking 0
	set_counter mongols_becomesking 0
	set_counter hre_becomesking 0
	set_counter france_becomesking 0
	set_counter scotland_becomesking 0
	set_counter venice_becomesking 0
	set_counter milan_becomesking 0
	set_counter sicily_becomesking 0

	monitor_event BecomesFactionLeader IsFactionAIControlled
		and I_CompareCounter moors_becomesking < 1
		and FactionType moors
	set_counter moors_becomesking 1
	end_monitor

	monitor_event CharacterTurnEnd IsFactionAIControlled
		and I_CompareCounter moors_becomesking > 0
		and IsFactionLeader
		and FactionType moors
		add_events
			event historic moors_king_event
		date 0
	end_add_events
	set_counter moors_becomesking 0
	end_monitor

	monitor_event BecomesFactionLeader IsFactionAIControlled
		and I_CompareCounter spain_becomesking < 1
		and FactionType spain
	set_counter spain_becomesking 1
	end_monitor

	monitor_event CharacterTurnEnd IsFactionAIControlled
		and I_CompareCounter spain_becomesking > 0
		and IsFactionLeader
		and FactionType spain
		add_events
			event historic spain_king_event
		date 0
	end_add_events
	set_counter spain_becomesking 0
	end_monitor

	monitor_event BecomesFactionLeader IsFactionAIControlled
		and I_CompareCounter turks_becomesking < 1
		and FactionType turks
	set_counter turks_becomesking 1
	end_monitor

	monitor_event CharacterTurnEnd IsFactionAIControlled
		and I_CompareCounter turks_becomesking > 0
		and IsFactionLeader
		and FactionType turks
		add_events
			event historic turks_king_event
		date 0
	end_add_events
	set_counter turks_becomesking 0
	end_monitor

	monitor_event BecomesFactionLeader IsFactionAIControlled
		and I_CompareCounter egypt_becomesking < 1
		and FactionType egypt
	set_counter egypt_becomesking 1
	end_monitor

	monitor_event CharacterTurnEnd IsFactionAIControlled
		and I_CompareCounter egypt_becomesking > 0
		and IsFactionLeader
		and FactionType egypt
		add_events
			event historic egypt_king_event
		date 0
	end_add_events
	set_counter egypt_becomesking 0
	end_monitor

	monitor_event BecomesFactionLeader IsFactionAIControlled
		and I_CompareCounter mongols_becomesking < 1
		and FactionType mongols
	set_counter mongols_becomesking 1
	end_monitor

	monitor_event CharacterTurnEnd IsFactionAIControlled
		and I_CompareCounter mongols_becomesking > 0
		and IsFactionLeader
		and FactionType mongols
		add_events
			event historic mongols_king_event
		date 0
	end_add_events
	set_counter mongols_becomesking 0
	end_monitor

	monitor_event BecomesFactionLeader IsFactionAIControlled
		and I_CompareCounter hre_becomesking < 1
		and FactionType hre
	set_counter hre_becomesking 1
	end_monitor

	monitor_event CharacterTurnEnd IsFactionAIControlled
		and I_CompareCounter hre_becomesking > 0
		and IsFactionLeader
		and FactionType hre
		add_events
			event historic hre_king_event
		date 0
	end_add_events
	set_counter hre_becomesking 0
	end_monitor

	monitor_event BecomesFactionLeader IsFactionAIControlled
		and I_CompareCounter france_becomesking < 1
		and FactionType france
	set_counter france_becomesking 1
	end_monitor

	monitor_event CharacterTurnEnd IsFactionAIControlled
		and I_CompareCounter france_becomesking > 0
		and IsFactionLeader
		and FactionType france
		add_events
			event historic france_king_event
		date 0
	end_add_events
	set_counter france_becomesking 0
	end_monitor

	monitor_event BecomesFactionLeader IsFactionAIControlled
		and I_CompareCounter scotland_becomesking < 1
		and FactionType scotland
	set_counter scotland_becomesking 1
	end_monitor

	monitor_event CharacterTurnEnd IsFactionAIControlled
		and I_CompareCounter scotland_becomesking > 0
		and IsFactionLeader
		and FactionType scotland
		add_events
			event historic scotland_king_event
		date 0
	end_add_events
	set_counter scotland_becomesking 0
	end_monitor

	monitor_event BecomesFactionLeader IsFactionAIControlled
		and I_CompareCounter venice_becomesking < 1
		and FactionType venice
	set_counter venice_becomesking 1
	end_monitor

	monitor_event CharacterTurnEnd IsFactionAIControlled
		and I_CompareCounter venice_becomesking > 0
		and IsFactionLeader
		and FactionType venice
		add_events
			event historic venice_king_event
		date 0
	end_add_events
	set_counter venice_becomesking 0
	end_monitor

	monitor_event BecomesFactionLeader IsFactionAIControlled
		and I_CompareCounter milan_becomesking < 1
		and FactionType milan
	set_counter milan_becomesking 1
	end_monitor

	monitor_event CharacterTurnEnd IsFactionAIControlled
		and I_CompareCounter milan_becomesking > 0
		and IsFactionLeader
		and FactionType milan
		add_events
			event historic milan_king_event
		date 0
	end_add_events
	set_counter milan_becomesking 0
	end_monitor

	monitor_event BecomesFactionLeader IsFactionAIControlled
		and I_CompareCounter sicily_becomesking < 1
		and FactionType sicily
	set_counter sicily_becomesking 1
	end_monitor

	monitor_event CharacterTurnEnd IsFactionAIControlled
		and I_CompareCounter sicily_becomesking > 0
		and IsFactionLeader
		and FactionType sicily
		add_events
			event historic sicily_king_event
		date 0
	end_add_events
	set_counter sicily_becomesking 0
	end_monitor

;#####################################################################
;###################### Lost Capitals Messages #######################

;---------------------Gondor
monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionType sicily
	and IsFactionAIControlled
	and not I_SettlementOwner Anorien = sicily
	historic_event message_gondor_evil
terminate_monitor
end_monitor

;---------------------Rohan
monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionType milan
	and IsFactionAIControlled
	and not I_SettlementOwner Kings-Land = milan
	historic_event message_rohan_evil
terminate_monitor
end_monitor

;---------------------Eriador
monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionType turks
	and IsFactionAIControlled
	and not I_SettlementOwner Bree = turks
	historic_event message_eriador_evil
terminate_monitor
end_monitor

;---------------------Dale
monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionType scotland
	and IsFactionAIControlled
	and not I_SettlementOwner Dale = scotland
	historic_event message_dale_evil
terminate_monitor
end_monitor

;---------------------HE
monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionType egypt
	and IsFactionAIControlled
	and not I_SettlementOwner Imladris = egypt
	historic_event message_he_evil
terminate_monitor
end_monitor

;---------------------SE
monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionType mongols
	and IsFactionAIControlled
	and not I_SettlementOwner Elven-Mirkwood = mongols
	historic_event message_se_evil
terminate_monitor
end_monitor

;---------------------Dwarves
monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionType moors
	and IsFactionAIControlled
	and not I_SettlementOwner Erebor = moors
	historic_event message_dwarves_evil
terminate_monitor
end_monitor

;---------------------Isengard
monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionType france
	and IsFactionAIControlled
	and not I_SettlementOwner Nan-Curunir = france
	historic_event message_france_evil
terminate_monitor
end_monitor

;---------------------Mordor
monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionType england
	and IsFactionAIControlled
	and not I_SettlementOwner Gorgoroth = england
	and I_CompareCounter mordor_died < 1
	historic_event message_england_evil
terminate_monitor
end_monitor

;---------------------OOMM
monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionType hre
	and IsFactionAIControlled
	and not I_SettlementOwner Misty-Mountains = hre
	historic_event message_oomm_evil
terminate_monitor
end_monitor

;---------------------OOG
monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionType portugal
	and IsFactionAIControlled
	and not I_SettlementOwner Mt-Gram = portugal
	historic_event message_oog_evil
terminate_monitor
end_monitor

;---------------------Harad
monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionType spain
	and IsFactionAIControlled
	and not I_SettlementOwner Harad = spain
	historic_event message_harad_evil
terminate_monitor
end_monitor

;---------------------Rhun
monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionType venice
	and IsFactionAIControlled
	and not I_SettlementOwner Mistrand = venice
	historic_event message_rhun_evil
terminate_monitor
end_monitor

;################## G5 Autonomous Regions mod v1.3 ###################



;##############################################################################
;################################# Palantiri ##################################
;##############################################################################

declare_counter is_remote_viewing	;1 = palantir or mirror is currently viewing

;this counter holds the current status of palantir usage
; 0 = palantir settlement NOT selected or still counting down turns until next usage (no visual)
; 1 = palantir settlement IS selected, allowed to use this turn, but authorised/sauron not present here (orange)
; 2 = palantir settlement IS selected, allowed to use this turn, authorised governor in the selected settlement, sauron n/a (green)
; 3 = barad-dur is selected, allowed to use this turn, sauron is in barad and on local faction's side (red)
declare_counter pal_usage_status	

;Number of turns until palantiri can be next used.
;This is set in two places: below (initial wait) and in the main viewing monitor (subsequent waits). Search for "set_counter pal_turns_till_next_avail" to find.
declare_counter pal_turns_till_next_avail
set_counter pal_turns_till_next_avail 4

declare_counter pal_gov_authorised	;1 = the governor of the last-selected palantir city has the palantir_authorisation anc
declare_counter pal_sauron_in_barad 	;1 = sauron is in Barad-dur == a non-excommunicated Melkor faction (other than Isengard) holds Barad-dur
declare_counter pal_sauron_is_local_faction	;1 = sauron is on the side of the local faction (any Melkor faction except Isengard)
declare_counter pal_view_local_range	;1 = indicates to main viewing monitor that "local range" viewing is to take place

set_event_counter pal_sauron_local_and_in_barad 0	;1 = (pal_sauron_in_barad == 1) AND (pal_sauron_is_local_faction == 1)
set_event_counter pal_sauron_influence_this_turn 0	;1 = palantir used this turn (not by sauron) and sauron had control of Ithil stone
set_event_counter pal_elostirion_used_this_turn 0	;1 = Elostirion stone used this turn
set_event_counter pal_viewed_this_turn 0	;1 = a palantir was used this turn 
set_event_counter pal_intro_message 0	;identifies which intro message to show
set_event_counter pal_settlement_selected 0	;identifies which palantir settlement is selected (0 = none of the four)

declare_timer pal_view_timer	
declare_timer pal_animation_timer

;------------------ palantiri help and intros ------------------------

monitor_event ShortcutTriggered ShortcutTriggered help_scroll show_help 

	;if a palantir settlement is currently selected then dismiss the standard Help scroll 
	; and show the Palantiri Help event scroll

	if I_SettlementSelected Emyn-Beraid
	  call_object_shortcut help_scroll show_help 
		historic_event palantir_help
	end_if
	if I_SettlementSelected Nan-Curunir
	  call_object_shortcut help_scroll show_help 
		historic_event palantir_help
	end_if
	if I_SettlementSelected Anorien
	  call_object_shortcut help_scroll show_help 
		historic_event palantir_help
	end_if
	if I_SettlementSelected Gorgoroth
	  call_object_shortcut help_scroll show_help 
		historic_event palantir_help
	end_if

end_monitor

monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionIsLocal
  and I_TurnNumber == 1

	;Show intro message at game start if playing Gondor, Isengard, Mordor or HE (set pal_intro_message 
	; which will trigger the EventCounter monitor below).
	;For other factions just show an event explaining why they can't use palantiri yet.

	if I_LocalFaction sicily
		set_event_counter pal_intro_message 1
	end_if
	if I_LocalFaction france
		set_event_counter pal_intro_message 2
	end_if
	if I_LocalFaction england
		set_event_counter pal_intro_message 3
	end_if
	if I_LocalFaction egypt
		set_event_counter pal_intro_message 4
	end_if
	;other factions
	if not I_LocalFaction sicily
		and not I_LocalFaction france
		and not I_LocalFaction england
		and not I_LocalFaction egypt
		historic_event palantir_intro_non_pal_faction ;no movie, save that for settlement ownership
	end_if

terminate_monitor
end_monitor

monitor_event GiveSettlement TargetFactionIsLocal
	and IsRegionOneOf Emyn-Beraid_Province Nan-Curunir_Province Anorien_Province Gorgoroth_Province

	;The player's faction has been given a palantir settlement: show intro message
	
	if I_EventCounter pal_intro_message > 0
		;the intro message has already been shown for the local faction: kill this monitor
		terminate_monitor
	end_if

	;intro for sicily, france, england or egypt would have been shown at game start
	
	if not I_LocalFaction hre
		and not I_LocalFaction venice
		and not I_LocalFaction portugal
		and not I_LocalFaction spain
		;must be milan, scotland, mongols, turks or moors 
		set_event_counter pal_intro_message 5
	end_if

	;must be hre, venice, portugal or spain 
	set_event_counter pal_intro_message 6

terminate_monitor	
end_monitor

monitor_event GeneralCaptureSettlement FactionIsLocal
	and IsRegionOneOf Emyn-Beraid_Province Nan-Curunir_Province Anorien_Province Gorgoroth_Province

	;The player's faction has captured a palantir settlement: show intro message
	
	if I_EventCounter pal_intro_message > 0
		;the intro message has already been shown for the local faction: kill this monitor
		terminate_monitor
	end_if

	;intro for sicily, france, england or egypt would have been shown at game start
	
	if not I_LocalFaction hre
		and not I_LocalFaction venice
		and not I_LocalFaction portugal
		and not I_LocalFaction spain
		;must be milan, scotland, mongols, turks or moors 
		set_event_counter pal_intro_message 5
	end_if

	;must be hre, venice, portugal or spain 
	set_event_counter pal_intro_message 6

terminate_monitor	
end_monitor

monitor_event EventCounter EventCounterType pal_intro_message
	and I_EventCounter pal_intro_message > 0
	
	;pal_intro_message value indicates message type:
	; 1 = Gondor start
	; 2 = Isengard start
	; 3 = Mordor start
	; 4 = HE start
	; 5 = Good-other now owns palantir settlement (captured or given)
	; 6 = Evil-other now owns palantir settlement (captured or given)
	
	if I_EventCounter pal_intro_message == 1
		historic_event palantir_intro_gondor event/palantir.bik		
	end_if
	if I_EventCounter pal_intro_message == 2
		historic_event palantir_intro_isengard event/palantir.bik
	end_if
	if I_EventCounter pal_intro_message == 3
		historic_event palantir_intro_mordor event/palantir.bik
	end_if
	if I_EventCounter pal_intro_message == 4
		historic_event palantir_intro_he event/palantir.bik
	end_if
	if I_EventCounter pal_intro_message == 5
		historic_event palantir_intro_good event/palantir.bik
	end_if
	if I_EventCounter pal_intro_message == 6
		historic_event palantir_intro_evil event/palantir.bik
	end_if

terminate_monitor
end_monitor

;------------------ palantir usage started by user -------------------

monitor_event ShortcutTriggered ShortcutTriggered radar dec_scale
	and I_CompareCounter pal_usage_status >= 2
	and I_CompareCounter is_remote_viewing == 0
	
	;user wants to use palantir: show appropriate accept/decline (all/local) scroll 
	
	set_event_counter pal_start_viewing 0

	if I_CompareCounter pal_usage_status == 2
		set_event_counter palantir_use_normal_accepted 0
		set_event_counter palantir_use_normal_declined 0
		historic_event palantir_use_normal true
	end_if
	if I_CompareCounter pal_usage_status == 3
		set_event_counter palantir_use_sauron_accepted 0
		set_event_counter palantir_use_sauron_declined 0
		historic_event palantir_use_sauron true
	end_if

end_monitor

monitor_event EventCounter EventCounterType palantir_use_normal_accepted
  and I_EventCounter palantir_use_normal_accepted == 1	
	set_counter pal_view_local_range 0
	set_event_counter pal_start_viewing 1	
end_monitor
		
monitor_event EventCounter EventCounterType palantir_use_normal_declined
  and I_EventCounter palantir_use_normal_declined == 1	
	set_counter pal_view_local_range 1
	set_event_counter pal_start_viewing 1	
end_monitor
		
monitor_event EventCounter EventCounterType palantir_use_sauron_accepted
  and I_EventCounter palantir_use_sauron_accepted == 1	
	set_counter pal_view_local_range 0
	set_event_counter pal_start_viewing 1	
end_monitor
		
monitor_event EventCounter EventCounterType palantir_use_sauron_declined
  and I_EventCounter palantir_use_sauron_declined == 1	
	set_counter pal_view_local_range 1
	set_event_counter pal_start_viewing 1	
end_monitor

;------------------ main viewing monitor -----------------------------
			
monitor_event EventCounter EventCounterType pal_start_viewing
	and I_EventCounter pal_start_viewing == 1
	
	;These IFs are seemingly redundant but it is possible that these conditions are no longer true by the
	; time the user chooses accept/decline from the event scroll (they could minimise it and (e.g.) select 
	; a different settlement in the meantime). These could be made monitor conditions instead.
	if I_CompareCounter pal_usage_status >= 2
	  and I_CompareCounter is_remote_viewing == 0
		
		;CHANGE THIS NUMBER TO CONTROL TURNS-UNTIL-NEXT-VIEWING
		set_counter pal_turns_till_next_avail 5	
		
		set_counter is_remote_viewing 1
		set_event_counter pal_cancel 0
		set_event_counter pal_viewed_this_turn 1
		
		steal_esc_key on
		disable_save
		disable_entire_ui
		hide_ui
		disable_movie_view
		
		;store the selected settlement for returning to at the end
		;(Could probably just use pal_settlement_selected here instead of new pal_selected counter.)
		if I_SettlementSelected Emyn-Beraid
			set_event_counter pal_selected 1
			set_event_counter pal_elostirion_used_this_turn 1
		end_if
		if I_SettlementSelected Nan-Curunir
			set_event_counter pal_selected 2
		end_if
		if I_SettlementSelected Anorien
			set_event_counter pal_selected 3	
		end_if
		if I_SettlementSelected Gorgoroth
			set_event_counter pal_selected 4
		end_if		
		
		;sauron will only have bad effects on the faction using the palantir if
		; 1) not local sauron (if he is local then only he can use palantiri; he can not have bad effects on himself), and
		; 2) sauron is in barad, and
		; 3) it is not the elostirion-stone being used (as that cannot communicate with other stones)
		set_event_counter pal_sauron_influence_this_turn 0
		if I_CompareCounter pal_sauron_is_local_faction == 0
		  and I_CompareCounter pal_sauron_in_barad == 1
		  and I_EventCounter pal_selected > 1
			set_event_counter pal_sauron_influence_this_turn 1
		end_if
		
		;only spawn armies if sauron influence and Mordor faction still exists
		set_event_counter pal_spawn_fakes 0
		if I_EventCounter pal_sauron_influence_this_turn == 1
			and I_NumberOfSettlements england > 0
			set_event_counter pal_spawn_fakes 1
		end_if
		
		;play sfx on first location only
		;if using the eye then play the "voice" version
		if I_EventCounter pal_sauron_local_and_in_barad == 1
			play_sound_event PALANTIR_VOICE tag = pal_sfx
		end_if
		;if not using the eye then play the "voiceless" version
		if I_EventCounter pal_sauron_local_and_in_barad == 0
			play_sound_event PALANTIR tag = pal_sfx
		end_if
		
		;if sauron influence then choose random place to play sauron SFX
		set_event_counter pal_sauron_voice_location 0
		set_event_counter pal_sauron_voice_sfx 0
		if I_EventCounter pal_sauron_influence_this_turn == 1
			generate_random_counter pal_sauron_voice_location 4 12	
			generate_random_counter pal_sauron_voice_sfx 1 100
		end_if
				
	
		;spawn character in "should not be seen"
	  faction_emerge hungary timurids 1 85.0 100.0 1.2 town false hungary_leader Temporary 30
		;must include an army in emerge
		spawn_army
			faction hungary
			character	TemporaryIII, named character, age 18, x 397, y 341  
			unit Mordor Catapult	exp 0 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0		
		end			
		spawn_character hungary, Palantir, merchant, age 18, x 396, y 341
		if I_LocalFaction venice
			give_everything_to_faction hungary venice false
		end_if
		if I_LocalFaction sicily
			give_everything_to_faction hungary sicily false
		end_if
		if I_LocalFaction milan
			give_everything_to_faction hungary milan false
		end_if
		if I_LocalFaction france
			give_everything_to_faction hungary france false
		end_if
		if I_LocalFaction england
			give_everything_to_faction hungary england false
		end_if
		if I_LocalFaction egypt
			give_everything_to_faction hungary egypt false
		end_if
		if I_LocalFaction hre
			give_everything_to_faction hungary hre false
		end_if
		if I_LocalFaction scotland
			give_everything_to_faction hungary scotland false
		end_if
		if I_LocalFaction mongols
			give_everything_to_faction hungary mongols false
		end_if
		if I_LocalFaction turks
			give_everything_to_faction hungary turks false
		end_if
		if I_LocalFaction portugal
			give_everything_to_faction hungary portugal false
		end_if
		if I_LocalFaction spain
			give_everything_to_faction hungary spain false
		end_if
		if I_LocalFaction moors
			give_everything_to_faction hungary moors false
		end_if
		
		;kill the army; their job is done
		kill_character TemporaryIII
		
		;add traits etc.
		console_command give_trait Palantir Palantir_Vision 1
		console_command mp Palantir -1
		
		;spawn fake armies
		if I_EventCounter pal_spawn_fakes == 1
		
		  ;trigger monitor to spawn fake armies
			set_event_counter pal_spawn_fake_now 3
			
			;wait for spawn to complete
			while I_EventCounter pal_spawn_fake_now == 3
			end_while

		  ;initialise spawn location indexes
			set_event_counter pal_sl1_idx 0
			set_event_counter pal_sl2_idx 0
			set_event_counter pal_sl3_idx 0
			
		end_if

		
		set_event_counter pal_view_number 1

		;Main loop, providing multiple gazes per viewing. This is currently redundant because there is only 1 gaze per viewing.
		while I_EventCounter pal_view_number <= 1 ;THIS NUMBER CONTROLS HOW MANY GAZES PER VIEWING
		
			;--- START OF GENERATED PALANTIRI CODE ---


			;randomly select the starting view bounds
			if I_CompareCounter pal_view_local_range == 0
				generate_random_counter pal_vb_idx 1 19
			end_if
			if I_CompareCounter pal_view_local_range == 1
				if I_EventCounter pal_selected == 1
					set_event_counter pal_vb_idx 1
					if RandomPercent <= 34
						set_event_counter pal_vb_idx 2
					end_if
				end_if
				if I_EventCounter pal_selected == 2
					set_event_counter pal_vb_idx 2
					if RandomPercent <= 66
						set_event_counter pal_vb_idx 3
					end_if
				end_if
				if I_EventCounter pal_selected == 3
					set_event_counter pal_vb_idx 4
					if RandomPercent <= 66
						set_event_counter pal_vb_idx 5
					end_if
				end_if
				if I_EventCounter pal_selected == 4
					set_event_counter pal_vb_idx 5
					if RandomPercent <= 34
						set_event_counter pal_vb_idx 6
					end_if
				end_if
			end_if

			;randomly select the starting view location within the selected bounds
			if I_EventCounter pal_vb_idx == 1
				generate_random_counter pal_vl_idx 1 71
			end_if
			if I_EventCounter pal_vb_idx == 2
				generate_random_counter pal_vl_idx 72 164
				generate_random_counter pal_sl1_idx 1 9
				generate_random_counter pal_sl2_idx 1 9
				generate_random_counter pal_sl3_idx 1 9
			end_if
			if I_EventCounter pal_vb_idx == 3
				generate_random_counter pal_vl_idx 165 258
				generate_random_counter pal_sl1_idx 10 13
				generate_random_counter pal_sl2_idx 10 13
				generate_random_counter pal_sl3_idx 10 13
			end_if
			if I_EventCounter pal_vb_idx == 4
				generate_random_counter pal_vl_idx 259 293
				generate_random_counter pal_sl1_idx 14 19
				generate_random_counter pal_sl2_idx 14 19
				generate_random_counter pal_sl3_idx 14 19
			end_if
			if I_EventCounter pal_vb_idx == 5
				generate_random_counter pal_vl_idx 294 381
				generate_random_counter pal_sl1_idx 20 26
				generate_random_counter pal_sl2_idx 20 26
				generate_random_counter pal_sl3_idx 20 26
			end_if
			if I_EventCounter pal_vb_idx == 6
				generate_random_counter pal_vl_idx 382 459
				generate_random_counter pal_sl1_idx 27 34
				generate_random_counter pal_sl2_idx 27 34
				generate_random_counter pal_sl3_idx 27 34
			end_if

				generate_random_counter pal_vl_idx 460 473

				if I_EventCounter pal_sl3_idx == 53
					console_command move_character FakeArmyC, 170, 127
					reposition_character FakeArmyC, 170, 127
				end_if
			end_if


			;pause after initial jump... give time for fade in
			restart_timer pal_view_timer
			while I_TimerElapsed pal_view_timer < 1700
				and I_EventCounter pal_cancel == 0
			end_while


			set_event_counter pal_loc_number 1

			while I_EventCounter pal_loc_number <= 16
				and I_EventCounter pal_cancel == 0

				restart_timer pal_view_timer

				;play sauron SFX
				inc_event_counter pal_sauron_voice_location -1
				if I_EventCounter pal_sauron_voice_location == 0
					if I_EventCounter pal_sauron_voice_sfx < 50
						play_sound_event PALANTIR_I_SEE_YOU
					end_if
					if I_EventCounter pal_sauron_voice_sfx >= 50
						play_sound_event PALANTIR_CANNOT_HIDE
					end_if
				end_if

				;jump to the location and choose the next (TrueCondition just allows block-collapsing in editor)
				if TrueCondition  

					if I_EventCounter pal_vl_idx < 58
						if I_EventCounter pal_vl_idx == 1
							console_command move_character Palantir, 127, 243
							move_strat_camera 127, 243
							generate_random_counter pal_vl_idx_sel 1 4
							if I_EventCounter pal_vl_idx_sel == 1
								set_event_counter pal_vl_idx 893
							end_if
							if I_EventCounter pal_vl_idx_sel == 2
								set_event_counter pal_vl_idx 892
							end_if
							if I_EventCounter pal_vl_idx_sel == 3
								set_event_counter pal_vl_idx 891
							end_if
							if I_EventCounter pal_vl_idx_sel == 4
								set_event_counter pal_vl_idx 85
							end_if
						end_if
						if I_EventCounter pal_vl_idx == 2
							console_command move_character Palantir, 127, 250
							move_strat_camera 127, 250
							generate_random_counter pal_vl_idx_sel 1 4
							if I_EventCounter pal_vl_idx_sel == 1
								set_event_counter pal_vl_idx 894
							end_if
							if I_EventCounter pal_vl_idx_sel == 2
								set_event_counter pal_vl_idx 893
							end_if
							if I_EventCounter pal_vl_idx_sel == 3
								set_event_counter pal_vl_idx 892
							end_if
							if I_EventCounter pal_vl_idx_sel == 4
								set_event_counter pal_vl_idx 1
							end_if
						end_if
						if I_EventCounter pal_vl_idx == 3
							console_command move_character Palantir, 127, 257
							move_strat_camera 127, 257
							generate_random_counter pal_vl_idx_sel 1 4
							if I_EventCounter pal_vl_idx_sel == 1
								set_event_counter pal_vl_idx 895
							end_if
							if I_EventCounter pal_vl_idx_sel == 2
								set_event_counter pal_vl_idx 894
							end_if

								set_event_counter pal_vl_idx 1604
							end_if

							end_if
							if I_EventCounter pal_vl_idx_sel == 3
								set_event_counter pal_vl_idx 1602
							end_if
							if I_EventCounter pal_vl_idx_sel == 4
								set_event_counter pal_vl_idx 1617
							end_if
						end_if

								set_event_counter pal_vl_idx 1615
							end_if
							if I_EventCounter pal_vl_idx_sel == 3
								set_event_counter pal_vl_idx 1614
							end_if
							if I_EventCounter pal_vl_idx_sel == 4
								set_event_counter pal_vl_idx 1629
							end_if

							if I_EventCounter pal_vl_idx_sel == 4
								set_event_counter pal_vl_idx 1630

							end_if
							if I_EventCounter pal_vl_idx_sel == 3

							end_if
						end_if

							move_strat_camera 120, 166
