								set_event_counter pal_vl_idx 1625
							end_if
							if I_EventCounter pal_vl_idx_sel == 2
								set_event_counter pal_vl_idx 1624
							end_if
							if I_EventCounter pal_vl_idx_sel == 3
								set_event_counter pal_vl_idx 1623
							end_if
							if I_EventCounter pal_vl_idx_sel == 4
								set_event_counter pal_vl_idx 1637
							end_if
						end_if
						if I_EventCounter pal_vl_idx == 1639
							console_command move_character Palantir, 120, 173
							move_strat_camera 120, 173
							generate_random_counter pal_vl_idx_sel 1 4
							if I_EventCounter pal_vl_idx_sel == 1
								set_event_counter pal_vl_idx 1626
							end_if
							if I_EventCounter pal_vl_idx_sel == 2
								set_event_counter pal_vl_idx 1625
							end_if
							if I_EventCounter pal_vl_idx_sel == 3
								set_event_counter pal_vl_idx 1624
							end_if
							if I_EventCounter pal_vl_idx_sel == 4
								set_event_counter pal_vl_idx 1638
							end_if
						end_if
						if I_EventCounter pal_vl_idx == 1640
							console_command move_character Palantir, 120, 180
							move_strat_camera 120, 180
							generate_random_counter pal_vl_idx_sel 1 4
							if I_EventCounter pal_vl_idx_sel == 1
								set_event_counter pal_vl_idx 1627
							end_if
							if I_EventCounter pal_vl_idx_sel == 2
								set_event_counter pal_vl_idx 1626
							end_if
							if I_EventCounter pal_vl_idx_sel == 3
								set_event_counter pal_vl_idx 1625
							end_if
							if I_EventCounter pal_vl_idx_sel == 4
								set_event_counter pal_vl_idx 1639
							end_if
						end_if
						if I_EventCounter pal_vl_idx == 1641
							console_command move_character Palantir, 120, 187
							move_strat_camera 120, 187
							generate_random_counter pal_vl_idx_sel 1 4
							if I_EventCounter pal_vl_idx_sel == 1
								set_event_counter pal_vl_idx 872
							end_if
							if I_EventCounter pal_vl_idx_sel == 2
								set_event_counter pal_vl_idx 1627
							end_if
							if I_EventCounter pal_vl_idx_sel == 3
								set_event_counter pal_vl_idx 1626
							end_if
							if I_EventCounter pal_vl_idx_sel == 4
								set_event_counter pal_vl_idx 1640
							end_if
						end_if
					end_if
				end_if


				;--- END OF GENERATED PALANTIRI CODE ---
				
				;pause for duration or until cancelled
				while I_TimerElapsed pal_view_timer < 1750
					and I_EventCounter pal_cancel == 0			
				end_while				
				
				;allow some extra time to view first loc; for player to get bearings
				if I_EventCounter pal_loc_number == 1
					restart_timer pal_view_timer 
					while I_TimerElapsed pal_view_timer < 800
						and I_EventCounter pal_cancel == 0			
					end_while
				end_if
				
				;pause if scrolls open
				set_event_counter pal_scrolls_open 1
				while I_EventCounter pal_scrolls_open == 1				
					if not I_ScrollOpen enemy_settlement_info_scroll
					  and not I_ScrollOpen own_settlement_info_scroll
						set_event_counter pal_scrolls_open 0
					end_if
				end_while
				
				inc_event_counter pal_loc_number 1
				
			end_while ;next location				

			;fade out this view
			console_command move_character Palantir, 399, 340  ;"should not be seen"
			campaign_wait 0.7
			
			inc_event_counter pal_view_number 1
			set_event_counter pal_cancel 0
			
		end_while ;next view
		
		;kill Palantir
		kill_character Palantir
    
		
		;kill fakes
		if I_EventCounter pal_spawn_fakes == 1
			console_command move_character FakeArmyA, 369, 331
			console_command move_character FakeArmyB, 370, 331
			console_command move_character FakeArmyC, 371, 331
			kill_character FakeArmyA
			kill_character FakeArmyB
			kill_character FakeArmyC
			destroy_units england Mordor Orcs Illusion
		end_if

		;return camera and selection to settlement
		if I_EventCounter pal_selected == 1	;elostirion
			snap_strat_camera 66, 238
			select_settlement Emyn-Beraid
		end_if
		if I_EventCounter pal_selected == 2	;orthanc
			snap_strat_camera 164, 189
			select_settlement Nan-Curunir
		end_if
		if I_EventCounter pal_selected == 3	;anor
			snap_strat_camera 239, 128
			select_settlement Anorien
		end_if
		if I_EventCounter pal_selected == 4	;ithil
			snap_strat_camera 290, 138
			select_settlement Gorgoroth
		end_if
	
		enable_entire_ui
		show_ui
		enable_save			
		
		set_event_counter pal_cancel 0
		set_counter is_remote_viewing 0
		steal_esc_key off
		
		;stopping causes a click
		;stop_sound_event pal_sfx

	end_if
	
end_monitor	

monitor_event EscPressed TrueCondition 

	;"cancel" behaviour for viewing monitor

	if I_CompareCounter is_remote_viewing == 1
		;this signals the main monitor to cancel the viewing 
		set_event_counter pal_cancel 1

		;resteal Esc key for next view; main monitor will unsteal when it's finished
		steal_esc_key on	
	end_if
	
	if I_CompareCounter is_remote_viewing == 0
		;in case somehow the key was stolen after main monitor unstole it
		steal_esc_key off
	end_if

end_monitor

;------------ set pal_gov_authorised counter -----------------------

;pal_gov_authorised == 1 only if the selected settlement has a palantir and its governor has the palantir_authorisation ancillary.
;It does not check for this anc directly (no condition for that); instead it checks the Combat_V_Faction_Papal_States trait
; which is set via the character having the anc.
;NOTE: pal_gov_authorised is NOT set to 0 when a non-palantir settlement is selected.
;This counter is used by SettlementSelected monitor in next section: these monitors must precede that one in this script.

monitor_event SettlementSelected I_CompareCounter pal_gov_authorised == 0
	and IsRegionOneOf Emyn-Beraid_Province Nan-Curunir_Province Anorien_Province Gorgoroth_Province
	and GovernorAttribute Combat_V_Faction_Papal_States >= 100
	
	set_counter pal_gov_authorised 1	
end_monitor
	
monitor_event SettlementSelected I_CompareCounter pal_gov_authorised == 1
	and not GovernorInResidence
	
	set_counter pal_gov_authorised 0	
end_monitor
	
monitor_event SettlementSelected I_CompareCounter pal_gov_authorised == 1
	and IsRegionOneOf Emyn-Beraid_Province Nan-Curunir_Province Anorien_Province Gorgoroth_Province
	and GovernorAttribute Combat_V_Faction_Papal_States < 100
	
	set_counter pal_gov_authorised 0	
end_monitor
	
;------------ animation and usage monitor -----------------------

monitor_event SettlementSelected TrueCondition 

	;This just sets pal_settlement_selected according to the settlement currently selected, which in turn
	; triggers the following animation monitor.
	;It caters for the situation where a palantir city is selected (animation showing) then the player
	; selects a different palantir city. It will first set pal_settlement_selected to 0, breaking the 
	; animation loop and thus letting that monitor exit, then set it to the correct city value re-triggering
	; the animation monitor.
	;Currently the logic does not really need pal_settlement_selected values to represent cities; just 0 (not pal city) or 1.
	; The animation monitor does use them in one place but simply using 4x I_SettlementSelected there would be enough.

	;reset to zero and give time for the animation loop to break
	set_event_counter pal_settlement_selected 0
	wait 0.1

	;which settlement is selected?
	if I_SettlementSelected Emyn-Beraid
		set_event_counter pal_settlement_selected 1
	end_if
	if I_SettlementSelected Nan-Curunir
		set_event_counter pal_settlement_selected 2
	end_if
	if I_SettlementSelected Anorien
		set_event_counter pal_settlement_selected 3	
	end_if
	if I_SettlementSelected Gorgoroth
		set_event_counter pal_settlement_selected 4
	end_if		

end_monitor
	
monitor_event EventCounter EventCounterType pal_settlement_selected	
	
	set_event_counter pal_animation_showing 0
	set_counter pal_usage_status 0
		
	if I_EventCounter pal_settlement_selected > 0 
		and I_CompareCounter pal_turns_till_next_avail <= 0		
		
		;default to status == 1
		set_counter pal_usage_status 1
	
		;can Sauron use the palantir?
		; only true if
		; 1) sauron is local faction and in barad-dur
		; 2) barad-dur is the currently selected settlement
		if I_EventCounter pal_sauron_local_and_in_barad == 1
			and I_SettlementSelected Gorgoroth
			set_counter pal_usage_status 3
		end_if
		;can the authorised use the palantir in this settlement?
		; only true if
		; 1) not already set to true for sauron above (avoids a (e.g.) Mordor general using the Anor stone when Sauron has the Ithil)
		; 2) either sauron is not local faction or he is not in barad-dur
		; 3) the selected settlement's governor is authorised		
		if I_CompareCounter pal_usage_status < 3
			and I_EventCounter pal_sauron_local_and_in_barad == 0
			and I_CompareCounter pal_gov_authorised == 1
			set_counter pal_usage_status 2
		end_if

		
		restart_timer pal_animation_timer
		set_event_counter pal_is_first_iteration 1
		set_event_counter pal_animation_idx 0
		set_event_counter pal_animation_going_up 1

		while I_EventCounter pal_settlement_selected > 0
		  and I_CompareCounter pal_turns_till_next_avail <= 0
			
			monitor_conditions I_TimerElapsed pal_animation_timer > 100			
			
				;do not remove if not present: error in log
				if I_EventCounter pal_animation_showing == 1
					ui_indicator_remove 0
				end_if		
				
				;increment index and restart if necessary
				if I_EventCounter pal_animation_going_up == 1	;going up
					inc_event_counter pal_animation_idx 1
					if I_EventCounter pal_animation_idx > 9
						set_event_counter pal_animation_going_up 0  ;go down
					end_if			
				end_if
				if I_EventCounter pal_animation_going_up == 0	;going down
					inc_event_counter pal_animation_idx -1
					if I_EventCounter pal_animation_idx < 1
						set_event_counter pal_animation_idx 1
						set_event_counter pal_animation_going_up 1  ;go up
					end_if			
				end_if
				
				;status 1: orange animation
				if I_CompareCounter pal_usage_status == 1
					if I_EventCounter pal_animation_idx == 1					
						ui_indicator 0 circle 14 746 colour 34 28 24 scale 0.14 period 0.0 loop
					end_if
					if I_EventCounter pal_animation_idx == 2
						ui_indicator 0 circle 14 746 colour 55 39 22 scale 0.14 period 0.0 loop
					end_if
					if I_EventCounter pal_animation_idx == 3
						ui_indicator 0 circle 14 746 colour 79 51 20 scale 0.14 period 0.0 loop
					end_if
					if I_EventCounter pal_animation_idx == 4
						ui_indicator 0 circle 14 746 colour 110 61 17 scale 0.14 period 0.0 loop
					end_if
					if I_EventCounter pal_animation_idx == 5
						ui_indicator 0 circle 14 746 colour 140 81 14 scale 0.14 period 0.0 loop
					end_if
					if I_EventCounter pal_animation_idx == 6
						ui_indicator 0 circle 14 746 colour 164 94 12 scale 0.14 period 0.0 loop
					end_if
					if I_EventCounter pal_animation_idx == 7
						ui_indicator 0 circle 14 746 colour 187 105 10 scale 0.14 period 0.0 loop
					end_if
					if I_EventCounter pal_animation_idx == 8
						ui_indicator 0 circle 14 746 colour 203 114 8 scale 0.14 period 0.0 loop
					end_if
					if I_EventCounter pal_animation_idx == 9
						ui_indicator 0 circle 14 746 colour 232 131 0 scale 0.14 period 0.0 loop
					end_if
				end_if
				
				;status 2: green animation
				if I_CompareCounter pal_usage_status == 2
					if I_EventCounter pal_animation_idx == 1					
						ui_indicator 0 circle 14 746 colour 34 28 24 scale 0.14 period 0.0 loop
					end_if
					if I_EventCounter pal_animation_idx == 2
						ui_indicator 0 circle 14 746 colour 31 40 23 scale 0.14 period 0.0 loop
					end_if
					if I_EventCounter pal_animation_idx == 3
						ui_indicator 0 circle 14 746 colour 28 58 20 scale 0.14 period 0.0 loop
					end_if
					if I_EventCounter pal_animation_idx == 4
						ui_indicator 0 circle 14 746 colour 24 77 18 scale 0.14 period 0.0 loop
					end_if
					if I_EventCounter pal_animation_idx == 5
						ui_indicator 0 circle 14 746 colour 20 95 16 scale 0.14 period 0.0 loop
					end_if
					if I_EventCounter pal_animation_idx == 6
						ui_indicator 0 circle 14 746 colour 16 110 14 scale 0.14 period 0.0 loop
					end_if
					if I_EventCounter pal_animation_idx == 7
						ui_indicator 0 circle 14 746 colour 13 126 12 scale 0.14 period 0.0 loop
					end_if
					if I_EventCounter pal_animation_idx == 8
						ui_indicator 0 circle 14 746 colour 10 138 11 scale 0.14 period 0.0 loop
					end_if
					if I_EventCounter pal_animation_idx == 9
						ui_indicator 0 circle 14 746 colour 7 155 9 scale 0.14 period 0.0 loop
					end_if
				end_if
				
				;status 3: red animation
				if I_CompareCounter pal_usage_status == 3
					if I_EventCounter pal_animation_idx == 1					
						ui_indicator 0 circle 14 746 colour 34 28 24 scale 0.14 period 0.0 loop
					end_if
					if I_EventCounter pal_animation_idx == 2
						ui_indicator 0 circle 14 746 colour 52 26 22 scale 0.14 period 0.0 loop
					end_if
					if I_EventCounter pal_animation_idx == 3
						ui_indicator 0 circle 14 746 colour 77 23 20 scale 0.14 period 0.0 loop
					end_if
					if I_EventCounter pal_animation_idx == 4
						ui_indicator 0 circle 14 746 colour 106 19 17 scale 0.14 period 0.0 loop
					end_if
					if I_EventCounter pal_animation_idx == 5
						ui_indicator 0 circle 14 746 colour 133 16 14 scale 0.14 period 0.0 loop
					end_if
					if I_EventCounter pal_animation_idx == 6
						ui_indicator 0 circle 14 746 colour 157 13 11 scale 0.14 period 0.0 loop
					end_if
					if I_EventCounter pal_animation_idx == 7
						ui_indicator 0 circle 14 746 colour 182 10 9 scale 0.14 period 0.0 loop
					end_if
					if I_EventCounter pal_animation_idx == 8
						ui_indicator 0 circle 14 746 colour 199 8 7 scale 0.14 period 0.0 loop
					end_if
					if I_EventCounter pal_animation_idx == 9
						ui_indicator 0 circle 14 746 colour 227 4 4 scale 0.14 period 0.0 loop
					end_if
				end_if
				
				set_event_counter pal_animation_showing 1
				
				restart_timer pal_animation_timer
				set_event_counter pal_is_first_iteration 0
				
			end_monitor
		
			;exit the loop if the same palantir settlement is no longer selected
			;(Probably enough just to test for any pal city being selected here.)
			if I_EventCounter pal_settlement_selected == 1
				and not I_SettlementSelected Emyn-Beraid
				set_event_counter pal_settlement_selected 0
			end_if
			if I_EventCounter pal_settlement_selected == 2
				and not I_SettlementSelected Nan-Curunir
				set_event_counter pal_settlement_selected 0
			end_if
			if I_EventCounter pal_settlement_selected == 3
				and not I_SettlementSelected Anorien
				set_event_counter pal_settlement_selected 0	
			end_if
			if I_EventCounter pal_settlement_selected == 4
				and not I_SettlementSelected Gorgoroth
				set_event_counter pal_settlement_selected 0
			end_if		
			
		end_while
		
		;got to here either because 
		; 1) palantir settlement no longer selected, or
		; 2) palantir has now been used this turn 
		set_counter pal_usage_status 0
	
		if I_EventCounter pal_animation_showing == 1
			ui_indicator_remove 0
		end_if		
		set_event_counter pal_animation_showing 0
		
	end_if
	
end_monitor

;-------------- other turn end/start counters/monitors ---------------------

monitor_event PreFactionTurnStart FactionIsLocal
	and FactionReligion catholic
	and not FactionType france
	
	set_counter pal_sauron_is_local_faction 1
	
	;only needs to be set once per campaign: terminate
	terminate_monitor	
end_monitor

monitor_event FactionTurnEnd FactionIsLocal
	and FactionType egypt
	and I_EventCounter pal_elostirion_used_this_turn == 1
	and RandomPercent >= 50
	
	;elves leaving due to seeing Valinor etc.

	set_event_counter palantir_elf_pop_drop 0
	
	if I_SettlementOwner Mithlond = egypt
		and RandomPercent > 66
		console_command add_population, Mithlond -300
		set_event_counter palantir_elf_pop_drop 1
	end_if
	
	if I_SettlementOwner Imladris = egypt
		and RandomPercent > 66
		console_command add_population, Imladris -250
		set_event_counter palantir_elf_pop_drop 1
	end_if
	
	if I_SettlementOwner Forlindon = egypt
		and RandomPercent > 66
		console_command add_population, Forlindon -175
		set_event_counter palantir_elf_pop_drop 1
	end_if
	
	if I_SettlementOwner Harlindon = egypt
		and RandomPercent > 66
		console_command add_population, Harlindon -150
		set_event_counter palantir_elf_pop_drop 1
	end_if
	
	if I_SettlementOwner Emyn-Beraid = egypt
		and RandomPercent > 66
		console_command add_population, Emyn-Beraid -125
		set_event_counter palantir_elf_pop_drop 1
	end_if

	if I_EventCounter palantir_elf_pop_drop == 1
		historic_event palantir_elves_leaving event/reached_grey_havens.bik
	end_if
	
end_monitor

monitor_event FactionTurnEnd FactionIsLocal

	;FactionIsLocal is there simply to prevent this being fired 14 times/turn and to ensure that this fires prior to
	; other faction TurnStart/End events (namely SettlementTurnStart for Gorgoroth below).
	;This is all multi-faction stuff...

	inc_counter pal_turns_till_next_avail -1
	
	set_counter is_remote_viewing 0
	set_event_counter pal_elostirion_used_this_turn 0
	set_event_counter pal_viewed_this_turn 0
	set_event_counter pal_sauron_influence_this_turn 0
	
	;these will be set to 1 by monitor below if applicable
	set_event_counter pal_sauron_local_and_in_barad 0
	set_counter pal_sauron_in_barad 0	
	
	;in case the character somehow still exists...
	if I_CharacterExists Palantir
		kill_character Palantir	
	end_if
	
end_monitor

monitor_event SettlementTurnStart SettlementName Gorgoroth
	and FactionReligion catholic
	and not FactionType france
	and not FactionExcommunicated 
	
	;a non-excommunicated Melkor faction (other than Isengard) holds Barad-dur

	set_counter pal_sauron_in_barad 1
		
	if I_CompareCounter pal_sauron_is_local_faction == 1			
		set_event_counter pal_sauron_local_and_in_barad 1
	end_if
		
end_monitor


;##############################################################################
;##################### Remote Viewing : Mirror of Galadriel ###################
;##############################################################################
				
declare_timer rvm_timer	
declare_timer rvm_animation_timer

;Number of turns until mirror can be next used.
;This is set in two places: below (initial wait) and in the main viewing monitor (subsequent waits). Search for "set_counter rvm_turns_till_next_avail" to find.
declare_counter rvm_turns_till_next_avail
set_counter rvm_turns_till_next_avail 4

set_event_counter rvm_sfx_idx_prev	0  ;the last played sound effect (1, 2 or 3. 0 = not yet played)

monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionIsLocal
  and I_TurnNumber == 1

	;Show intro message at game start if playing Silvan Elves.

	if I_LocalFaction mongols
		historic_event mirror_intro
	end_if

terminate_monitor
end_monitor

monitor_event ShortcutTriggered ShortcutTriggered radar dec_scale

	if not I_LocalFaction	mongols
		terminate_monitor
	end_if

	if I_CompareCounter rvm_turns_till_next_avail <= 0
		and I_CompareCounter is_remote_viewing == 0
		and I_SettlementSelected Celebrant
		and I_SettlementOwner Celebrant = mongols
	
		;CHANGE THIS NUMBER TO CONTROL TURNS-UNTIL-NEXT-VIEWING
		set_counter rvm_turns_till_next_avail 5	
		
		set_counter is_remote_viewing 1
		
		steal_esc_key on		
		disable_save
		disable_entire_ui
		hide_ui
		disable_movie_view
		
		;calculate view count
		set_event_counter rvm_view_count_from 0
		random_counter_inc rvm_view_count_from 1 100
		if I_EventCounter rvm_view_count_from < 33
			set_event_counter rvm_view_number 1
		end_if
		if I_EventCounter rvm_view_count_from < 67
			and I_EventCounter rvm_view_count_from >= 33
			set_event_counter rvm_view_number 2
		end_if
		if I_EventCounter rvm_view_count_from >= 67
			set_event_counter rvm_view_number 3
		end_if

		;only spawn armies if Mordor faction still exists
		set_event_counter rvm_spawn_fakes 0
		if I_NumberOfSettlements england > 0
			set_event_counter rvm_spawn_fakes 1
		end_if
		
		
		;spawn character in "should not be seen"
	  faction_emerge hungary timurids 1 85.0 100.0 1.2 town false hungary_leader Temporary 30
		;must include an army in emerge
		spawn_army
			faction hungary
			character	Temporary, named character, age 18, x 396, y 341
			unit Mordor Catapult	exp 0 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0		
		end			
		spawn_character hungary, Mirror, merchant, age 18, x 397, y 341  
		if I_LocalFaction venice
			give_everything_to_faction hungary venice false
		end_if
		if I_LocalFaction sicily
			give_everything_to_faction hungary sicily false
		end_if
		if I_LocalFaction milan
			give_everything_to_faction hungary milan false
		end_if
		if I_LocalFaction france
			give_everything_to_faction hungary france false
		end_if
		if I_LocalFaction england
			give_everything_to_faction hungary england false
		end_if
		if I_LocalFaction egypt
			give_everything_to_faction hungary egypt false
		end_if
		if I_LocalFaction hre
			give_everything_to_faction hungary hre false
		end_if
		if I_LocalFaction scotland
			give_everything_to_faction hungary scotland false
		end_if
		if I_LocalFaction mongols
			give_everything_to_faction hungary mongols false
		end_if
		if I_LocalFaction turks
			give_everything_to_faction hungary turks false
		end_if
		if I_LocalFaction portugal
			give_everything_to_faction hungary portugal false
		end_if
		if I_LocalFaction spain
			give_everything_to_faction hungary spain false
		end_if
		if I_LocalFaction moors
			give_everything_to_faction hungary moors false
		end_if
		
		;kill the army; their job is done
		kill_character Temporary
		
		;add traits etc.
		console_command give_trait Mirror Palantir_Vision 1
		console_command mp Mirror -1

		
		;spawn fake armies
		if I_EventCounter rvm_spawn_fakes == 1
		
		  ;trigger monitor to spawn fake armies
			set_event_counter pal_spawn_fake_now 2
			
			;wait for spawn to complete
			while I_EventCounter pal_spawn_fake_now == 2
			end_while
			
			;choose random location for both armies (can only spawn in location index 29 - 62)
			set_event_counter rvm_spawn_idx 0
			random_counter_inc rvm_spawn_idx 29 62
			
			;position fake armies (same location but: move 1st to location, bounce 2nd off 1st then 1st off self)
			if TrueCondition
				if I_EventCounter rvm_spawn_idx == 29
					console_command move_character FakeArmyA, 288, 209
					reposition_character FakeArmyB, 288, 209
					reposition_character FakeArmyA, 288, 209
				end_if
				if I_EventCounter rvm_spawn_idx == 30
					console_command move_character FakeArmyA, 186, 207
					reposition_character FakeArmyB, 186, 207
					reposition_character FakeArmyA, 186, 207
				end_if
				if I_EventCounter rvm_spawn_idx == 31
					console_command move_character FakeArmyA, 197, 198
					reposition_character FakeArmyB, 197, 198
					reposition_character FakeArmyA, 197, 198
				end_if
				if I_EventCounter rvm_spawn_idx == 32
					console_command move_character FakeArmyA, 215, 194
					reposition_character FakeArmyB, 215, 194
					reposition_character FakeArmyA, 215, 194
				end_if
				if I_EventCounter rvm_spawn_idx == 33
					console_command move_character FakeArmyA, 230, 194
					reposition_character FakeArmyB, 230, 194
					reposition_character FakeArmyA, 230, 194
				end_if
				if I_EventCounter rvm_spawn_idx == 34
					console_command move_character FakeArmyA, 244, 189
					reposition_character FakeArmyB, 244, 189
					reposition_character FakeArmyA, 244, 189
				end_if
				if I_EventCounter rvm_spawn_idx == 35
					console_command move_character FakeArmyA, 262, 188
					reposition_character FakeArmyB, 262, 188
					reposition_character FakeArmyA, 262, 188
				end_if
				if I_EventCounter rvm_spawn_idx == 36
					console_command move_character FakeArmyA, 277, 191
					reposition_character FakeArmyB, 277, 191
					reposition_character FakeArmyA, 277, 191
				end_if
				if I_EventCounter rvm_spawn_idx == 37
					console_command move_character FakeArmyA, 168, 185
					reposition_character FakeArmyB, 168, 185
					reposition_character FakeArmyA, 168, 185
				end_if
				if I_EventCounter rvm_spawn_idx == 38
					console_command move_character FakeArmyA, 181, 182
					reposition_character FakeArmyB, 181, 182
					reposition_character FakeArmyA, 181, 182
				end_if
				if I_EventCounter rvm_spawn_idx == 39
					console_command move_character FakeArmyA, 199, 185
					reposition_character FakeArmyB, 199, 185
					reposition_character FakeArmyA, 199, 185
				end_if
				if I_EventCounter rvm_spawn_idx == 40
					console_command move_character FakeArmyA, 207, 182
					reposition_character FakeArmyB, 207, 182
					reposition_character FakeArmyA, 207, 182
				end_if
				if I_EventCounter rvm_spawn_idx == 41
					console_command move_character FakeArmyB, 223, 176
					reposition_character FakeArmyA, 223, 176
					console_command move_character See, 223, 176
				end_if
				if I_EventCounter rvm_spawn_idx == 42
					console_command move_character FakeArmyA, 249, 170
					reposition_character FakeArmyB, 249, 170
					reposition_character FakeArmyA, 249, 170
				end_if
				if I_EventCounter rvm_spawn_idx == 43
					console_command move_character FakeArmyA, 268, 178
					reposition_character FakeArmyB, 268, 178
					reposition_character FakeArmyA, 268, 178
				end_if
				if I_EventCounter rvm_spawn_idx == 44
					console_command move_character FakeArmyA, 278, 166
					reposition_character FakeArmyB, 278, 166
					reposition_character FakeArmyA, 278, 166
				end_if
				if I_EventCounter rvm_spawn_idx == 45
					console_command move_character FakeArmyA, 167, 167
					reposition_character FakeArmyB, 167, 167
					reposition_character FakeArmyA, 167, 167
				end_if
				if I_EventCounter rvm_spawn_idx == 46
					console_command move_character FakeArmyA, 185, 167
					reposition_character FakeArmyB, 185, 167
					reposition_character FakeArmyA, 185, 167
				end_if
				if I_EventCounter rvm_spawn_idx == 47
					console_command move_character FakeArmyA, 204, 165
					reposition_character FakeArmyB, 204, 165
					reposition_character FakeArmyA, 204, 165
				end_if
				if I_EventCounter rvm_spawn_idx == 48
					console_command move_character FakeArmyA, 222, 164
					reposition_character FakeArmyB, 222, 164
					reposition_character FakeArmyA, 222, 164
				end_if
				if I_EventCounter rvm_spawn_idx == 49
					console_command move_character FakeArmyA, 232, 159
					reposition_character FakeArmyB, 232, 159
					reposition_character FakeArmyA, 232, 159
				end_if
				if I_EventCounter rvm_spawn_idx == 50
					console_command move_character FakeArmyA, 251, 155
					reposition_character FakeArmyB, 251, 155
					reposition_character FakeArmyA, 251, 155
				end_if
				if I_EventCounter rvm_spawn_idx == 51
					console_command move_character FakeArmyA, 263, 157
					reposition_character FakeArmyB, 263, 157
					reposition_character FakeArmyA, 263, 157
				end_if
				if I_EventCounter rvm_spawn_idx == 52
					console_command move_character FakeArmyA, 274, 147
					reposition_character FakeArmyB, 274, 147
					reposition_character FakeArmyA, 274, 147
				end_if
				if I_EventCounter rvm_spawn_idx == 53
					console_command move_character FakeArmyA, 188, 154
					reposition_character FakeArmyB, 188, 154
					reposition_character FakeArmyA, 188, 154
				end_if
				if I_EventCounter rvm_spawn_idx == 54
					console_command move_character FakeArmyA, 201, 150
					reposition_character FakeArmyB, 201, 150
					reposition_character FakeArmyA, 201, 150
				end_if
				if I_EventCounter rvm_spawn_idx == 55
					console_command move_character FakeArmyA, 217, 148
					reposition_character FakeArmyB, 217, 148
					reposition_character FakeArmyA, 217, 148
				end_if
				if I_EventCounter rvm_spawn_idx == 56
					console_command move_character FakeArmyA, 230, 146
					reposition_character FakeArmyB, 230, 146
					reposition_character FakeArmyA, 230, 146
				end_if
				if I_EventCounter rvm_spawn_idx == 57
					console_command move_character FakeArmyA, 239, 151
					reposition_character FakeArmyB, 239, 151
					reposition_character FakeArmyA, 239, 151
				end_if
				if I_EventCounter rvm_spawn_idx == 58
					console_command move_character FakeArmyA, 257, 146
					reposition_character FakeArmyB, 257, 146
					reposition_character FakeArmyA, 257, 146
				end_if
				if I_EventCounter rvm_spawn_idx == 59
					console_command move_character FakeArmyA, 291, 135
					reposition_character FakeArmyB, 291, 135
					reposition_character FakeArmyA, 291, 135
				end_if
				if I_EventCounter rvm_spawn_idx == 60
					console_command move_character FakeArmyA, 242, 131
					reposition_character FakeArmyB, 242, 131
					reposition_character FakeArmyA, 242, 131
				end_if
				if I_EventCounter rvm_spawn_idx == 61
					console_command move_character FakeArmyA, 257, 125
					reposition_character FakeArmyB, 257, 125
					reposition_character FakeArmyA, 257, 125
				end_if
				if I_EventCounter rvm_spawn_idx == 62
					console_command move_character FakeArmyA, 270, 124
					reposition_character FakeArmyB, 270, 124
					reposition_character FakeArmyA, 270, 124
				end_if			
			end_if

		end_if		
		
		while I_EventCounter rvm_view_number <= 6
		
			;choose random view
			set_event_counter rvm_rand_view_index 0
			random_counter_inc rvm_rand_view_index 1 64	
			
			;choose random duration
			set_event_counter rvm_rand_view_duration 0
			random_counter_inc rvm_rand_view_duration 1 3
						
			;choose a random sound, different from previous
			if I_EventCounter rvm_sfx_idx_prev == 0		
				;not yet played: choose any of the three
				generate_random_counter rvm_sfx_idx 1 3
			end_if
			if I_EventCounter rvm_sfx_idx_prev == 1	
				;avoid MIRROR1
				generate_random_counter rvm_sfx_idx 2 3
			end_if
			if I_EventCounter rvm_sfx_idx_prev == 2	
				generate_random_counter rvm_sfx_idx 1 2
				if I_EventCounter rvm_sfx_idx == 2
					;avoid MIRROR2
					set_event_counter rvm_sfx_idx 3	
				end_if			
			end_if
			if I_EventCounter rvm_sfx_idx_prev == 3			
				;avoid MIRROR3
				generate_random_counter rvm_sfx_idx 1 2
			end_if
			
			;play the sound
			if I_EventCounter rvm_sfx_idx == 1
			  play_sound_event MIRROR1
				set_event_counter rvm_sfx_idx_prev 1
			end_if
			if I_EventCounter rvm_sfx_idx == 2
			  play_sound_event MIRROR2
				set_event_counter rvm_sfx_idx_prev 2
			end_if
			if I_EventCounter rvm_sfx_idx == 3
			  play_sound_event MIRROR3
				set_event_counter rvm_sfx_idx_prev 3
			end_if
			

			restart_timer rvm_timer
			
			
			if TrueCondition  ;just so I can collapse this section in editor
				
				if I_EventCounter rvm_rand_view_index == 1
					snap_strat_camera 199, 291
					wait 1
					console_command move_character Mirror, 199, 291
				end_if
				if I_EventCounter rvm_rand_view_index == 2
					snap_strat_camera 219, 291
					wait 1
					console_command move_character Mirror, 219, 290
				end_if
				if I_EventCounter rvm_rand_view_index == 3
					snap_strat_camera 236, 292
					wait 1
					console_command move_character Mirror, 236, 292
				end_if
				if I_EventCounter rvm_rand_view_index == 4
					snap_strat_camera 254, 290
					wait 1
					console_command move_character Mirror, 254, 290
				end_if
				if I_EventCounter rvm_rand_view_index == 5
					snap_strat_camera 268, 285
					wait 1
					console_command move_character Mirror, 268, 285
				end_if
				if I_EventCounter rvm_rand_view_index == 6
					snap_strat_camera 208, 276
					wait 1

				end_if

				end_if
				if I_EventCounter rvm_rand_view_index == 50
					snap_strat_camera 251, 155
					wait 1
					console_command move_character Mirror, 251, 155
				end_if
				if I_EventCounter rvm_rand_view_index == 51
					snap_strat_camera 263, 157
					wait 1
					console_command move_character Mirror, 263, 157
				end_if
				if I_EventCounter rvm_rand_view_index == 52
					snap_strat_camera 274, 147
					wait 1
					console_command move_character Mirror, 274, 147
				end_if
				if I_EventCounter rvm_rand_view_index == 53
					snap_strat_camera 188, 154
					wait 1
					console_command move_character Mirror, 188, 154
				end_if
				if I_EventCounter rvm_rand_view_index == 54
					snap_strat_camera 201, 150
					wait 1
					console_command move_character Mirror, 201, 150
				end_if
				if I_EventCounter rvm_rand_view_index == 55
					snap_strat_camera 217, 148
					wait 1
					console_command move_character Mirror, 217, 148
				end_if
				if I_EventCounter rvm_rand_view_index == 56
					snap_strat_camera 230, 146
					wait 1
					console_command move_character Mirror, 230, 146
				end_if
				if I_EventCounter rvm_rand_view_index == 57
					snap_strat_camera 239, 151
					wait 1
					console_command move_character Mirror, 239, 151
				end_if
				if I_EventCounter rvm_rand_view_index == 58
					snap_strat_camera 257, 146
					wait 1
					console_command move_character Mirror, 257, 146
				end_if
				if I_EventCounter rvm_rand_view_index == 59
					snap_strat_camera 291, 135
					wait 1
					console_command move_character Mirror, 291, 135
				end_if
				if I_EventCounter rvm_rand_view_index == 60
					snap_strat_camera 242, 131
					wait 1
					console_command move_character Mirror, 242, 131
				end_if
				if I_EventCounter rvm_rand_view_index == 61
					snap_strat_camera 257, 125
					wait 1
					console_command move_character Mirror, 257, 125
				end_if
				if I_EventCounter rvm_rand_view_index == 62
					snap_strat_camera 270, 124
					wait 1
					console_command move_character Mirror, 270, 124
				end_if
				if I_EventCounter rvm_rand_view_index == 63
					snap_strat_camera 271, 239
					wait 1
					console_command move_character Mirror, 271, 239
				end_if
				if I_EventCounter rvm_rand_view_index == 64
					snap_strat_camera 187, 250
					wait 1
					console_command move_character Mirror, 184, 250
				end_if
			end_if		

			
			set_event_counter rvm_cancel 0
			steal_esc_key on	;if a view was cancelled then Esc key is lost: resteal
			
			;pause for duration or until cancelled
			if I_EventCounter rvm_rand_view_duration == 1
				while I_TimerElapsed rvm_timer < 5000
					and I_EventCounter rvm_cancel == 0			
				end_while
			end_if
			if I_EventCounter rvm_rand_view_duration == 2
				while I_TimerElapsed rvm_timer < 6000
					and I_EventCounter rvm_cancel == 0		
				end_while
			end_if
			if I_EventCounter rvm_rand_view_duration == 3
				while I_TimerElapsed rvm_timer < 7000
					and I_EventCounter rvm_cancel == 0		
				end_while
			end_if
			
			;pause if scrolls open
			set_event_counter rvm_scrolls_open 1
			while I_EventCounter rvm_scrolls_open == 1				
				if not I_ScrollOpen enemy_settlement_info_scroll
					and not I_ScrollOpen own_settlement_info_scroll
					set_event_counter rvm_scrolls_open 0
				end_if
			end_while
			
			;fade out this view
			console_command move_character Mirror, 399, 340  ;"should not be seen"
			wait 0.7
			
			inc_event_counter rvm_view_number 1
			
		end_while
		
		kill_character Mirror
		
		;kill fakes
		if I_EventCounter rvm_spawn_fakes == 1
			console_command move_character FakeArmyA, 369, 331
			console_command move_character FakeArmyB, 370, 331
			kill_character FakeArmyA
			kill_character FakeArmyB
			destroy_units england Mordor Orcs Illusion
		end_if
		
		
		steal_esc_key off

		;return camera and selection to Caras Galadhon
		snap_strat_camera 217, 210	
		select_settlement Celebrant
	
		enable_entire_ui
		show_ui
		enable_save			
		
		set_counter is_remote_viewing 0

	end_if
	
end_monitor	

monitor_event EscPressed TrueCondition

	;this signals the main monitor to cancel the viewing and also returns the campaign
	; view to normal state in case the main monitor crashed while in "viewing" state

	if not I_LocalFaction	mongols
		terminate_monitor
	end_if

	if I_CompareCounter is_remote_viewing == 1
		set_event_counter rvm_cancel 1
	end_if

end_monitor

monitor_event FactionTurnEnd FactionType mongols

	if not I_LocalFaction	mongols
		terminate_monitor
	end_if

	;in case the mirror is somehow still showing...
	if I_CharacterExists Mirror
	  kill_character Mirror
	end_if
	set_counter is_remote_viewing 0
	
	inc_counter rvm_turns_till_next_avail -1
	
end_monitor

monitor_event SettlementSelected TrueCondition
	
	if not I_LocalFaction	mongols
		terminate_monitor
	end_if

	set_event_counter rvm_animation_showing 0
		
	if I_SettlementSelected Celebrant
		and I_CompareCounter rvm_turns_till_next_avail <= 0		
		
		restart_timer rvm_animation_timer
		set_event_counter rvm_is_first_iteration 1
		set_event_counter rvm_animation_idx 0
		set_event_counter rvm_animation_going_up 1

		while I_SettlementSelected Celebrant
		  and I_CompareCounter rvm_turns_till_next_avail <= 0
			
			monitor_conditions I_TimerElapsed rvm_animation_timer > 100			
			
				;do not remove if not present: error in log
				if I_EventCounter rvm_animation_showing == 1
					ui_indicator_remove 1
				end_if		
				
				;increment index and restart if necessary
				if I_EventCounter rvm_animation_going_up == 1	;going up
					inc_event_counter rvm_animation_idx 1
					if I_EventCounter rvm_animation_idx > 9
						set_event_counter rvm_animation_going_up 0  ;go down
					end_if			
				end_if
				if I_EventCounter rvm_animation_going_up == 0	;going down
					inc_event_counter rvm_animation_idx -1
					if I_EventCounter rvm_animation_idx < 1
						set_event_counter rvm_animation_idx 1
						set_event_counter rvm_animation_going_up 1  ;go up
					end_if			
				end_if
				
				if I_EventCounter rvm_animation_idx == 1					
					ui_indicator 1 circle 14 746 colour 34 28 24 scale 0.14 period 0.0 loop
				end_if
				if I_EventCounter rvm_animation_idx == 2
					ui_indicator 1 circle 14 746 colour 31 40 23 scale 0.14 period 0.0 loop
				end_if
				if I_EventCounter rvm_animation_idx == 3
					ui_indicator 1 circle 14 746 colour 28 58 20 scale 0.14 period 0.0 loop
				end_if
				if I_EventCounter rvm_animation_idx == 4
					ui_indicator 1 circle 14 746 colour 24 77 18 scale 0.14 period 0.0 loop
				end_if
				if I_EventCounter rvm_animation_idx == 5
					ui_indicator 1 circle 14 746 colour 20 95 16 scale 0.14 period 0.0 loop
				end_if
				if I_EventCounter rvm_animation_idx == 6
					ui_indicator 1 circle 14 746 colour 16 110 14 scale 0.14 period 0.0 loop
				end_if
				if I_EventCounter rvm_animation_idx == 7
					ui_indicator 1 circle 14 746 colour 13 126 12 scale 0.14 period 0.0 loop
				end_if
				if I_EventCounter rvm_animation_idx == 8
					ui_indicator 1 circle 14 746 colour 10 138 11 scale 0.14 period 0.0 loop
				end_if
				if I_EventCounter rvm_animation_idx == 9
					ui_indicator 1 circle 14 746 colour 7 155 9 scale 0.14 period 0.0 loop
				end_if

				
				set_event_counter rvm_animation_showing 1
				
				restart_timer rvm_animation_timer
				set_event_counter rvm_is_first_iteration 0
				
			end_monitor
		
		end_while
		
		;got to here either because 
		; 1) Celebrant no longer selected, or
		; 2) mirror has now been used this turn 
	
		if I_EventCounter rvm_animation_showing == 1
			ui_indicator_remove 1
		end_if		
		set_event_counter rvm_animation_showing 0
		
	end_if
	
end_monitor

monitor_event EventCounter EventCounterType pal_spawn_fake_now 
	and I_EventCounter pal_spawn_fake_now >= 1
	
		;This is used by both Palantiri and Mirror to handle the spawning of fake armies
	
		campaign_wait 0.5

		;spawn fake armies at top of map 
		
		faction_emerge hungary timurids 1 85.0 100.0 1.2 town false hungary_leaderB TemporaryII 30
		
		spawn_army 
		faction hungary
		character	FakeArmyA, named character, age 22, x 331, y 340, portrait FakeArmyA, direction N
		traits LoyaltyStarter 1 , GoodCommander 1 , ReligionStarter 1 , Intelligent 1
		unit 	Mordor Orcs Illusion  	exp 1 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
		unit 	Mordor Orcs Illusion  	exp 4 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
		unit 	Mordor Orcs Illusion  	exp 1 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
		unit 	Mordor Orcs Illusion  	exp 0 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
		unit 	Mordor Orcs Illusion  	exp 6 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
		unit 	Mordor Orcs Illusion  	exp 1 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
		unit 	Mordor Orcs Illusion  	exp 3 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
		unit 	Mordor Orcs Illusion  	exp 0 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
		unit 	Mordor Orcs Illusion  	exp 4 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
		unit 	Mordor Orcs Illusion  	exp 1 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
		unit 	Mordor Orcs Illusion	exp 2 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
		unit 	Mordor Orcs Illusion  	exp 4 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
		unit 	Mordor Orcs Illusion  	exp 1 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
		unit 	Mordor Orcs Illusion	exp 2 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
		unit 	Mordor Orcs Illusion  	exp 4 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
		unit 	Mordor Orcs Illusion  	exp 1 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
		unit 	Mordor Orcs Illusion	exp 2 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
		end

		spawn_army 
		faction hungary
		character	FakeArmyB, named character, age 19, x 332, y 340, portrait FakeArmyB, direction W
		traits LoyaltyStarter 1 , GoodCommander 1 , ReligionStarter 1 , Intelligent 1, NightBattleCapable 1
		unit 	Mordor Orcs Illusion  	exp 1 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
		unit 	Mordor Orcs Illusion  	exp 0 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
		unit 	Mordor Orcs Illusion  	exp 4 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
		unit 	Mordor Orcs Illusion  	exp 1 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
		unit 	Mordor Orcs Illusion	exp 2 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
		unit 	Mordor Orcs Illusion 	exp 5 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
		unit 	Mordor Orcs Illusion  	exp 2 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
		unit 	Mordor Orcs Illusion  	exp 1 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
		unit 	Mordor Orcs Illusion  	exp 3 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
		unit 	Mordor Orcs Illusion  	exp 0 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
		unit 	Mordor Orcs Illusion	exp 1 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
		unit 	Mordor Orcs Illusion	exp 1 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
		unit 	Mordor Orcs Illusion	exp 0 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
		end

		spawn_army 
		faction hungary
		character	FakeArmyC, named character, age 20, x 333, y 340, portrait FakeArmyC, direction S
		traits LoyaltyStarter 1 , GoodCommander 1 , ReligionStarter 1 , Intelligent 1
		unit 	Mordor Orcs Illusion  	exp 1 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
		unit 	Mordor Orcs Illusion  	exp 4 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
		unit 	Mordor Orcs Illusion  	exp 1 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
		unit 	Mordor Orcs Illusion  	exp 0 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
		unit 	Mordor Orcs Illusion  	exp 2 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
		unit 	Mordor Orcs Illusion  	exp 1 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
		unit 	Mordor Orcs Illusion  	exp 3 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
		unit 	Mordor Orcs Illusion  	exp 0 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
		unit 	Mordor Orcs Illusion  	exp 4 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
		unit 	Mordor Orcs Illusion	exp 1 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
		unit 	Mordor Orcs Illusion	exp 1 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
		unit 	Mordor Orcs Illusion	exp 0 armour 0 weapon_lvl 0
		end
		
		give_everything_to_faction hungary england false
		
		
		;give random traits to fake armies
		generate_random_counter pal_random_trait 1 6
		if I_EventCounter pal_random_trait == 1
			console_command give_trait FakeArmyA GoodCommander 5
			console_command give_trait FakeArmyB GoodCommander 4
			console_command give_trait FakeArmyC GoodCommander 3
			console_command give_trait FakeArmyA BattleDread 3
			console_command give_trait FakeArmyB BattleDread 2
			console_command give_trait FakeArmyC BattleDread 3				
		end_if
		if I_EventCounter pal_random_trait == 2
			console_command give_trait FakeArmyA GoodCommander 2
			console_command give_trait FakeArmyB GoodCommander 3
			console_command give_trait FakeArmyC GoodCommander 4
			console_command give_trait FakeArmyA BattleDread 3
			console_command give_trait FakeArmyB BattleDread 3
			console_command give_trait FakeArmyC BattleDread 4				
		end_if
		if I_EventCounter pal_random_trait == 3
			console_command give_trait FakeArmyA GoodCommander 4
			console_command give_trait FakeArmyB GoodCommander 2
			console_command give_trait FakeArmyC GoodCommander 4
			console_command give_trait FakeArmyA BattleDread 3
			console_command give_trait FakeArmyB BattleDread 3
			console_command give_trait FakeArmyC BattleDread 3				
		end_if
		if I_EventCounter pal_random_trait == 4
			console_command give_trait FakeArmyA GoodCommander 4
			console_command give_trait FakeArmyB GoodCommander 3
			console_command give_trait FakeArmyC GoodCommander 3
			console_command give_trait FakeArmyA BattleDread 3
			console_command give_trait FakeArmyB BattleDread 2
			console_command give_trait FakeArmyC BattleDread 3				
		end_if
		if I_EventCounter pal_random_trait == 5
			console_command give_trait FakeArmyA GoodCommander 4
			console_command give_trait FakeArmyB GoodCommander 2
			console_command give_trait FakeArmyC GoodCommander 2
			console_command give_trait FakeArmyA BattleDread 3
			console_command give_trait FakeArmyB BattleDread 2
			console_command give_trait FakeArmyC BattleDread 3				
		end_if
		if I_EventCounter pal_random_trait == 6
			console_command give_trait FakeArmyA GoodCommander 4
			console_command give_trait FakeArmyB GoodCommander 2
			console_command give_trait FakeArmyC GoodCommander 3
			console_command give_trait FakeArmyA BattleDread 5
			console_command give_trait FakeArmyB BattleDread 2
			console_command give_trait FakeArmyC BattleDread 3				
		end_if
		
		;only spawn 2 armies unless 3 was passed as parameter
		if I_EventCounter pal_spawn_fake_now < 3
			kill_character FakeArmyC
		end_if
		
		set_event_counter pal_spawn_fake_now 0
			
end_monitor

;########################## Palantiri/Mirror End ##############################

;;;;;;;Print Info
log always Germanicu5 ReallyBadAI v5.6 Running. Please upload log and savegames when reporting battle CTDs for SS.
monitor_event GameReloaded
log always Germanicu5 ReallyBadAI v5.6 Running. Please upload log and savegames when reporting battle CTDs for SS.
end_monitor

;;;;;;;
set_event_counter no_advice 1

monitor_event PreFactionTurnStart FactionIsLocal
    and BattleDifficulty > medium

    set_counter g5_battle_difficulty_high 1
    terminate_monitor
end_monitor

monitor_event PreFactionTurnStart FactionIsLocal
    and I_CompareCounter panel_check != 1

    set_counter panel_check 1
end_monitor

monitor_event GeneralAssaultsGeneral TargetFactionIsLocal
    and I_CompareCounter panel_check != 1

    set_counter panel_check 1
end_monitor

monitor_event GeneralAssaultsGeneral ! FactionIsLocal
    and ! TargetFactionIsLocal
    and I_CompareCounter panel_check != 2

    set_counter panel_check 2
end_monitor

monitor_event GeneralAssaultsResidence TargetFactionIsLocal
    and I_CompareCounter panel_check != 1

    set_counter panel_check 1
end_monitor

monitor_event GeneralAssaultsResidence ! FactionIsLocal
    and ! TargetFactionIsLocal
    and I_CompareCounter panel_check != 2

    set_counter panel_check 2
end_monitor

monitor_event ButtonPressed ButtonPressed prebattle_fight_button
    and I_CompareCounter panel_check = 1

monitor_conditions I_InBattle
    and I_CompareCounter fire_labels = 10

    set_counter fire_labels 0
    battle_wait 0.1

    if ! I_BattleIsSiegeBattle
    set_counter fire_labels 1
    end_if

    if I_BattleIsSiegeBattle
    and I_BattleEnemyArmyNumberOfMountClass elephant > 0
    set_counter fire_labels 1
    end_if

if I_BattlePlayerArmyIsAttacker

    ;;;Army 1
    set_counter player_unit_count 0
    if I_BattlePlayerArmyNumberOfUnits > 0
    label_unit 0 0 0 a1u1
    inc_counter player_unit_count 1
    if I_BattlePlayerArmyNumberOfUnits > 1
    label_unit 0 0 1 a1u2
    inc_counter player_unit_count 1
    if I_BattlePlayerArmyNumberOfUnits > 2
    label_unit 0 0 2 a1u3
    inc_counter player_unit_count 1
    if I_BattlePlayerArmyNumberOfUnits > 3
    label_unit 0 0 3 a1u4
    inc_counter player_unit_count 1
    if I_BattlePlayerArmyNumberOfUnits > 4
    label_unit 0 0 4 a1u5
    inc_counter player_unit_count 1
    if I_BattlePlayerArmyNumberOfUnits > 5
    label_unit 0 0 5 a1u6
    inc_counter player_unit_count 1
    if I_BattlePlayerArmyNumberOfUnits > 6
    label_unit 0 0 6 a1u7
    inc_counter player_unit_count 1
    if I_BattlePlayerArmyNumberOfUnits > 7
    label_unit 0 0 7 a1u8
    inc_counter player_unit_count 1
    if I_BattlePlayerArmyNumberOfUnits > 8
    label_unit 0 0 8 a1u9
    inc_counter player_unit_count 1
    if I_BattlePlayerArmyNumberOfUnits > 9
    label_unit 0 0 9 a1u10
    inc_counter player_unit_count 1
    if I_BattlePlayerArmyNumberOfUnits > 10
    label_unit 0 0 10 a1u11
    inc_counter player_unit_count 1
    if I_BattlePlayerArmyNumberOfUnits > 11
    label_unit 0 0 11 a1u12
    inc_counter player_unit_count 1
    if I_BattlePlayerArmyNumberOfUnits > 12
    label_unit 0 0 12 a1u13
    inc_counter player_unit_count 1
    if I_BattlePlayerArmyNumberOfUnits > 13
    label_unit 0 0 13 a1u14
    inc_counter player_unit_count 1
    if I_BattlePlayerArmyNumberOfUnits > 14
    label_unit 0 0 14 a1u15
    inc_counter player_unit_count 1
    if I_BattlePlayerArmyNumberOfUnits > 15
    label_unit 0 0 15 a1u16
    inc_counter player_unit_count 1
    if I_BattlePlayerArmyNumberOfUnits > 16
    label_unit 0 0 16 a1u17
    inc_counter player_unit_count 1
    if I_BattlePlayerArmyNumberOfUnits > 17
    label_unit 0 0 17 a1u18
    inc_counter player_unit_count 1
    if I_BattlePlayerArmyNumberOfUnits > 18
    label_unit 0 0 18 a1u19
    inc_counter player_unit_count 1
    if I_BattlePlayerArmyNumberOfUnits = 20
    label_unit 0 0 19 a1u20
    inc_counter player_unit_count 1
    end_if
    end_if
    end_if
    end_if
    end_if
    end_if
    end_if
    end_if
    end_if
    end_if
    end_if
    end_if
    end_if
    end_if
    end_if
    end_if
    end_if
    end_if
    end_if
    end_if
end_if
if I_BattlePlayerArmyIsAttacker
;    and ! I_BattleIsSiegeBattle
    ;;;Army 2
    set_counter enemy_unit_count 0
    if I_BattleEnemyArmyNumberOfUnits > 0
    label_unit 1 0 0 a2u1
    inc_counter enemy_unit_count 1
    if I_BattleEnemyArmyNumberOfUnits > 1
    label_unit 1 0 1 a2u2
    inc_counter enemy_unit_count 1
    if I_BattleEnemyArmyNumberOfUnits > 2
    label_unit 1 0 2 a2u3
    inc_counter enemy_unit_count 1
    if I_BattleEnemyArmyNumberOfUnits > 3
    label_unit 1 0 3 a2u4
    inc_counter enemy_unit_count 1
    if I_BattleEnemyArmyNumberOfUnits > 4
    label_unit 1 0 4 a2u5
    inc_counter enemy_unit_count 1
    if I_BattleEnemyArmyNumberOfUnits > 5
    label_unit 1 0 5 a2u6
    inc_counter enemy_unit_count 1
    if I_BattleEnemyArmyNumberOfUnits > 6
    label_unit 1 0 6 a2u7
    inc_counter enemy_unit_count 1
    if I_BattleEnemyArmyNumberOfUnits > 7
    label_unit 1 0 7 a2u8
    inc_counter enemy_unit_count 1
    if I_BattleEnemyArmyNumberOfUnits > 8
    label_unit 1 0 8 a2u9
    inc_counter enemy_unit_count 1
    if I_BattleEnemyArmyNumberOfUnits > 9
    label_unit 1 0 9 a2u10
    inc_counter enemy_unit_count 1
    if I_BattleEnemyArmyNumberOfUnits > 10
    label_unit 1 0 10 a2u11
    inc_counter enemy_unit_count 1
    if I_BattleEnemyArmyNumberOfUnits > 11
    label_unit 1 0 11 a2u12
    inc_counter enemy_unit_count 1
    if I_BattleEnemyArmyNumberOfUnits > 12
    label_unit 1 0 12 a2u13
    inc_counter enemy_unit_count 1
    if I_BattleEnemyArmyNumberOfUnits > 13
    label_unit 1 0 13 a2u14
    inc_counter enemy_unit_count 1
    if I_BattleEnemyArmyNumberOfUnits > 14
    label_unit 1 0 14 a2u15
    inc_counter enemy_unit_count 1
    if I_BattleEnemyArmyNumberOfUnits > 15
    label_unit 1 0 15 a2u16
    inc_counter enemy_unit_count 1
    if I_BattleEnemyArmyNumberOfUnits > 16
    label_unit 1 0 16 a2u17
    inc_counter enemy_unit_count 1

    if I_BattleIsSiegeBattle

    label_location -850, 0, west_side

    and ! I_BattlePlayerArmyIsAttacker

end_monitor

monitor_event BattleConflictPhaseCommenced FactionIsLocal
    and I_CompareCounter panel_check = 1

    set_counter script_delay 1
    battle_wait 15
    if I_CompareCounter script_delay = 1

    if I_CompareCounter fire_labels = 0
    and I_BattleEnemyArmyNumberOfAttribute stakes > 0
    and I_CompareCounter g5_battle_difficulty_high = 1
    and I_BattleIsSiegeBattle
    set_counter label_ready 1
    end_if

    if I_CompareCounter fire_labels = 1
    if I_BattleEnemyArmyNumberOfAttribute stakes > 0
    and I_CompareCounter g5_battle_difficulty_high = 1
    and ! I_BattleIsSiegeBattle
    set_counter label_ready 1
    end_if

    if I_BattlePlayerArmyIsAttacker
    and I_CompareCounter open_battle = 1
    ai_gta_plan_set 1 DEFEND_FEATURE
    battle_wait 1
    ai_active_set on
    set_counter ob_defense_launch 1
    end_if
    end_if

    if ! I_BattleIsSiegeBattle
    and ! I_BattleIsSallyOutBattle
    and ! I_BattleIsRiverBattle
    and ! I_ConflictType SuccessfulAmbush
    and I_BattleEnemyArmyNumberOfUnits > 2
    set_counter g_stop 1
    end_if

    if I_BattleStarted
    and I_CompareCounter kill_sally = 0
    and I_CompareCounter fire_labels = 1
    and I_BattleIsSallyOutBattle
    and I_BattlePlayerArmyIsAttacker
    set_counter sally_defense 1
    set_counter assign_labels 1
    end_if

    if I_BattleStarted
    and I_CompareCounter fire_labels = 1
    and I_CompareCounter open_battle = 1
    set_counter ha_fix 1
    end_if

    if I_BattleStarted
    and I_CompareCounter fire_labels = 1
    and I_BattleIsRiverBattle
    and ! I_BattlePlayerArmyIsAttacker
    set_counter ha_fix 1
    end_if
    set_counter script_delay 0
    end_if
end_monitor

monitor_event BattleReinforcementsArrive ! ArmyIsLocal
    and I_CompareCounter panel_check = 1
    and I_CompareCounter fire_labels = 1

    set_counter reinf_check 1
    battle_wait 15
if I_CompareCounter reinf_check = 1
    set_counter reinf_check 2
    battle_wait 15
if I_CompareCounter reinf_check = 2
    set_counter reinf_check 3
    battle_wait 15
if I_CompareCounter reinf_check = 3
 if ! I_BattlePlayerArmyIsAttacker
    ;;;Army 3
    label_unit 0 1 0 a3u1
    define_unit_group army3a a3u1

    end_if
end_if
if I_BattlePlayerArmyIsAttacker

    ;;;Army 4
    label_unit 1 1 0 a4u1
    define_unit_group army4a a4u1

    end_if
end_if

    if ! I_PercentageUnitGroupKilled army3 = 100
    set_counter army3_reinf_allied 1
    end_if

    if ! I_PercentageUnitGroupKilled army4 = 100
    set_counter army4_reinf_allied 1
    end_if

    if I_PercentageUnitGroupKilled army3 = 100
    and I_PercentageUnitGroupKilled army4 = 100
    set_counter kill_labelling_reinf_allied 1
    end_if

if ! I_BattleIsSallyOutBattle

if I_CompareCounter kill_labelling_reinf_allied = 0

if ! I_BattlePlayerArmyIsAttacker
    ;;;Army 5
    label_unit 0 2 0 a5u1
    define_unit_group army5a a5u1
    if ! I_PercentageUnitGroupKilled army5a = 100
    undefine_unit_group army5a
    ;;;Army 5
    label_unit 0 2 0 a5u1
    label_unit 0 2 1 a5u2

battle_wait 0.5
ai_active_set on

;;;;;;;Reinforcements

    ;;;;;;; Attacking
    if ! I_BattlePlayerArmyIsAttacker
    and ! I_ConflictType SuccessfulAmbush
;    and ! I_ConflictType FailedAmbush
    and ! I_BattleIsSiegeBattle
    and I_CompareCounter army3_reinf_allied = 1

    set_counter apply_strategy 1
;    battle_wait 1
;    set_counter att_alliance_ready 1
    end_if

    ;;;;;;; Defending
    if I_BattlePlayerArmyIsAttacker
    and ! I_ConflictType SuccessfulAmbush
;    and ! I_ConflictType FailedAmbush
    and I_CompareCounter army4_reinf_allied = 1

    if ! I_BattleIsSiegeBattle
    and ! I_BattleIsSallyOutBattle
    set_counter army4_ready 1
    set_counter def_alliance_ready 1
    end_if
    if ! I_BattleIsSiegeBattle
    and I_BattleIsSallyOutBattle
    set_counter army4_ready_sally 1
    set_counter sally_reinf 1
    end_if

    ;;;;;;; Siege
    if I_BattleIsSiegeBattle
    set_counter def_alliance_ready_siege 1
    end_if
    end_if
end_if
end_if
end_if
end_monitor

;Apply Strategy

monitor_conditions I_BattleStarted
    and I_CompareCounter apply_strategy = 1

if ! I_BattlePlayerArmyIsAttacker
    and I_CompareCounter open_battle = 1

;    ai_gta_plan_set 0 ATTACK_ALL
    ai_gta_add_objective 0 ATTACK_ENEMY_BATTLEGROUP 999
    set_counter launch_alliance_0 1
end_if

    and I_CompareCounter open_battle = 1

;    ai_gta_plan_set 1 ATTACK_ALL
    ai_gta_add_objective 1 ATTACK_ENEMY_BATTLEGROUP 999
    set_counter launch_alliance_1 1
end_if

    and I_CompareCounter army3_reinf_allied = 1

battle_wait 0.5
ai_active_set on
set_counter apply_strategy 0
end_monitor

monitor_conditions I_BattleStarted
    and I_CompareCounter relaunch_movement = 1

    ai_active_set on
    battle_wait 0.5
    set_counter army3_moving 0
    set_counter army4_moving 0
    set_counter army5_moving 0
    set_counter army6_moving 0
    set_counter army7_moving 0
    set_counter army8_moving 0
    set_counter army9_moving 0
    set_counter army10_moving 0
    set_counter army11_moving 0
    set_counter army12_moving 0
    set_counter army13_moving 0
    set_counter army14_moving 0
    set_counter army15_moving 0
    set_counter army16_moving 0

    battle_wait 5
    set_counter relaunch_movement 0
end_monitor

;;;;;;; Attacking

monitor_conditions I_BattleStarted
    and I_CompareCounter att_alliance_ready = 1
    and ! I_BattlePlayerArmyIsAttacker
 ;    inc_counter reinf_check_interval 1
 if I_CompareCounter army3_reinf_allied = 1

    if I_CompareCounter army3_reinf_allied = 1
    and I_CompareCounter army3_moving = 1
    and I_UnitEnemyUnitInRadius a3u1 160
    and ! I_UnitGroupInRangeOfUnitGroup army1 army3

    unit_group_order_halt army3
    battle_wait 0.5
    set_counter relaunch_movement 1
    set_counter army3_moving 0
    end_if

    if I_CompareCounter army3_reinf_allied = 1
    and I_CompareCounter army3_moving = 1
    and ! I_UnitEnemyUnitInRadius a3u1 160
    and I_UnitDistanceFromUnit a1u1 a3u1 > 150
    and I_IsUnitIdle a3u1

    set_counter army3_reinf_late 1
    battle_wait 1
    set_counter army3_moving 1
    end_if

    if I_CompareCounter army3_reinf_allied = 1
    and I_CompareCounter army3_moving = 0
    and ! I_UnitEnemyUnitInRadius a3u1 160
    and ! I_UnitGroupInRangeOfUnitGroup army1 army3

    set_counter army3_run 1
    set_counter army3_moving 1
    end_if

    if I_CompareCounter army3_reinf_allied = 1
    and I_CompareCounter distance_trigger1 = 0
    and I_UnitDistanceFromUnit a3u1 a1u1 < 1000

    set_counter army3_reinf_late 1
    set_counter distance_trigger1 1
    end_if

    if I_CompareCounter army3_reinf_allied = 1
    and I_CompareCounter distance_trigger2 = 0
    and I_UnitDistanceFromUnit a3u1 a1u1 < 750

    set_counter army3_reinf_late 1
    set_counter distance_trigger2 1
    end_if

    if I_CompareCounter army3_reinf_allied = 1
    and I_CompareCounter distance_trigger3 = 0
    and I_UnitDistanceFromUnit a3u1 a1u1 < 500

    set_counter army3_reinf_late 1
    set_counter distance_trigger3 1
    end_if

    if I_CompareCounter army3_reinf_allied = 1
    and I_CompareCounter distance_trigger4 = 0
    and I_UnitDistanceFromUnit a3u1 a1u1 < 300

    set_counter army3_reinf_late 1
    set_counter distance_trigger4 1
    end_if

    if I_CompareCounter army3_reinf_allied = 1
    and I_CompareCounter distance_trigger5 = 0
    and I_UnitDistanceFromUnit a3u1 a1u1 < 200

    set_counter army3_reinf_late 1
    set_counter distance_trigger5 1
    end_if

    if I_CompareCounter army3_reinf_allied = 1
    and I_CompareCounter army3_reinf_late = 1
    and ! I_UnitEnemyUnitInRadius a3u1 160
;    and ! I_UnitGroupInRangeOfUnitGroup army1 army3

    set_counter army3_run 1
    battle_wait 0.5
    set_counter army3_moving 1
    set_counter army3_reinf_late 0
    end_if

    if I_CompareCounter army3_reinf_allied = 1
    and I_UnitDistanceFromUnit a3u1 a1u1 < 150
    and I_UnitEnemyUnitInRadius a1u1 100

    set_counter army3_reinf_allied 0
    unit_group_order_halt army3
    battle_wait 0.5
    set_counter relaunch_movement 1
    end_if

    if I_CompareCounter army3_reinf_allied = 1
    and I_UnitDistanceFromUnit a3u1 a1u1 < 100

    set_counter army3_reinf_allied 0
    unit_group_order_halt army3
    battle_wait 0.5
    set_counter relaunch_movement 1
    end_if

    if I_CompareCounter army3_reinf_allied = 1
    and I_PercentageUnitKilled a3u1 > 60

    set_counter army3_reinf_allied 0
    unit_group_order_halt army3
    battle_wait 0.5
    set_counter relaunch_movement 1
    end_if

    if I_CompareCounter army3_reinf_allied = 1
    and I_UnitDistanceFromUnit a3u1 a2u1 < 200
    and I_UnitDistanceFromUnit a1u1 a2u1 < 200

    set_counter army3_reinf_allied 0
    unit_group_order_halt army3
    battle_wait 0.5
    set_counter relaunch_movement 1
    end_if

    if I_CompareCounter army3_reinf_allied = 1
    and I_PercentageUnitGroupKilled army3 > 50

    set_counter army3_reinf_allied 0
    unit_group_order_halt army3
    battle_wait 0.5
    set_counter relaunch_movement 1
    end_if

    if I_CompareCounter army3_reinf_allied = 1
    and I_UnitDistanceFromUnit a3u1 a1u1 < 250
    and I_UnitGroupInRangeOfUnit army3 a1u1

    set_counter army3_reinf_allied 0
    unit_group_order_halt army3
    battle_wait 0.5
    set_counter relaunch_movement 1
    end_if

    if I_CompareCounter army3_reinf_allied = 1
    and I_UnitDistanceFromUnit a1u1 a3u1 < 250
    and I_IsUnitIdle a3u1

    set_counter army3_reinf_allied 0
    unit_group_order_halt army3
    battle_wait 0.5
    set_counter relaunch_movement 1
    end_if

    if I_CompareCounter army3_reinf_allied = 1

    set_counter army11_reinf_allied 0
    unit_group_order_halt army11
    battle_wait 0.5
    set_counter relaunch_movement 1
    end_if

    if I_CompareCounter army11_reinf_allied = 1
    and I_UnitDistanceFromUnit a1u1 a11u1 < 250
    and I_IsUnitUnderFire a11u1

    set_counter army11_reinf_allied 0
    unit_group_order_halt army11
    battle_wait 0.5
    set_counter relaunch_movement 1
    end_if

    if I_CompareCounter army11_reinf_allied = 1
    and I_CompareCounter army11_run = 1

;    unit_group_order_halt army11
    battle_wait 0.5
    unit_group_move_to_missile_range_of_unit army11 a1u1 run
    battle_wait 0.5
    set_counter army11_run 0
    end_if

end_if

if I_CompareCounter army13_reinf_allied = 1

    if I_CompareCounter army13_reinf_allied = 1
    and I_CompareCounter army13_moving = 1
    and I_UnitEnemyUnitInRadius a13u1 160
    and ! I_UnitGroupInRangeOfUnitGroup army1 army13

    unit_group_order_halt army13
    battle_wait 0.5
    set_counter relaunch_movement 1
    set_counter army13_moving 0

    if I_CompareCounter army13_reinf_allied = 1

    set_counter army13_moving 1
    set_counter army13_reinf_late 0
    end_if

    if I_CompareCounter army13_reinf_allied = 1
    and I_UnitDistanceFromUnit a13u1 a1u1 < 150

    end_if

    and I_UnitDistanceFromUnit a13u1 a1u1 < 100

    set_counter army13_reinf_allied 0
    unit_group_order_halt army13
    battle_wait 0.5
    set_counter relaunch_movement 1
    end_if

    if I_CompareCounter army13_reinf_allied = 1
    and I_PercentageUnitKilled a13u1 > 60

    set_counter army13_reinf_allied 0
    unit_group_order_halt army13
    battle_wait 0.5
    set_counter relaunch_movement 1

    if I_CompareCounter army13_reinf_allied = 1

    and I_CompareCounter def_alliance_ready = 1
    and I_BattlePlayerArmyIsAttacker

if I_CompareCounter army4_reinf_allied = 1

    if I_CompareCounter army4_reinf_allied = 1
    and I_CompareCounter army4_moving = 1
    and I_UnitEnemyUnitInRadius a4u1 160
    and ! I_UnitGroupInRangeOfUnitGroup army2 army4

    unit_group_order_halt army4
    battle_wait 0.5
    set_counter relaunch_movement 1
    set_counter army4_moving 0
    end_if

    if I_CompareCounter army4_reinf_allied = 1
    and I_CompareCounter army4_moving = 1
    and ! I_UnitEnemyUnitInRadius a4u1 160
    and I_UnitDistanceFromUnit a2u1 a4u1 > 150
    and I_IsUnitIdle a4u1

    set_counter army4_reinf_late 1
    battle_wait 1
    set_counter army4_moving 1
    end_if

    if I_CompareCounter army4_reinf_allied = 1
    and I_CompareCounter army4_moving = 0
    and ! I_UnitEnemyUnitInRadius a4u1 160
    and ! I_UnitGroupInRangeOfUnitGroup army2 army4

    set_counter army4_run 1
    set_counter army4_moving 1
    end_if

    if I_CompareCounter army4_reinf_allied = 1
    and I_CompareCounter distance_trigger1 = 0
    and I_UnitDistanceFromUnit a4u1 a2u1 < 1000

    set_counter army4_reinf_late 1
    set_counter distance_trigger1 1
    end_if

    if I_CompareCounter army4_reinf_allied = 1
    and I_CompareCounter distance_trigger2 = 0
    and I_UnitDistanceFromUnit a4u1 a2u1 < 750

    set_counter army4_reinf_late 1
    set_counter distance_trigger2 1
    end_if

    if I_CompareCounter army4_reinf_allied = 1
    and I_CompareCounter distance_trigger3 = 0
    and I_UnitDistanceFromUnit a4u1 a2u1 < 500

    set_counter army4_reinf_late 1
    set_counter distance_trigger3 1
    end_if

    and I_CompareCounter distance_trigger4 = 0
    and I_UnitDistanceFromUnit a4u1 a2u1 < 300

    and ! I_UnitEnemyUnitInRadius a4u1 160
;    and ! I_UnitGroupInRangeOfUnitGroup army2 army4

    battle_wait 0.5
    set_counter army4_moving 1
    set_counter army4_reinf_late 0
    end_if

    and I_UnitDistanceFromUnit a4u1 a2u1 < 150
    and I_UnitEnemyUnitInRadius a2u1 100

    set_counter army4_reinf_allied 0
    unit_group_order_halt army4
    battle_wait 0.5
    set_counter relaunch_movement 1
    end_if

    if I_CompareCounter army4_reinf_allied = 1
    and I_UnitDistanceFromUnit a4u1 a2u1 < 100

    set_counter army4_reinf_allied 0
    unit_group_order_halt army4
    battle_wait 0.5
    set_counter relaunch_movement 1
    end_if

    if I_CompareCounter army4_reinf_allied = 1
    and I_PercentageUnitKilled a4u1 > 60

    set_counter army4_reinf_allied 0
    unit_group_order_halt army4
    battle_wait 0.5
    set_counter relaunch_movement 1
    end_if

    if I_CompareCounter army4_reinf_allied = 1
